104// Colors used in this file: (Most else defaults to c_light_gray)
105#define COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) h_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) // Selected value
106#define COL_STAT_BONUSget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) // Bonus
107#define COL_STAT_NEUTRALget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) // Neutral Property
108#define COL_STAT_PENALTYget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red) c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red) // Penalty
109#define COL_TR_GOODget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) // Good trait descriptive text
110#define COL_TR_GOOD_OFF_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) // A toggled-off good trait
111#define COL_TR_GOOD_ON_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) // A toggled-on good trait
112#define COL_TR_GOOD_OFF_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray) c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray) // A toggled-off good trait
113#define COL_TR_GOOD_ON_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) // A toggled-on good trait
114#define COL_TR_BADget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) // Bad trait descriptive text
115#define COL_TR_BAD_OFF_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) // A toggled-off bad trait
116#define COL_TR_BAD_ON_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red) c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red) // A toggled-on bad trait
117#define COL_TR_BAD_OFF_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray) c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray) // A toggled-off bad trait
118#define COL_TR_BAD_ON_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) // A toggled-on bad trait
119#define COL_TR_NEUTget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown) c_brownget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown) // Neutral trait descriptive text
120#define COL_TR_NEUT_OFF_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) // A toggled-off neutral trait
121#define COL_TR_NEUT_ON_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow) c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow) // A toggled-on neutral trait
122#define COL_TR_NEUT_OFF_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray) c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray) // A toggled-off neutral trait
123#define COL_TR_NEUT_ON_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown) c_brownget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown) // A toggled-on neutral trait

128static int skill_increment_cost( const Character &u, const skill_id &skill );

130class tab_manager
131{
132 std::vector<std::string> &tab_names;
133 std::map<size_t, inclusive_rectangle<point>> tab_map;
134 point window_pos;
135 public:
136 bool complete = false;
137 bool quit = false;
138 tab_list position;
139
140 explicit tab_manager( std::vector<std::string> &tab_names ) : tab_names( tab_names ),
141 position( tab_names ) {
142 }
143
144 void draw( const catacurses::window &w );
145 bool handle_input( const std::string &action, const input_context &ctxt );
146 void set_up_tab_navigation( input_context &ctxt );
147};
148
149void tab_manager::draw( const catacurses::window &w )
150{
151 std::pair<std::vector<std::string>, size_t> fitted_tabs = fit_tabs_to_width( getmaxx( w ),
152 position.cur_index(), tab_names );
153 tab_map = draw_tabs( w, fitted_tabs.first, position.cur_index() - fitted_tabs.second,
154 fitted_tabs.second );
155 window_pos = point( getbegx( w ), getbegy( w ) );
156 draw_border_below_tabs( w );
157
158 for( int i = 1; i < TERMX - 1; i++ ) {
159 mvwputch( w, point( i, 5 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXOX4194417 );
160 }
161 mvwputch( w, point( 0, 5 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XXXO4194420 ); // |-
162 mvwputch( w, point( TERMX - 1, 5 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XOXX4194421 ); // -|
163}
164
165bool tab_manager::handle_input( const std::string &action, const input_context &ctxt )
166{
167 if( action == "QUIT" && query_yn( _( "Return to main menu?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Return to main menu?" ) ) ) ) ) {
168 quit = true;
169 } else if( action == "PREV_TAB" ) {
170 position.prev();
171 } else if( action == "NEXT_TAB" ) {
172 position.next();
173 } else if( action == "SELECT" ) {
174 std::optional<point> coord = ctxt.get_coordinates_text( catacurses::stdscr );
175 if( coord.has_value() ) {
176 point local_coord = coord.value() + window_pos;
177 for( const auto &entry : tab_map ) {
178 if( entry.second.contains( local_coord ) ) {
179 position.set_index( entry.first );
180 return true;
181 }
182 }
183 }
184 return false;
185 } else {
186 return false;
187 }
188 return true;
189}
190
191void tab_manager::set_up_tab_navigation( input_context &ctxt )
192{
193 ctxt.register_action( "PREV_TAB" );
194 ctxt.register_action( "NEXT_TAB" );
195 ctxt.register_action( "SELECT" );
196 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
197}
198
199static int stat_point_pool()
200{
201 return 4 * 8 + get_option<int>( "INITIAL_STAT_POINTS" );
202}
203static int stat_points_used( const avatar &u )
204{
205 int used = 0;
206 for( int stat : {
207 u.str_max, u.dex_max, u.int_max, u.per_max
208 } ) {
209 used += stat + std::max( 0, stat - HIGH_STAT );
210 }
211 return used;
212}
213
214static int trait_point_pool()
215{
216 return get_option<int>( "INITIAL_TRAIT_POINTS" );
217}
218static int trait_points_used( const avatar &u )
219{
220 int used = 0;
221 for( trait_id cur_trait : u.get_mutations( true ) ) {
222 bool locked = get_scenario()->is_locked_trait( cur_trait )
223 || u.prof->is_locked_trait( cur_trait );
224 for( const profession *hobby : u.hobbies ) {
225 locked = locked || hobby->is_locked_trait( cur_trait );
226 }
227 if( locked ) {
228 // The starting traits granted by scenarios, professions and hobbies cost nothing
229 continue;
230 }
231 const mutation_branch &mdata = cur_trait.obj();
232 used += mdata.points;
233 }
234 return used;
235}
236
237static int skill_point_pool()
238{
239 return get_option<int>( "INITIAL_SKILL_POINTS" );
240}
241static int skill_points_used( const avatar &u )
242{
243 int scenario = get_scenario()->point_cost();
244 int profession_points = u.prof->point_cost();
245 int hobbies = 0;
246 for( const profession *hobby : u.hobbies ) {
247 hobbies += hobby->point_cost();
248 }
249 int skills = 0;
250 for( const Skill &sk : Skill::skills ) {
251 static std::array < int, 1 + MAX_SKILL > costs = { 0, 1, 1, 2, 4, 6, 9, 12, 16, 20, 25 };
252 int skill_level = u.get_skill_level( sk.ident() );
253 skills += costs.at( std::min<int>( skill_level, costs.size() - 1 ) );
254 }
255 return scenario + profession_points + hobbies + skills;
256}
257
258static int point_pool_total()
259{
260 return stat_point_pool() + trait_point_pool() + skill_point_pool();
261}
262static int points_used_total( const avatar &u )
263{
264 return stat_points_used( u ) + trait_points_used( u ) + skill_points_used( u );
265}
266
267static int has_unspent_points( const avatar &u )
268{
269 return points_used_total( u ) < point_pool_total();
270}
271
272struct multi_pool {
273 // The amount of unspent points in the pool without counting the borrowed points
274 const int pure_stat_points, pure_trait_points, pure_skill_points;
275 // The amount of points awailable in a pool minus the points that are borrowed
276 // by lower pools plus the points that can be borrowed from higher pools
277 const int stat_points_left, trait_points_left, skill_points_left;
278 explicit multi_pool( const avatar &u ):
279 pure_stat_points( stat_point_pool() - stat_points_used( u ) ),
280 pure_trait_points( trait_point_pool() - trait_points_used( u ) ),
281 pure_skill_points( skill_point_pool() - skill_points_used( u ) ),
282 stat_points_left( pure_stat_points
283 + std::min( 0, pure_trait_points
284 + std::min( 0, pure_skill_points ) ) ),
285 trait_points_left( pure_stat_points + pure_trait_points + std::min( 0, pure_skill_points ) ),
286 skill_points_left( pure_stat_points + pure_trait_points + pure_skill_points )
287 {}
288
289};
290
291static int skill_points_left( const avatar &u, pool_type pool )
292{
293 switch( pool ) {
294 case pool_type::MULTI_POOL: {
295 return multi_pool( u ).skill_points_left;
296 }
297 case pool_type::ONE_POOL: {
298 return point_pool_total() - points_used_total( u );
299 }
300 case pool_type::TRANSFER:
301 case pool_type::FREEFORM:
302 return 0;
303 }
304 return 0;
305}
306
307// Toggle this trait and all prereqs, removing upgrades on removal
308void Character::toggle_trait_deps( const trait_id &tr, const std::string &variant )
309{
310 static const int depth_max = 10;
311 const mutation_branch &mdata = tr.obj();
312 if( mdata.category.empty() || mdata.startingtrait ) {
313 toggle_trait( tr, variant );
314 } else if( !has_trait( tr ) ) {
315 int rc = 0;
316 while( !has_trait( tr ) && rc < depth_max ) {
317 const mutation_variant *chosen_var = variant.empty() ? nullptr : tr->variant( variant );
318 mutate_towards( tr, chosen_var );
319 rc++;
320 }
321 } else if( has_trait( tr ) ) {
322 for( const auto &addition : get_addition_traits( tr ) ) {
323 unset_mutation( addition );
324 }
325 for( const auto &lower : get_lower_traits( tr ) ) {
326 unset_mutation( lower );
327 }
328 unset_mutation( tr );
329 }
330 calc_mutation_levels();
331}
332
333static std::string pools_to_string( const avatar &u, pool_type pool )
334{
335 switch( pool ) {
336 case pool_type::MULTI_POOL: {
337 multi_pool p( u );
338 bool is_valid = p.stat_points_left >= 0 && p.trait_points_left >= 0 && p.skill_points_left >= 0;
339 return string_format(
340 _( "Points left: <color_%s>%d</color>%c<color_%s>%d</color>%c<color_%s>%d</color>=<color_%s>%d</color>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Points left: <color_%s>%d</color>%c<color_%s>%d</color>%c<color_%s>%d</color>=<color_%s>%d</color>"
) ) ),
341 p.stat_points_left >= 0 ? "light_gray" : "red", p.pure_stat_points,
342 p.pure_trait_points >= 0 ? '+' : '-',
343 p.trait_points_left >= 0 ? "light_gray" : "red", std::abs( p.pure_trait_points ),
344 p.pure_skill_points >= 0 ? '+' : '-',
345 p.skill_points_left >= 0 ? "light_gray" : "red", std::abs( p.pure_skill_points ),
346 is_valid ? "light_gray" : "red", p.skill_points_left );
347 }
348 case pool_type::ONE_POOL: {
349 return string_format( _( "Points left: %4d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Points left: %4d" ) ) ), point_pool_total() - points_used_total( u ) );
350 }
351 case pool_type::TRANSFER:
352 return _( "Character Transfer: No changes can be made." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Character Transfer: No changes can be made."
) ) );
353 case pool_type::FREEFORM:
354 return _( "Survivor" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Survivor" ) ) );
355 }
356 return "If you see this, this is a bug";
357}

366static void set_description( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &you, bool allow_reroll, pool_type );

368static std::optional<std::string> query_for_template_name();
369static void reset_scenario( avatar &u, const scenario *scen );
370
371void Character::pick_name( bool bUseDefault )
372{
373 if( bUseDefault && !get_option<std::string>( "DEF_CHAR_NAME" ).empty() ) {
374 name = get_option<std::string>( "DEF_CHAR_NAME" );
375 } else {
376 name = SNIPPET.expand( male ? "<male_full_name>" : "<female_full_name>" );
377 }
378}
379
380static matype_id choose_ma_style( const character_type type, const std::vector<matype_id> &styles,
381 const avatar &u )
382{
383 if( type == character_type::NOW || type == character_type::FULL_RANDOM ) {
384 return random_entry( styles );
385 }
386 if( styles.size() == 1 ) {
387 return styles.front();
388 }
389
390 input_context ctxt( "MELEE_STYLE_PICKER", keyboard_mode::keycode );
391 ctxt.register_action( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION" );
392
393 uilist menu;
394 menu.allow_cancel = false;
395 menu.text = string_format( _( "Select a style.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select a style.\n" "\n" "STR: <color_white>%d</color>, DEX: <color_white>%d</color>, "
"PER: <color_white>%d</color>, INT: <color_white>%d</color>\n"
"Press [<color_yellow>%s</color>] for more info.\n"
) ) )
396 "\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select a style.\n" "\n" "STR: <color_white>%d</color>, DEX: <color_white>%d</color>, "
"PER: <color_white>%d</color>, INT: <color_white>%d</color>\n"
"Press [<color_yellow>%s</color>] for more info.\n"
) ) )
397 "STR: <color_white>%d</color>, DEX: <color_white>%d</color>, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select a style.\n" "\n" "STR: <color_white>%d</color>, DEX: <color_white>%d</color>, "
"PER: <color_white>%d</color>, INT: <color_white>%d</color>\n"
"Press [<color_yellow>%s</color>] for more info.\n"
) ) )
398 "PER: <color_white>%d</color>, INT: <color_white>%d</color>\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select a style.\n" "\n" "STR: <color_white>%d</color>, DEX: <color_white>%d</color>, "
"PER: <color_white>%d</color>, INT: <color_white>%d</color>\n"
"Press [<color_yellow>%s</color>] for more info.\n"
) ) )
399 "Press [<color_yellow>%s</color>] for more info.\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select a style.\n" "\n" "STR: <color_white>%d</color>, DEX: <color_white>%d</color>, "
"PER: <color_white>%d</color>, INT: <color_white>%d</color>\n"
"Press [<color_yellow>%s</color>] for more info.\n"
) ) ),
400 u.get_str(), u.get_dex(), u.get_per(), u.get_int(),
401 ctxt.get_desc( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION" ) );
402 ma_style_callback callback( 0, styles );
403 menu.callback = &callback;
404 menu.input_category = "MELEE_STYLE_PICKER";
405 menu.additional_actions.emplace_back( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION", translation() );
406 menu.desc_enabled = true;
407
408 for( const matype_id &s : styles ) {
409 const martialart &style = s.obj();
410 menu.addentry_desc( style.name.translated(), style.description.translated() );
411 }
412 while( true ) {
413 menu.query( true );
414 const matype_id &selected = styles[menu.ret];
415 if( query_yn( string_format( _( "Use the %s style?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Use the %s style?" ) ) ), selected.obj().name ) ) ) {
416 return selected;
417 }
418 }
419}
420
421void avatar::randomize( const bool random_scenario, bool play_now )
422{
423 const int max_trait_points = get_option<int>( "MAX_TRAIT_POINTS" );
424 // Reset everything to the defaults to have a clean state.
425 *this = avatar();
426 bool gender_selection = one_in( 2 );
427 male = gender_selection;
428 outfit = gender_selection;
429 if( !MAP_SHARING::isSharing() ) {
430 play_now ? pick_name() : pick_name( true );
431 } else {
432 name = MAP_SHARING::getUsername();
433 }
434 randomize_height();
435 randomize_blood();
436 randomize_heartrate();
437 bool cities_enabled = world_generator->active_world->WORLD_OPTIONS["CITY_SIZE"].getValue() != "0";
438 if( random_scenario ) {
439 std::vector<const scenario *> scenarios;
440 for( const scenario &scen : scenario::get_all() ) {
441 if( !scen.has_flag( flag_CHALLENGE ) && !scen.scen_is_blacklisted() &&
442 ( !scen.has_flag( flag_CITY_START ) || cities_enabled ) && scen.can_pick().success() ) {
443 scenarios.emplace_back( &scen );
444 }
445 }
446 const scenario *selected_scenario = random_entry( scenarios );
447 if( selected_scenario ) {
448 set_scenario( selected_scenario );
449 } else {
450 debugmsg( "Failed randomizing sceario - no entries matching requirements." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/newcharacter.cpp"
, "450", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Failed randomizing sceario - no entries matching requirements."
);
451 }
452 }
453
454 prof = get_scenario()->weighted_random_profession();
455 init_age = rng( this->prof->age_lower, this->prof->age_upper );
456 starting_city = std::nullopt;
457 world_origin = std::nullopt;
458 random_start_location = true;
459
460 str_max = rng( 6, HIGH_STAT - 2 );
461 dex_max = rng( 6, HIGH_STAT - 2 );
462 int_max = rng( 6, HIGH_STAT - 2 );
463 per_max = rng( 6, HIGH_STAT - 2 );
464
465 set_body();
466 randomize_hobbies();
467
468 int num_gtraits = 0;
469 int num_btraits = 0;
470 int tries = 0;
471 add_traits(); // adds mandatory profession/scenario traits.
472 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
473 const mutation_branch &mut_info = mut.obj();
474 if( mut_info.profession ) {
475 continue;
476 }
477 // Scenario/profession traits do not cost any points, but they are counted toward
478 // the limit (MAX_TRAIT_POINTS)
479 if( mut_info.points >= 0 ) {
480 num_gtraits += mut_info.points;
481 } else {
482 num_btraits -= mut_info.points;
483 }
484 }
485
486 /* The loops variable is used to prevent the algorithm running in an infinite loop */
487 for( int loops = 0; loops <= 100000; loops++ ) {
488 multi_pool p( *this );
489 bool is_valid = p.stat_points_left >= 0 && p.trait_points_left >= 0 && p.skill_points_left >= 0;
490 if( is_valid && rng( -3, 20 ) <= p.skill_points_left ) {
491 break;
492 }
493 trait_id rn;
494 if( num_btraits < max_trait_points && one_in( 3 ) ) {
495 tries = 0;
496 do {
497 rn = random_bad_trait();
498 tries++;
499 } while( ( has_trait( rn ) || num_btraits - rn->points > max_trait_points ) &&
500 tries < 5 );
501
502 if( tries < 5 && !has_conflicting_trait( rn ) ) {
503 toggle_trait_deps( rn );
504 num_btraits -= rn->points;
505 }
506 } else {
507 switch( rng( 1, 4 ) ) {
508 case 1:
509 if( str_max > 5 ) {
510 str_max--;
511 }
512 break;
513 case 2:
514 if( dex_max > 5 ) {
515 dex_max--;
516 }
517 break;
518 case 3:
519 if( int_max > 5 ) {
520 int_max--;
521 }
522 break;
523 case 4:
524 if( per_max > 5 ) {
525 per_max--;
526 }
527 break;
528 }
529 }
530 }
531
532 for( int loops = 0;
533 has_unspent_points( *this ) && loops <= 100000;
534 loops++ ) {
535 multi_pool p( *this );
536 const bool allow_stats = p.stat_points_left > 0;
537 const bool allow_traits = p.trait_points_left > 0 && num_gtraits < max_trait_points;
538 int r = rng( 1, 9 );
539 trait_id rn;
540 switch( r ) {
541 case 1:
542 case 2:
543 case 3:
544 case 4:
545 if( allow_traits ) {
546 rn = random_good_trait();
547 const mutation_branch &mdata = rn.obj();
548 if( !has_trait( rn ) && p.trait_points_left >= mdata.points &&
549 num_gtraits + mdata.points <= max_trait_points && !has_conflicting_trait( rn ) ) {
550 toggle_trait_deps( rn );
551 num_gtraits += mdata.points;
552 }
553 break;
554 }
555 /* fallthrough */
556 case 5:
557 if( allow_stats ) {
558 switch( rng( 1, 4 ) ) {
559 case 1:
560 str_max++;
561 break;
562 case 2:
563 dex_max++;
564 break;
565 case 3:
566 int_max++;
567 break;
568 case 4:
569 per_max++;
570 break;
571 }
572 break;
573 }
574 /* fallthrough */
575 case 6:
576 case 7:
577 case 8:
578 case 9:
579 const skill_id aSkill = Skill::random_skill();
580 const int level = get_skill_level( aSkill );
581
582 if( level < p.skill_points_left && level < MAX_SKILL && loops > 10000 ) {
583 // For balance reasons, increasing a skill from level 0 gives you 1 extra level for free
584 set_skill_level( aSkill, ( level == 0 ? 2 : level + 1 ) );
585 }
586 break;
587 }
588 }
589
590 randomize_cosmetics();
591
592 // Restart cardio accumulator
593 reset_cardio_acc();
594}
595
596void avatar::randomize_cosmetics()
597{
598 randomize_cosmetic_trait( type_hair_style );
599 randomize_cosmetic_trait( type_skin_tone );
600 randomize_cosmetic_trait( type_eye_color );
601 //arbitrary 50% chance to add beard to male characters
602 if( male && one_in( 2 ) ) {
603 randomize_cosmetic_trait( type_facial_hair );
604 } else {
605 set_mutation( trait_FACIAL_HAIR_NONE );
606 }
607}
608
609void avatar::add_profession_items()
610{
611 // Our profession should not be a hobby
612 if( prof->is_hobby() ) {
613 return;
614 }
615
616 std::list<item> prof_items = prof->items( outfit, get_mutations() );
617
618 for( item &it : prof_items ) {
619 if( it.has_flag( STATIC( flag_id( "WET" ) )(([]()-> const auto &{ using ExprType = std::decay_t<
decltype(static_argument_identity( flag_id( "WET" ) ))>; using
CachedType = std::conditional_t<std::is_same_v<ExprType
, const char*>, std::string, ExprType>; static const CachedType
_cached_expr = static_argument_identity( flag_id( "WET" ) );
return _cached_expr; })()) ) ) {
620 it.active = true;
621 it.item_counter = 450; // Give it some time to dry off
622 }
623
624 // TODO: debugmsg if food that isn't a seed is inedible
625 if( it.has_flag( json_flag_no_auto_equip ) ) {
626 it.unset_flag( json_flag_no_auto_equip );
627 inv->push_back( it );
628 } else if( it.has_flag( json_flag_auto_wield ) ) {
629 it.unset_flag( json_flag_auto_wield );
630 if( !has_wield_conflicts( it ) ) {
631 wield( it );
632 } else {
633 inv->push_back( it );
634 }
635 } else if( it.is_armor() ) {
636 if( can_wear( it ).success() ) {
637 wear_item( it, false, false );
638 } else {
639 inv->push_back( it );
640 }
641 } else {
642 inv->push_back( it );
643 }
644
645 if( it.is_book() ) {
646 items_identified.insert( it.typeId() );
647 }
648 }
649
650 recalc_sight_limits();
651 calc_encumbrance();
652}
653
654static int calculate_cumulative_experience( int level )
655{
656 int sum = 0;
657
658 while( level > 0 ) {
659 sum += 10000 * level * level;
660 level--;
661 }
662
663 return sum;
664}
665
666bool avatar::create( character_type type, const std::string &tempname )
667{
668 set_wielded_item( item() );
669
670 prof = profession::generic();
671 set_scenario( scenario::generic() );
672
673 const bool interactive = type != character_type::NOW &&
674 type != character_type::FULL_RANDOM;
675
676 std::vector<std::string> character_tabs = {
677 _( "POINTS" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "POINTS" ) ) ),
678 _( "SCENARIO" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "SCENARIO" ) ) ),
679 _( "PROFESSION" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "PROFESSION" ) ) ),
680 //~ Not scenery/backdrop, but previous life up to this point
681 _( "BACKGROUND" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "BACKGROUND" ) ) ),
682 _( "STATS" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "STATS" ) ) ),
683 _( "TRAITS" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "TRAITS" ) ) ),
684 _( "SKILLS" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "SKILLS" ) ) ),
685 _( "DESCRIPTION" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "DESCRIPTION" ) ) ),
686 };
687 tab_manager tabs( character_tabs );
688
689 const std::string point_pool = get_option<std::string>( "CHARACTER_POINT_POOLS" );
690 pool_type pool = pool_type::FREEFORM;
691 if( point_pool == "multi_pool" ) {
692 // if using legacy multipool only set it to that
693 pool = pool_type::MULTI_POOL;
694 }
695
696 switch( type ) {
697 case character_type::CUSTOM:
698 randomize_cosmetics();
699 break;
700 case character_type::RANDOM:
701 //random scenario, default name if exist
702 randomize( true );
703 tabs.position.last();
704 break;
705 case character_type::NOW:
706 //default world, fixed scenario, random name
707 randomize( false, true );
708 break;
709 case character_type::FULL_RANDOM:
710 //default world, random scenario, random name
711 randomize( true, true );
712 break;
713 case character_type::TEMPLATE:
714 if( !load_template( tempname, /*out*/ pool ) ) {
715 return false;
716 }
717
718 // We want to prevent recipes known by the template from being applied to the
719 // new character. The recipe list will be rebuilt when entering the game.
720 // Except if it is a character transfer template
721 if( pool != pool_type::TRANSFER ) {
722 forget_all_recipes();
723 }
724 tabs.position.last();
725 break;
726 }
727
728 // Don't apply the default backgrounds on a template
729 if( type != character_type::TEMPLATE ) {
730 add_default_background();
731 }
732
733 auto nameExists = [&]( const std::string & name ) {
734 return world_generator->active_world->save_exists( save_t::from_save_id( name ) ) &&
735 !query_yn( _( "A save with the name '%s' already exists in this world.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "A save with the name '%s' already exists in this world.\n"
"Saving will overwrite the already existing character.\n\n" "Continue anyways?"
) ) )
736 "Saving will overwrite the already existing character.\n\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "A save with the name '%s' already exists in this world.\n"
"Saving will overwrite the already existing character.\n\n" "Continue anyways?"
) ) )
737 "Continue anyways?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "A save with the name '%s' already exists in this world.\n"
"Saving will overwrite the already existing character.\n\n" "Continue anyways?"
) ) ), name );
738 };
739 set_body();
740 const bool allow_reroll = type == character_type::RANDOM;
741 do {
742 if( !interactive ) {
743 // no window is created because "Play now" does not require any configuration
744 if( nameExists( name ) ) {
745 return false;
746 }
747
748 break;
749 }
750
751 if( pool == pool_type::TRANSFER ) {
752 tabs.position.last();
753 }
754
755 switch( tabs.position.cur_index() ) {
756 case 0:
757 set_points( tabs, *this, /*out*/ pool );
758 break;
759 case 1:
760 set_scenario( tabs, *this, pool );
761 break;
762 case 2:
763 set_profession( tabs, *this, pool );
764 break;
765 case 3:
766 set_hobbies( tabs, *this, pool );
767 break;
768 case 4:
769 set_stats( tabs, *this, pool );
770 break;
771 case 5:
772 set_traits( tabs, *this, pool );
773 break;
774 case 6:
775 set_skills( tabs, *this, pool );
776 break;
777 case 7:
778 set_description( tabs, *this, allow_reroll, pool );
779 break;
780 }
781
782 if( tabs.quit ) {
783 return false;
784 }
785 } while( !tabs.complete );
786
787 if( pool == pool_type::TRANSFER ) {
788 return true;
789 }
790
791 save_template( _( "Last Character" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Last Character" ) ) ), pool );
792
793 initialize( type );
794
795 return true;
796}
797
798void Character::set_skills_from_hobbies()
799{
800 // 2 for an average person
801 float catchup_modifier = 1.0f + ( 2.0f * get_int() + get_per() ) / 24.0f;
802 // 1.2 for an average person, always a bit higher than base amount
803 float knowledge_modifier = 1.0f + get_int() / 40.0f;
804 // Grab skills from hobbies and train
805 for( const profession *profession : hobbies ) {
806 for( const profession::StartingSkill &e : profession->skills() ) {
807 // Train our skill
808 const int skill_xp_bonus = calculate_cumulative_experience( e.second );
809 get_skill_level_object( e.first ).train( skill_xp_bonus, catchup_modifier,
810 knowledge_modifier, true );
811 }
812 }
813}
814
815void Character::set_proficiencies_from_hobbies()
816{
817 for( const profession *profession : hobbies ) {
818 for( const proficiency_id &proficiency : profession->proficiencies() ) {
819 // Do not duplicate proficiencies
820 if( !_proficiencies->has_learned( proficiency ) ) {
821 add_proficiency( proficiency );
822 }
823 }
824 }
825}
826
827void Character::initialize( bool learn_recipes )
828{
829 recalc_hp();
830
831 if( has_trait( trait_SMELLY ) ) {
832 scent = 800;
833 }
834 if( has_trait( trait_WEAKSCENT ) ) {
835 scent = 300;
836 }
837
838 set_wielded_item( item() );
839
840 // Grab skills from profession and increment level
841 // We want to do this before the recipes
842 for( const profession::StartingSkill &e : prof->skills() ) {
843 mod_skill_level( e.first, e.second );
844 }
845
846 set_skills_from_hobbies();
847
848 // setup staring bank money
849 cash = rng( -200000, 200000 );
850 randomize_heartrate();
851
852 //set stored kcal to a normal amount for your height
853 set_stored_kcal( get_healthy_kcal() );
854 if( has_trait( trait_XS ) ) {
855 set_stored_kcal( std::floor( get_stored_kcal() / 5 ) );
856 }
857 if( has_trait( trait_XXXL ) ) {
858 set_stored_kcal( std::floor( get_stored_kcal() * 5 ) );
859 }
860
861 if( learn_recipes ) {
862 for( const auto &e : recipe_dict ) {
863 const recipe &r = e.second;
864 if( !r.is_practice() && !r.has_flag( flag_SECRET ) && !knows_recipe( &r ) &&
865 has_recipe_requirements( r ) ) {
866 learn_recipe( &r );
867 }
868 }
869 }
870
871 std::vector<addiction> prof_addictions = prof->addictions();
872 for( const addiction &iter : prof_addictions ) {
873 addictions.push_back( iter );
874 }
875
876 for( const profession *profession : hobbies ) {
877 std::vector<addiction> hobby_addictions = profession->addictions();
878 for( const addiction &iter : hobby_addictions ) {
879 addictions.push_back( iter );
880 }
881 }
882
883 for( const bionic_id &bio : prof->CBMs() ) {
884 add_bionic( bio );
885 }
886 // Adjust current energy level to maximum
887 set_power_level( get_max_power_level() );
888
889 // Add profession proficiencies
890 for( const proficiency_id &pri : prof->proficiencies() ) {
891 add_proficiency( pri );
892 }
893
894 // Add profession recipes
895 for( const recipe_id &id : prof->recipes() ) {
896 const recipe &r = recipe_dictionary::get_craft( id->result() );
897 learn_recipe( &r );
898 }
899
900 // Add hobby proficiencies
901 set_proficiencies_from_hobbies();
902
903 // Activate some mutations right from the start.
904 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
905 const mutation_branch &branch = mut.obj();
906 if( branch.starts_active ) {
907 my_mutations[mut].powered = true;
908 }
909 }
910
911 // Ensure that persistent morale effects (e.g. Optimist) are present at the start.
912 apply_persistent_morale();
913
914 // Restart cardio accumulator
915 reset_cardio_acc();
916
917 recalc_speed_bonus();
918}
919
920void avatar::initialize( character_type type )
921{
922 this->as_character()->initialize();
923
924 for( const matype_id &ma : prof->ma_known() ) {
925 if( !martial_arts_data->has_martialart( ma ) ) {
926 martial_arts_data->add_martialart( ma );
927 }
928 }
929
930 if( !prof->ma_choices().empty() ) {
931 for( int i = 0; i < prof->ma_choice_amount; i++ ) {
932 std::vector<matype_id> styles;
933 for( const matype_id &ma : prof->ma_choices() ) {
934 if( !martial_arts_data->has_martialart( ma ) ) {
935 styles.push_back( ma );
936 }
937 }
938 if( !styles.empty() ) {
939 const matype_id ma_type = choose_ma_style( type, styles, *this );
940 martial_arts_data->add_martialart( ma_type );
941 } else {
942 break;
943 }
944 }
945 }
946
947 for( const trait_id &t : get_base_traits() ) {
948 std::vector<matype_id> styles;
949 for( const matype_id &s : t->initial_ma_styles ) {
950 if( !martial_arts_data->has_martialart( s ) ) {
951 styles.push_back( s );
952 }
953 }
954 if( !styles.empty() ) {
955 const matype_id ma_type = choose_ma_style( type, styles, *this );
956 martial_arts_data->add_martialart( ma_type );
957 }
958 }
959
960 // Select a random known style
961 std::vector<matype_id> selectable_styles = martial_arts_data->get_known_styles( false );
962 if( !selectable_styles.empty() ) {
963 std::vector<matype_id>::iterator it_max_priority = std::max_element( selectable_styles.begin(),
964 selectable_styles.end(), []( const matype_id & a, const matype_id & b ) {
965 return a->priority < b->priority;
966 } );
967 int max_priority = ( *it_max_priority )->priority;
968 selectable_styles.erase( std::remove_if( selectable_styles.begin(),
969 selectable_styles.end(), [max_priority]( const matype_id & style ) {
970 return style->priority != max_priority;
971 } ), selectable_styles.end() );
972 }
973 martial_arts_data->set_style( random_entry( selectable_styles, style_none ) );
974
975 for( const mtype_id &elem : prof->pets() ) {
976 starting_pets.push_back( elem );
977 }
978
979 if( get_scenario()->vehicle() != vproto_id::NULL_ID() ) {
980 starting_vehicle = get_scenario()->vehicle();
981 } else {
982 starting_vehicle = prof->vehicle();
983 }
984
985 prof->learn_spells( *this );
986
987 // Also learn spells from hobbies
988 for( const profession *profession : hobbies ) {
989 profession->learn_spells( *this );
990 }
991
992}
993
994static void draw_points( const catacurses::window &w, pool_type pool, const avatar &u,
995 int netPointCost = 0 )
996{
997 // Clear line (except borders)
998 mvwprintz( w, point( 2, 3 ), c_blackget_all_colors().get(def_c_black), std::string( getmaxx( w ) - 3, ' ' ) );
999 mvwprintz( w, point( 2, 4 ), c_blackget_all_colors().get(def_c_black), std::string( getmaxx( w ) - 3, ' ' ) );
1000 std::string points_msg = pools_to_string( u, pool );
1001 int pMsg_length = utf8_width( remove_color_tags( points_msg ), true );
1002 nc_color color = c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
1003 print_colored_text( w, point( 2, 3 ), color, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), points_msg );
1004 if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
1005 if( netPointCost > 0 ) {
1006 mvwprintz( w, point( pMsg_length + 2, 3 ), c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red), " (-%d)", std::abs( netPointCost ) );
1007 } else if( netPointCost < 0 ) {
1008 mvwprintz( w, point( pMsg_length + 2, 3 ), c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green), " (+%d)", std::abs( netPointCost ) );
1009 }
1010 }
1011 print_colored_text( w, point( 2, 4 ), color, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
1012 player_difficulty::getInstance().difficulty_to_string( u ) );
1013}
1014
1015template <class Compare>
1016static void draw_filter_and_sorting_indicators( const catacurses::window &w,
1017 const input_context &ctxt, const std::string_view filterstring, const Compare &sorter )
1018{
1019 const char *const sort_order = sorter.sort_by_points ? _( "default" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "default" ) ) ) : _( "name" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "name" ) ) );
1020 const std::string sorting_indicator = string_format( "[%1$s] %2$s: %3$s",
1021 colorize( ctxt.get_desc( "SORT" ), c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) ), _( "sort" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "sort" ) ) ),
1022 sort_order );
1023 const std::string filter_indicator =
1024 filterstring.empty()
1025 ? string_format( _( "[%s] filter" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "[%s] filter" ) ) ), colorize( ctxt.get_desc( "FILTER" ), c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) ) )
1026 : std::string( filterstring );
1027 nc_color current_color = BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
1028 print_colored_text( w, point( 2, getmaxy( w ) - 1 ), current_color, BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
1029 string_format( "<%1s>-<%2s>", sorting_indicator, filter_indicator ) );
1030}
1031
1032static const char *g_switch_msg( const avatar &u )
1033{
1034 return u.male ?
1035 //~ Gender switch message. 1s - change key name, 2s - profession name.
1036 _( "Identity: <color_magenta>%2$s</color> (<color_light_cyan>male</color>) (press <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to switch)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Identity: <color_magenta>%2$s</color> (<color_light_cyan>male</color>) (press <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to switch)"
) ) )
1037 :
1038 //~ Gender switch message. 1s - change key name, 2s - profession name.
1039 _( "Identity: <color_magenta>%2$s</color> (<color_pink>female</color>) (press <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to switch)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Identity: <color_magenta>%2$s</color> (<color_pink>female</color>) (press <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to switch)"
) ) );
1040}
1041
1042static const char *dress_switch_msg()
1043{
1044 return outfit ?
1045 //~ Outfit switch message. 1s - change key name.
1046 _( "Outfit: <color_light_cyan>male</color> (press <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Outfit: <color_light_cyan>male</color> (press <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change)"
) ) ) :
1047 //~ Outfit switch message. 1s - change key name.
1048 _( "Outfit: <color_pink>female</color> (press <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Outfit: <color_pink>female</color> (press <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change)"
) ) );
1049}
1050
1051void set_points( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type &pool )
1052{
1053 const int iSecondColumn = 31;
1054 const int iHeaderHeight = 6;
1055 // guessing most likely, but it doesn't matter, it will be recalculated if wrong
1056 int iHelpHeight = 3;
1057
1058 ui_adaptor ui;
1059 catacurses::window w;
1060 catacurses::window w_description;
1061 const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1062 const int freeWidth = TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH;
1063 isWide = freeWidth > 15;
1064 w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
1065 w_description = catacurses::newwin( TERMY - iHeaderHeight - iHelpHeight - 1,
1066 TERMX - iSecondColumn - 1, point( iSecondColumn, iHeaderHeight ) );
1067 ui.position_from_window( w );
1068 };
1069 init_windows( ui );
1070 ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
1071
1072 input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_POINTS" );
1073 tabs.set_up_tab_navigation( ctxt );
1074 ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
1075 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1076 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
1077
1078 const std::string point_pool = get_option<std::string>( "CHARACTER_POINT_POOLS" );
1079
1080 using point_limit_tuple = std::tuple<pool_type, std::string, std::string>;
1081 std::vector<point_limit_tuple> opts;
1082
1083 const point_limit_tuple multi_pool = std::make_tuple( pool_type::MULTI_POOL,
1084 _( "Legacy: Multiple pools" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Legacy: Multiple pools" ) ) ),
1085 _( "Stats, traits and skills have separate point pools.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stats, traits and skills have separate point pools.\n"
"Putting stat points into traits and skills is allowed and putting trait points into skills is allowed.\n"
"Scenarios and professions affect skill points.\n\n" "This is a legacy mode. Point totals are no longer balanced."
) ) )
1086 "Putting stat points into traits and skills is allowed and putting trait points into skills is allowed.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stats, traits and skills have separate point pools.\n"
"Putting stat points into traits and skills is allowed and putting trait points into skills is allowed.\n"
"Scenarios and professions affect skill points.\n\n" "This is a legacy mode. Point totals are no longer balanced."
) ) )
1087 "Scenarios and professions affect skill points.\n\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stats, traits and skills have separate point pools.\n"
"Putting stat points into traits and skills is allowed and putting trait points into skills is allowed.\n"
"Scenarios and professions affect skill points.\n\n" "This is a legacy mode. Point totals are no longer balanced."
) ) )
1088 "This is a legacy mode. Point totals are no longer balanced." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stats, traits and skills have separate point pools.\n"
"Putting stat points into traits and skills is allowed and putting trait points into skills is allowed.\n"
"Scenarios and professions affect skill points.\n\n" "This is a legacy mode. Point totals are no longer balanced."
) ) ) );
1089
1090 const point_limit_tuple one_pool = std::make_tuple( pool_type::ONE_POOL, _( "Legacy: Single pool" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Legacy: Single pool" ) ) ),
1091 _( "Stats, traits and skills share a single point pool.\n\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stats, traits and skills share a single point pool.\n\n"
"This is a legacy mode. Point totals are no longer balanced."
) ) )
1092 "This is a legacy mode. Point totals are no longer balanced." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stats, traits and skills share a single point pool.\n\n"
"This is a legacy mode. Point totals are no longer balanced."
) ) ) );
1093
1094 const point_limit_tuple freeform = std::make_tuple( pool_type::FREEFORM, _( "Survivor" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Survivor" ) ) ),
1095 _( "No point limits are enforced, create a character with the intention of telling a story or challenging yourself." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "No point limits are enforced, create a character with the intention of telling a story or challenging yourself."
) ) ) );
1096
1097 if( point_pool == "multi_pool" ) {
1098 opts = { { multi_pool } };
1099 } else if( point_pool == "story_teller" ) {
1100 opts = { { freeform } };
1101 } else {
1102 opts = { { freeform, multi_pool, one_pool } };
1103 }
1104
1105 int highlighted = 0;
1106
1107 ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1108 const std::string help_text =
1109 ( isWide ? string_format(
1110 _( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> or <color_light_green>%s</color> to select pool and "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to confirm selection.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to main menu."
) ) )
1111 "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> or <color_light_green>%s</color> to select pool and "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> or <color_light_green>%s</color> to select pool and "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to confirm selection.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to main menu."
) ) )
1112 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to confirm selection.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> or <color_light_green>%s</color> to select pool and "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to confirm selection.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to main menu."
) ) )
1113 "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> or <color_light_green>%s</color> to select pool and "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to confirm selection.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to main menu."
) ) )
1114 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to main menu." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> or <color_light_green>%s</color> to select pool and "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to confirm selection.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to main menu."
) ) ),
1115 ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ), ctxt.get_desc( "UP" ), ctxt.get_desc( "DOWN" ),
1116 ctxt.get_desc( "CONFIRM" ), ctxt.get_desc( "NEXT_TAB" ), ctxt.get_desc( "QUIT" ) )
1117 : string_format(
1118 _( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings."
) ) ),
1119 ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ) )
1120 );
1121 const int new_iHelpHeight = foldstring( help_text, getmaxx( w ) - 4 ).size();
1122 if( new_iHelpHeight != iHelpHeight ) {
1123 iHelpHeight = new_iHelpHeight;
1124 init_windows( ui );
1125 }
1126 werase( w );
1127 tabs.draw( w );
1128
1129 const auto &cur_opt = opts[highlighted];
1130
1131 draw_points( w, pool, u );
1132
1133 // Clear the bottom of the screen.
1134 werase( w_description );
1135
1136 const int opts_length = static_cast<int>( opts.size() );
1137 for( int i = 0; i < opts_length; i++ ) {
1138 nc_color color;
1139 if( pool == std::get<0>( opts[i] ) ) {
1140 color = highlighted == i ? hilite( c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) ) : c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green);
1141 } else {
1142 color = highlighted == i ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
1143 }
1144 const point opt_pos( 2, 6 + i );
1145 if( highlighted == i ) {
1146 ui.set_cursor( w, opt_pos );
1147 }
1148 mvwprintz( w, opt_pos, color, std::get<1>( opts[i] ) );
1149 }
1150
1151 fold_and_print( w_description, point_zero, getmaxx( w_description ),
1152 COL_SKILL_USEDget_all_colors().get(def_c_green), std::get<2>( cur_opt ) );
1153
1154 // Helptext points tab
1155 fold_and_print( w, point( 2, TERMY - foldstring( help_text, getmaxx( w ) - 4 ).size() - 1 ),
1156 getmaxx( w ) - 4, COL_NOTE_MINORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), help_text );
1157 wnoutrefresh( w );
1158 wnoutrefresh( w_description );
1159 } );
1160
1161 const int opts_length = static_cast<int>( opts.size() );
1162 do {
1163 ui_manager::redraw();
1164 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
1165 if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
1166 break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
1167 } else if( navigate_ui_list( action, highlighted, 1, opts_length, true ) ) {
1168 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1169 const auto &cur_opt = opts[highlighted];
1170 pool = std::get<0>( cur_opt );
1171 }
1172 } while( true );
1173}
1174
1175static std::string assemble_stat_details( avatar &u, const unsigned char sel )
1176{
1177 std::string description_str;
1178 switch( sel ) {
1179 case 0: {
1180 u.recalc_hp();
1181 u.set_stored_kcal( u.get_healthy_kcal() );
1182 description_str =
1183 string_format( _( "Base HP: %d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Base HP: %d" ) ) ), u.get_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "head" ) ) )
1184 + string_format( _( "\nCarry weight: %.1f %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nCarry weight: %.1f %s" ) )
), convert_weight( u.weight_capacity() ),
1185 weight_units() )
1186 + string_format( _( "\nResistance to knock down effect when hit: %.1f" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nResistance to knock down effect when hit: %.1f"
) ) ), u.stability_roll() )
1187 + string_format( _( "\nIntimidation skill: %i" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nIntimidation skill: %i" ) )
), u.intimidation() )
1188 + string_format( _( "\nMaximum oxygen: %i" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nMaximum oxygen: %i" ) ) ), u.get_oxygen_max() )
1189 + string_format( _( "\nShout volume: %i" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nShout volume: %i" ) ) ), u.get_shout_volume() )
1190 + string_format( _( "\nLifting strength: %i" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nLifting strength: %i" ) ) ), u.get_lift_str() )
1191 + string_format( _( "\nMove cost while swimming: %i" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nMove cost while swimming: %i"
) ) ), u.swim_speed() )
1192 + colorize(
1193 string_format( _( "\nBash damage bonus: %.1f" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nBash damage bonus: %.1f" )
) ), u.bonus_damage( false ) ),
1194 COL_STAT_BONUSget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) )
1195 + _( "\n\nAffects:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n\nAffects:" ) ) )
1196 + colorize(
1197 _( "\n- Throwing range, accuracy, and damage"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Throwing range, accuracy, and damage"
"\n- Reload speed for weapons using muscle power to reload" "\n- Pull strength of some mutations"
"\n- Resistance for being pulled or grabbed by some monsters"
"\n- Speed of corpses pulping" "\n- Speed and effectiveness of prying things open, chopping wood, and mining"
"\n- Chance of escaping grabs and traps" "\n- Power produced by muscle-powered vehicles"
"\n- Most aspects of melee combat" "\n- Effectiveness of smashing furniture or terrain"
"\n- Resistance to many diseases and poisons" "\n- Ability to drag heavy objects and grants bonus to speed when dragging them"
"\n- Ability to wield heavy weapons with one hand" "\n- Ability to manage gun recoil"
"\n- Duration of action of various drugs and alcohol" ) ) )
1198 "\n- Reload speed for weapons using muscle power to reload"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Throwing range, accuracy, and damage"
"\n- Reload speed for weapons using muscle power to reload" "\n- Pull strength of some mutations"
"\n- Resistance for being pulled or grabbed by some monsters"
"\n- Speed of corpses pulping" "\n- Speed and effectiveness of prying things open, chopping wood, and mining"
"\n- Chance of escaping grabs and traps" "\n- Power produced by muscle-powered vehicles"
"\n- Most aspects of melee combat" "\n- Effectiveness of smashing furniture or terrain"
"\n- Resistance to many diseases and poisons" "\n- Ability to drag heavy objects and grants bonus to speed when dragging them"
"\n- Ability to wield heavy weapons with one hand" "\n- Ability to manage gun recoil"
"\n- Duration of action of various drugs and alcohol" ) ) )
1199 "\n- Pull strength of some mutations"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Throwing range, accuracy, and damage"
"\n- Reload speed for weapons using muscle power to reload" "\n- Pull strength of some mutations"
"\n- Resistance for being pulled or grabbed by some monsters"
"\n- Speed of corpses pulping" "\n- Speed and effectiveness of prying things open, chopping wood, and mining"
"\n- Chance of escaping grabs and traps" "\n- Power produced by muscle-powered vehicles"
"\n- Most aspects of melee combat" "\n- Effectiveness of smashing furniture or terrain"
"\n- Resistance to many diseases and poisons" "\n- Ability to drag heavy objects and grants bonus to speed when dragging them"
"\n- Ability to wield heavy weapons with one hand" "\n- Ability to manage gun recoil"
"\n- Duration of action of various drugs and alcohol" ) ) )
1200 "\n- Resistance for being pulled or grabbed by some monsters"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Throwing range, accuracy, and damage"
"\n- Reload speed for weapons using muscle power to reload" "\n- Pull strength of some mutations"
"\n- Resistance for being pulled or grabbed by some monsters"
"\n- Speed of corpses pulping" "\n- Speed and effectiveness of prying things open, chopping wood, and mining"
"\n- Chance of escaping grabs and traps" "\n- Power produced by muscle-powered vehicles"
"\n- Most aspects of melee combat" "\n- Effectiveness of smashing furniture or terrain"
"\n- Resistance to many diseases and poisons" "\n- Ability to drag heavy objects and grants bonus to speed when dragging them"
"\n- Ability to wield heavy weapons with one hand" "\n- Ability to manage gun recoil"
"\n- Duration of action of various drugs and alcohol" ) ) )
1201 "\n- Speed of corpses pulping"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Throwing range, accuracy, and damage"
"\n- Reload speed for weapons using muscle power to reload" "\n- Pull strength of some mutations"
"\n- Resistance for being pulled or grabbed by some monsters"
"\n- Speed of corpses pulping" "\n- Speed and effectiveness of prying things open, chopping wood, and mining"
"\n- Chance of escaping grabs and traps" "\n- Power produced by muscle-powered vehicles"
"\n- Most aspects of melee combat" "\n- Effectiveness of smashing furniture or terrain"
"\n- Resistance to many diseases and poisons" "\n- Ability to drag heavy objects and grants bonus to speed when dragging them"
"\n- Ability to wield heavy weapons with one hand" "\n- Ability to manage gun recoil"
"\n- Duration of action of various drugs and alcohol" ) ) )
1202 "\n- Speed and effectiveness of prying things open, chopping wood, and mining"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Throwing range, accuracy, and damage"
"\n- Reload speed for weapons using muscle power to reload" "\n- Pull strength of some mutations"
"\n- Resistance for being pulled or grabbed by some monsters"
"\n- Speed of corpses pulping" "\n- Speed and effectiveness of prying things open, chopping wood, and mining"
"\n- Chance of escaping grabs and traps" "\n- Power produced by muscle-powered vehicles"
"\n- Most aspects of melee combat" "\n- Effectiveness of smashing furniture or terrain"
"\n- Resistance to many diseases and poisons" "\n- Ability to drag heavy objects and grants bonus to speed when dragging them"
"\n- Ability to wield heavy weapons with one hand" "\n- Ability to manage gun recoil"
"\n- Duration of action of various drugs and alcohol" ) ) )
1203 "\n- Chance of escaping grabs and traps"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Throwing range, accuracy, and damage"
"\n- Reload speed for weapons using muscle power to reload" "\n- Pull strength of some mutations"
"\n- Resistance for being pulled or grabbed by some monsters"
"\n- Speed of corpses pulping" "\n- Speed and effectiveness of prying things open, chopping wood, and mining"
"\n- Chance of escaping grabs and traps" "\n- Power produced by muscle-powered vehicles"
"\n- Most aspects of melee combat" "\n- Effectiveness of smashing furniture or terrain"
"\n- Resistance to many diseases and poisons" "\n- Ability to drag heavy objects and grants bonus to speed when dragging them"
"\n- Ability to wield heavy weapons with one hand" "\n- Ability to manage gun recoil"
"\n- Duration of action of various drugs and alcohol" ) ) )
1204 "\n- Power produced by muscle-powered vehicles"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Throwing range, accuracy, and damage"
"\n- Reload speed for weapons using muscle power to reload" "\n- Pull strength of some mutations"
"\n- Resistance for being pulled or grabbed by some monsters"
"\n- Speed of corpses pulping" "\n- Speed and effectiveness of prying things open, chopping wood, and mining"
"\n- Chance of escaping grabs and traps" "\n- Power produced by muscle-powered vehicles"
"\n- Most aspects of melee combat" "\n- Effectiveness of smashing furniture or terrain"
"\n- Resistance to many diseases and poisons" "\n- Ability to drag heavy objects and grants bonus to speed when dragging them"
"\n- Ability to wield heavy weapons with one hand" "\n- Ability to manage gun recoil"
"\n- Duration of action of various drugs and alcohol" ) ) )

1254
1255 case 2: {
1256 const int read_spd = u.read_speed();
1257 description_str =
1258 colorize( string_format( _( "Read times: %d%%" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Read times: %d%%" ) ) ), read_spd ),
1259 ( read_spd == 100 ? COL_STAT_NEUTRALget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) :
1260 ( read_spd < 100 ? COL_STAT_BONUSget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) : COL_STAT_PENALTYget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red) ) ) )
1261 + string_format( _( "\nPersuade/lie skill: %i" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPersuade/lie skill: %i" ) )
), u.persuade_skill() )

get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(

), u.get_int() ),
1263 COL_STAT_BONUSget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) )
1264 + _( "\n\nAffects:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n\nAffects:" ) ) )
1265 + colorize(
1266 _( "\n- Speed of 'catching up' practical experience to theoretical knowledge"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Speed of 'catching up' practical experience to theoretical knowledge"
"\n- Detection and disarming traps" "\n- Chance of success when installing bionics"
"\n- Chance of success when manipulating with gun modifications"
"\n- Chance to learn a recipe when crafting from a book" "\n- Chance to learn martial arts techniques when using CQB bionic"
"\n- Chance of hacking computers and card readers" "\n- Chance of successful robot reprogramming"
"\n- Chance of successful decrypting memory cards" "\n- Chance of bypassing vehicle security system"
"\n- Chance to get better results when disassembling items" "\n- Chance of being paralyzed by fear attack"
) ) )
1267 "\n- Detection and disarming traps"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Speed of 'catching up' practical experience to theoretical knowledge"
"\n- Detection and disarming traps" "\n- Chance of success when installing bionics"
"\n- Chance of success when manipulating with gun modifications"
"\n- Chance to learn a recipe when crafting from a book" "\n- Chance to learn martial arts techniques when using CQB bionic"
"\n- Chance of hacking computers and card readers" "\n- Chance of successful robot reprogramming"
"\n- Chance of successful decrypting memory cards" "\n- Chance of bypassing vehicle security system"
"\n- Chance to get better results when disassembling items" "\n- Chance of being paralyzed by fear attack"
) ) )
1268 "\n- Chance of success when installing bionics"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Speed of 'catching up' practical experience to theoretical knowledge"
"\n- Detection and disarming traps" "\n- Chance of success when installing bionics"
"\n- Chance of success when manipulating with gun modifications"
"\n- Chance to learn a recipe when crafting from a book" "\n- Chance to learn martial arts techniques when using CQB bionic"
"\n- Chance of hacking computers and card readers" "\n- Chance of successful robot reprogramming"
"\n- Chance of successful decrypting memory cards" "\n- Chance of bypassing vehicle security system"
"\n- Chance to get better results when disassembling items" "\n- Chance of being paralyzed by fear attack"
) ) )

"\n- Chance to learn a recipe when crafting from a book" "\n- Chance to learn martial arts techniques when using CQB bionic"

) ) )

"\n- Detection and disarming traps" "\n- Chance of success when installing bionics"
"\n- Chance of success when manipulating with gun modifications"
"\n- Chance to learn a recipe when crafting from a book" "\n- Chance to learn martial arts techniques when using CQB bionic"
"\n- Chance of hacking computers and card readers" "\n- Chance of successful robot reprogramming"

"\n- Chance to get better results when disassembling items" "\n- Chance of being paralyzed by fear attack"
) ) )
1277 "\n- Chance of being paralyzed by fear attack" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Speed of 'catching up' practical experience to theoretical knowledge"
"\n- Detection and disarming traps" "\n- Chance of success when installing bionics"
"\n- Chance of success when manipulating with gun modifications"
"\n- Chance to learn a recipe when crafting from a book" "\n- Chance to learn martial arts techniques when using CQB bionic"
"\n- Chance of hacking computers and card readers" "\n- Chance of successful robot reprogramming"
"\n- Chance of successful decrypting memory cards" "\n- Chance of bypassing vehicle security system"
"\n- Chance to get better results when disassembling items" "\n- Chance of being paralyzed by fear attack"
) ) ),
1278 c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) );
1279 }
1280 break;
1281
1282 case 3: {
1283 if( u.ranged_per_mod() > 0 ) {
1284 description_str =
1285 colorize( string_format( _( "Aiming penalty: -%d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Aiming penalty: -%d" ) ) ), u.ranged_per_mod() ),
1286 COL_STAT_PENALTYget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red) );
1287 }
1288 description_str +=
1289 string_format( _( "\nPersuade/lie skill: %i" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPersuade/lie skill: %i" ) )
), u.persuade_skill() )
1290 + _( "\n\nAffects:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n\nAffects:" ) ) )
1291 + colorize(
1292 _( "\n- Speed of 'catching up' practical experience to theoretical knowledge"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Speed of 'catching up' practical experience to theoretical knowledge"
"\n- Time needed for safe cracking" "\n- Sight distance on game map and overmap"
"\n- Effectiveness of stealing" "\n- Throwing accuracy" "\n- Chance of losing control of vehicle when driving"
"\n- Chance of spotting camouflaged creatures" "\n- Effectiveness of lockpicking"
"\n- Effectiveness of foraging" "\n- Precision when examining wounds and using first aid skill"
"\n- Detection and disarming traps" "\n- Morale bonus when playing a musical instrument"
"\n- Effectiveness of repairing and modifying clothes and armor"
"\n- Chance of critical hits in melee combat" ) ) )
1293 "\n- Time needed for safe cracking"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Speed of 'catching up' practical experience to theoretical knowledge"
"\n- Time needed for safe cracking" "\n- Sight distance on game map and overmap"
"\n- Effectiveness of stealing" "\n- Throwing accuracy" "\n- Chance of losing control of vehicle when driving"
"\n- Chance of spotting camouflaged creatures" "\n- Effectiveness of lockpicking"
"\n- Effectiveness of foraging" "\n- Precision when examining wounds and using first aid skill"
"\n- Detection and disarming traps" "\n- Morale bonus when playing a musical instrument"
"\n- Effectiveness of repairing and modifying clothes and armor"
"\n- Chance of critical hits in melee combat" ) ) )
1294 "\n- Sight distance on game map and overmap"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Speed of 'catching up' practical experience to theoretical knowledge"
"\n- Time needed for safe cracking" "\n- Sight distance on game map and overmap"
"\n- Effectiveness of stealing" "\n- Throwing accuracy" "\n- Chance of losing control of vehicle when driving"
"\n- Chance of spotting camouflaged creatures" "\n- Effectiveness of lockpicking"
"\n- Effectiveness of foraging" "\n- Precision when examining wounds and using first aid skill"
"\n- Detection and disarming traps" "\n- Morale bonus when playing a musical instrument"
"\n- Effectiveness of repairing and modifying clothes and armor"
"\n- Chance of critical hits in melee combat" ) ) )

get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(

"\n- Effectiveness of stealing" "\n- Throwing accuracy" "\n- Chance of losing control of vehicle when driving"

get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(

1304 "\n- Effectiveness of repairing and modifying clothes and armor"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Speed of 'catching up' practical experience to theoretical knowledge"
"\n- Time needed for safe cracking" "\n- Sight distance on game map and overmap"
"\n- Effectiveness of stealing" "\n- Throwing accuracy" "\n- Chance of losing control of vehicle when driving"
"\n- Chance of spotting camouflaged creatures" "\n- Effectiveness of lockpicking"
"\n- Effectiveness of foraging" "\n- Precision when examining wounds and using first aid skill"

"\n- Effectiveness of repairing and modifying clothes and armor"
"\n- Chance of critical hits in melee combat" ) ) )
1305 "\n- Chance of critical hits in melee combat" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n- Speed of 'catching up' practical experience to theoretical knowledge"
"\n- Time needed for safe cracking" "\n- Sight distance on game map and overmap"
"\n- Effectiveness of stealing" "\n- Throwing accuracy" "\n- Chance of losing control of vehicle when driving"
"\n- Chance of spotting camouflaged creatures" "\n- Effectiveness of lockpicking"
"\n- Effectiveness of foraging" "\n- Precision when examining wounds and using first aid skill"
"\n- Detection and disarming traps" "\n- Morale bonus when playing a musical instrument"
"\n- Effectiveness of repairing and modifying clothes and armor"
"\n- Chance of critical hits in melee combat" ) ) ),
1306 c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) );
1307 }
1308 break;
1309 }
1310 return description_str;
1311}
1312
1313static std::string assemble_stat_help( const input_context &ctxt )
1314{
1315 return string_format(
1316 _( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase stat or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) )
1317 "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select stat.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase stat or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) )
1318 "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase stat or "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase stat or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) )
1319 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease stat.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase stat or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) )
1320 "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase stat or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) )
1321 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase stat or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease stat.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) ),
1322 ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ), ctxt.get_desc( "UP" ), ctxt.get_desc( "DOWN" ),
1323 ctxt.get_desc( "RIGHT" ), ctxt.get_desc( "LEFT" ),
1324 ctxt.get_desc( "NEXT_TAB" ), ctxt.get_desc( "PREV_TAB" ) );
1325}
1326
1327/** Handle the stats tab of the character generation menu */
1328void set_stats( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type pool )
1329{
1330 // TODO: Move this out to a common header and eliminate other separate instances of these strings.
1331 static const std::array<translation, 4> stat_labels = { to_translation( "Strength" ), to_translation( "Dexterity" ), to_translation( "Intelligence" ), to_translation( "Perception" ) };
1332 const int max_stat_points = pool == pool_type::FREEFORM ? 20 : MAX_STAT;
1333 const int min_stat_points = 4;
1334
1335 unsigned char sel = 0;
1336
1337 int iSecondColumn;
1338 const int iHeaderHeight = 6;
1339 // guessing most likely, but it doesn't matter, it will be recalculated if wrong
1340 int iHelpHeight = 4;
1341
1342 ui_adaptor ui;
1343 catacurses::window w;
1344 catacurses::window w_details_pane;
1345 scrolling_text_view details( w_details_pane );
1346 bool details_recalc = true;
1347 const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1348 const int thirds = std::min( ( TERMX - 4 ) / 3, 38 ); // to allign scrollbar with the traits tab
1349 iSecondColumn = std::max( thirds, utf8_width( pools_to_string( u, pool ), true ) + 2 );
1350 const size_t iContentHeight = TERMY - iHeaderHeight - iHelpHeight - 1;
1351 w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
1352 w_details_pane = catacurses::newwin( iContentHeight, TERMX - iSecondColumn - 1,
1353 point( iSecondColumn, iHeaderHeight ) );
1354 details_recalc = true;
1355 ui.position_from_window( w );
1356 };
1357 init_windows( ui );
1358 ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
1359
1360 input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_STATS" );
1361 tabs.set_up_tab_navigation( ctxt );
1362 details.set_up_navigation( ctxt, scrolling_key_scheme::angle_bracket_scroll );
1363 ctxt.register_cardinal();
1364 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1365
1366 u.reset();
1367 std::array<int *, 4> stats = { &u.str_max, &u.dex_max, &u.int_max, &u.per_max };
1368
1369 ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1370 const std::string help_text = assemble_stat_help( ctxt );
1371 const int new_iHelpHeight = foldstring( help_text, getmaxx( w ) - 4 ).size();
1372 if( new_iHelpHeight != iHelpHeight ) {
1373 iHelpHeight = new_iHelpHeight;
1374 init_windows( ui );
1375 }
1376 werase( w );
1377 tabs.draw( w );
1378 mvwputch( w, point( iSecondColumn, iHeaderHeight - 1 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXXX4194423 ); // 'â¬'
1379 // Helptext stats tab
1380 fold_and_print( w, point( 2, TERMY - iHelpHeight - 1 ), getmaxx( w ) - 4, COL_NOTE_MINORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
1381 help_text );
1382
1383 const point opt_pos( 2, sel + iHeaderHeight );
1384 ui.set_cursor( w, opt_pos );
1385 for( int i = 0; i < 4; i++ ) {
1386 mvwprintz( w, point( 2, i + iHeaderHeight ), i == sel ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "%s:",
1387 stat_labels[i].translated() );
1388 mvwprintz( w, point( 16, i + iHeaderHeight ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "%2d", *stats[i] );
1389 }
1390
1391 draw_points( w, pool, u );
1392 const point desc_line = point( iSecondColumn, 3 );
1393 if( *stats[sel] <= min_stat_points ) {
1394 mvwprintz( w, desc_line, c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red),
1395 //~ %s - stat
1396 string_format( _( "%s cannot be further decreased" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s cannot be further decreased"
) ) ),
1397 stat_labels[sel].translated() ) );
1398 } else if( *stats[sel] >= max_stat_points ) {
1399 mvwprintz( w, desc_line, c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red),
1400 //~ %s - stat
1401 string_format( _( "%s cannot be further increased" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s cannot be further increased"
) ) ),
1402 stat_labels[sel].translated() ) );
1403 } else if( *stats[sel] >= HIGH_STAT && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
1404 mvwprintz( w, desc_line, c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red),
1405 //~ %s - stat
