1406 string_format( _( "Increasing %s further costs 2 points" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Increasing %s further costs 2 points"
) ) ),
1407 stat_labels[sel].translated() ) );
1408 }
1409
1410 u.reset_stats();
1411 u.set_stored_kcal( u.get_healthy_kcal() );
1412 u.reset_bonuses(); // Removes pollution of stats by modifications appearing inside reset_stats(). Is reset_stats() even necessary in this context?
1413 if( details_recalc ) {
1414 details.set_text( assemble_stat_details( u, sel ) );
1415 details_recalc = false;
1416 }
1417
1418 wnoutrefresh( w );
1419 details.draw( COL_STAT_NEUTRALget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) );
1420 } );
1421
1422 do {
1423 ui_manager::redraw();
1424 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
1425 const unsigned char id_for_curr_description = sel;
1426
1427 if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
1428 break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
1429 } else if( details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt ) ) {
1430 // NO FURTHER ACTION REQUIRED
1431 } else if( action == "LEFT" ) {
1432 if( *stats[sel] > min_stat_points ) {
1433 ( *stats[sel] )--;
1434 details_recalc = true;
1435 }
1436 } else if( action == "RIGHT" ) {
1437 if( *stats[sel] < max_stat_points ) {
1438 ( *stats[sel] )++;
1439 details_recalc = true;
1440 }
1441 } else if( action == "DOWN" ) {
1442 sel = ( sel + 1 ) % 4;
1443 } else if( action == "UP" ) {
1444 sel = ( sel + 3 ) % 4;
1445 }
1446 if( sel != id_for_curr_description ) {
1447 details_recalc = true;
1448 }
1449 } while( true );
1450}
1451
1452static struct {
1453 bool sort_by_points = false;
1454 /** @related player */
1455 bool operator()( const trait_and_var *a, const trait_and_var *b ) {
1456 return std::abs( a->trait->points ) > std::abs( b->trait->points );
1457 }
1458} traits_sorter;
1459
1460static void add_trait( std::vector<trait_and_var> &to, const trait_id &trait )
1461{
1462 if( trait->variants.empty() ) {
1463 to.emplace_back( trait, "" );
1464 return;
1465 }
1466 for( const std::pair<const std::string, mutation_variant> &var : trait->variants ) {
1467 to.emplace_back( trait, var.first );
1468 }
1469}
1470
1471void set_traits( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type pool )
1472{
1473 const int max_trait_points = get_option<int>( "MAX_TRAIT_POINTS" );
1474
1475 // Track how many good / bad POINTS we have; cap both at MAX_TRAIT_POINTS
1476 int num_good = 0;
1477 int num_bad = 0;
1478 // 0 -> traits that take points ( positive traits )
1479 // 1 -> traits that give points ( negative traits )
1480 // 2 -> neutral traits ( facial hair, skin color, etc )
1481 std::array<std::vector<trait_and_var>, 3> vStartingTraits;
1482
1483 for( const mutation_branch &traits_iter : mutation_branch::get_all() ) {
1484 // Don't list blacklisted traits
1485 if( mutation_branch::trait_is_blacklisted( traits_iter.id ) ) {
1486 continue;
1487 }
1488
1489 const std::set<trait_id> scentraits = get_scenario()->get_locked_traits();
1490 const bool is_scentrait = scentraits.find( traits_iter.id ) != scentraits.end();
1491
1492 // Always show profession locked traits, regardless of if they are forbidden
1493 const std::vector<trait_and_var> proftraits = u.prof->get_locked_traits();
1494 auto pred = [&traits_iter]( const trait_and_var & query ) {
1495 return query.trait == traits_iter.id;
1496 };
1497 const bool is_proftrait = std::find_if( proftraits.begin(), proftraits.end(),
1498 pred ) != proftraits.end();
1499
1500 bool is_hobby_locked_trait = false;
1501 for( const profession *hobby : u.hobbies ) {
1502 is_hobby_locked_trait = is_hobby_locked_trait || hobby->is_locked_trait( traits_iter.id );
1503 }
1504
1505 // We show all starting traits, even if we can't pick them, to keep the interface consistent.
1506 if( traits_iter.startingtrait || get_scenario()->traitquery( traits_iter.id ) || is_proftrait ||
1507 is_hobby_locked_trait ) {
1508 if( traits_iter.points > 0 ) {
1509 add_trait( vStartingTraits[0], traits_iter.id );
1510
1511 if( is_proftrait || is_scentrait ) {
1512 continue;
1513 }
1514
1515 if( u.has_trait( traits_iter.id ) ) {
1516 num_good += traits_iter.points;
1517 }
1518 } else if( traits_iter.points < 0 ) {
1519 add_trait( vStartingTraits[1], traits_iter.id );
1520
1521 if( is_proftrait || is_scentrait ) {
1522 continue;
1523 }
1524
1525 if( u.has_trait( traits_iter.id ) ) {
1526 num_bad += traits_iter.points;
1527 }
1528 } else {
1529 add_trait( vStartingTraits[2], traits_iter.id );
1530 }
1531 }
1532 }
1533 //If the third page is empty, only use the first two.
1534 const int used_pages = vStartingTraits[2].empty() ? 2 : 3;
1535
1536 for( auto &vStartingTrait : vStartingTraits ) {
1537 std::sort( vStartingTrait.begin(), vStartingTrait.end(), trait_display_nocolor_sort );
1538 }
1539
1540 int iCurWorkingPage = 0;
1541 std::array<int, 3> iStartPos = { 0, 0, 0 };
1542 std::array<int, 3> iCurrentLine = { 0, 0, 0 };
1543 std::array<size_t, 3> traits_size;
1544 bool recalc_traits = false;
1545 // pointer for memory footprint reasons
1546 std::array<std::vector<const trait_and_var *>, 3> sorted_traits;
1547 std::array<scrollbar, 3> trait_sbs;
1548 std::string filterstring;
1549
1550 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
1551 const size_t size = vStartingTraits[i].size();
1552 traits_size[i] = size;
1553 sorted_traits[i].reserve( size );
1554 for( size_t j = 0; j < size; j++ ) {
1555 sorted_traits[i].emplace_back( &vStartingTraits[i][j] );
1556 }
1557 }
1558
1559 const int iHeaderHeight = 6;
1560 const int iDetailHeight = 3;
1561 size_t iContentHeight = 0;
1562 size_t page_width = 0;
1563
1564 const auto pos_calc = [&]() {
1565 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
1566 // Shift start position to avoid iterating beyond end
1567 traits_size[i] = sorted_traits[i].size();
1568 int total = static_cast<int>( traits_size[i] );
1569 int height = static_cast<int>( iContentHeight );
1570 iStartPos[i] = std::min( iStartPos[i], std::max( 0, total - height ) );
1571 }
1572 };
1573
1574 // this will return the next non empty page
1575 // there will always be at least one non-empty page
1576 // iCurWorkingPage will always be a non-empty page
1577 const auto next_avail_page = [&traits_size, &iCurWorkingPage]( bool invert_direction ) -> int {
1578 int prev_page = iCurWorkingPage < 1 ? 2 : iCurWorkingPage - 1;
1579 if( !traits_size[prev_page] )
1580 {
1581 prev_page = prev_page < 1 ? 2 : prev_page - 1;
1582 if( !traits_size[prev_page] ) {
1583 prev_page = prev_page < 1 ? 2 : prev_page - 1;
1584 }
1585 }
1586
1587 int next_page = iCurWorkingPage > 1 ? 0 : iCurWorkingPage + 1;
1588 if( !traits_size[next_page] )
1589 {
1590 next_page = next_page > 1 ? 0 : next_page + 1;
1591 if( !traits_size[next_page] ) {
1592 next_page = next_page > 1 ? 0 : next_page + 1;
1593 }
1594 }
1595
1596 return invert_direction ? prev_page : next_page;
1597 };
1598
1599 ui_adaptor ui;
1600 catacurses::window w;
1601 catacurses::window w_details_pane;
1602 scrolling_text_view details( w_details_pane );
1603 bool details_recalc = true;
1604 const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1605 w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
1606 w_details_pane = catacurses::newwin( iDetailHeight, TERMX - 1,
1607 point( 0, TERMY - iDetailHeight - 1 ) );
1608 ui.position_from_window( w );
1609 page_width = std::min( ( TERMX - 4 ) / used_pages, 38 );
1610 iContentHeight = TERMY - iHeaderHeight - iDetailHeight - 1;
1611
1612 details_recalc = true;
1613 pos_calc();
1614 };
1615 init_windows( ui );
1616 ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
1617
1618 input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_TRAITS" );
1619 tabs.set_up_tab_navigation( ctxt );
1620 details.set_up_navigation( ctxt, scrolling_key_scheme::angle_bracket_scroll );
1621 for( scrollbar &sb : trait_sbs ) {
1622 sb.set_draggable( ctxt );
1623 }
1624 ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
1625 ctxt.register_leftright();
1626 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
1627 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1628 ctxt.register_action( "FILTER" );
1629 ctxt.register_action( "RESET_FILTER" );
1630 ctxt.register_action( "SORT" );
1631
1632 ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1633 werase( w );
1634
1635 tabs.draw( w );
1636 for( int i = 1; i < 3; ++i ) {
1637 mvwputch( w, point( i * page_width, iHeaderHeight - 1 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXXX4194423 ); // 'â¬'
1638 }
1639 draw_filter_and_sorting_indicators( w, ctxt, filterstring, traits_sorter );
1640 draw_points( w, pool, u );
1641 int full_string_length = 0;
1642 const int remaining_points_length = utf8_width( pools_to_string( u, pool ), true );
1643 if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
1644 std::string full_string =
1645 string_format( "<color_light_green>%2d/%-2d</color> <color_light_red>%3d/-%-2d</color>",
1646 num_good, max_trait_points, num_bad, max_trait_points );
1647 fold_and_print( w, point( remaining_points_length + 3, 3 ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white),
1648 full_string );
1649 full_string_length = utf8_width( full_string, true ) + remaining_points_length + 3;
1650 } else {
1651 full_string_length = remaining_points_length + 3;
1652 }
1653
1654 for( int iCurrentPage = 0; iCurrentPage < 3; iCurrentPage++ ) {
1655 nc_color col_on_act;
1656 nc_color col_off_act;
1657 nc_color col_on_pas;
1658 nc_color col_off_pas;
1659 nc_color col_tr;
1660 switch( iCurrentPage ) {
1661 case 0:
1662 col_on_act = COL_TR_GOOD_ON_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green);
1663 col_off_act = COL_TR_GOOD_OFF_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
1664 col_on_pas = COL_TR_GOOD_ON_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_green);
1665 col_off_pas = COL_TR_GOOD_OFF_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
1666 col_tr = COL_TR_GOODget_all_colors().get(def_c_green);
1667 break;
1668 case 1:
1669 col_on_act = COL_TR_BAD_ON_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red);
1670 col_off_act = COL_TR_BAD_OFF_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
1671 col_on_pas = COL_TR_BAD_ON_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
1672 col_off_pas = COL_TR_BAD_OFF_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
1673 col_tr = COL_TR_BADget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
1674 break;
1675 default:
1676 col_on_act = COL_TR_NEUT_ON_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
1677 col_off_act = COL_TR_NEUT_OFF_ACTget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
1678 col_on_pas = COL_TR_NEUT_ON_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown);
1679 col_off_pas = COL_TR_NEUT_OFF_PASget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
1680 col_tr = COL_TR_NEUTget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown);
1681 break;
1682 }
1683 nc_color hi_on = hilite( col_on_act );
1684 nc_color hi_off = hilite( c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) );
1685
1686 int &start = iStartPos[iCurrentPage];
1687 int current = iCurrentLine[iCurrentPage];
1688 calcStartPos( start, current, iContentHeight, traits_size[iCurrentPage] );
1689 int end = start + static_cast<int>( std::min( traits_size[iCurrentPage], iContentHeight ) );
1690
1691 for( int i = start; i < end; i++ ) {
1692 const trait_and_var &cursor = *sorted_traits[iCurrentPage][i];
1693 const trait_id &cur_trait = cursor.trait;
1694 if( current == i && iCurrentPage == iCurWorkingPage ) {
1695 int points = cur_trait->points;
1696 bool negativeTrait = points < 0;
1697 if( negativeTrait ) {
1698 points *= -1;
1699 }
1700 if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
1701 mvwprintz( w, point( full_string_length + 3, 3 ), col_tr,
1702 n_gettext( "%s %s %d point", "%s %s %d points", points ),
1703 cursor.name(),
1704 negativeTrait ? _( "earns" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "earns" ) ) ) : _( "costs" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "costs" ) ) ),
1705 points );
1706 }
1707 if( details_recalc ) {
1708 details.set_text( colorize( cursor.desc(), col_tr ) );
1709 details_recalc = false;
1710 }
1711 }
1712
1713 nc_color cLine = col_off_pas;
1714 if( iCurWorkingPage == iCurrentPage ) {
1715 cLine = col_off_act;
1716 if( current == i ) {
1717 cLine = hi_off;
1718 if( u.has_conflicting_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1719 cLine = hilite( c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray) );
1720 } else if( u.has_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1721 if( !cur_trait->variants.empty() && !u.has_trait_variant( cursor ) ) {
1722 cLine = hilite( c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray) );
1723 } else {
1724 cLine = hi_on;
1725 }
1726 }
1727 } else {
1728 if( u.has_conflicting_trait( cur_trait ) || get_scenario()->is_forbidden_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1729 cLine = c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
1730
1731 } else if( u.has_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1732 if( !cur_trait->variants.empty() && !u.has_trait_variant( cursor ) ) {
1733 cLine = c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
1734 } else {
1735 cLine = col_on_act;
1736 }
1737 }
1738 }
1739 } else if( u.has_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1740 cLine = col_on_pas;
1741
1742 } else if( u.has_conflicting_trait( cur_trait ) ||
1743 get_scenario()->is_forbidden_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1744 cLine = c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
1745 }
1746
1747 const int cur_line_y = iHeaderHeight + i - start;
1748 const int cur_line_x = 2 + iCurrentPage * page_width;
1749 const point opt_pos( cur_line_x, cur_line_y );
1750 if( iCurWorkingPage == iCurrentPage && current == i ) {
1751 ui.set_cursor( w, opt_pos );
1752 }
1753 mvwprintz( w, opt_pos, cLine,
1754 utf8_truncate( cursor.name(), page_width - 2 ) );
1755 }
1756
1757 trait_sbs[iCurrentPage].offset_x( page_width * iCurrentPage )
1758 .offset_y( iHeaderHeight )
1759 .content_size( traits_size[iCurrentPage] )
1760 .viewport_pos( start )
1761 .viewport_size( iContentHeight )
1762 .apply( w );
1763 }
1764
1765 wnoutrefresh( w );
1766 // color is never visible (COL_TR_NEUT), text is already colorized
1767 details.draw( COL_TR_NEUTget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown) );
1768 } );
1769
1770 do {
1771 if( recalc_traits ) {
1772 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
1773 const size_t size = vStartingTraits[i].size();
1774 sorted_traits[i].clear();
1775 for( size_t j = 0; j < size; j++ ) {
1776 sorted_traits[i].emplace_back( &vStartingTraits[i][j] );
1777 }
1778 }
1779
1780 if( !filterstring.empty() ) {
1781 for( std::vector<const trait_and_var *> &traits : sorted_traits ) {
1782 const auto new_end_iter = std::remove_if(
1783 traits.begin(),
1784 traits.end(),
1785 [&filterstring]( const trait_and_var * trait ) {
1786 return !lcmatch( trait->name(), filterstring );
1787 } );
1788
1789 traits.erase( new_end_iter, traits.end() );
1790 }
1791 }
1792
1793 if( !filterstring.empty() && sorted_traits[0].empty() && sorted_traits[1].empty() &&
1794 sorted_traits[2].empty() ) {
1795 popup( _( "Nothing found." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nothing found." ) ) ) ); // another case of black box in tiles
1796 filterstring.clear();
1797 continue;
1798 }
1799
1800 if( traits_sorter.sort_by_points ) {
1801 std::stable_sort( sorted_traits[0].begin(), sorted_traits[0].end(), traits_sorter );
1802 std::stable_sort( sorted_traits[1].begin(), sorted_traits[1].end(), traits_sorter );
1803 }
1804
1805 // Select the current page, if not empty
1806 // There should always be at least one not empty page
1807 iCurrentLine[0] = 0;
1808 iCurrentLine[1] = 0;
1809 iCurrentLine[2] = 0;
1810 if( sorted_traits[iCurWorkingPage].empty() ) {
1811 iCurWorkingPage = 0;
1812 if( !sorted_traits[0].empty() ) {
1813 iCurWorkingPage = 0;
1814 } else if( !sorted_traits[1].empty() ) {
1815 iCurWorkingPage = 1;
1816 } else if( !sorted_traits[2].empty() ) {
1817 iCurWorkingPage = 2;
1818 }
1819 }
1820
1821 pos_calc();
1822 recalc_traits = false;
1823 }
1824
1825 ui_manager::redraw();
1826 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
1827 std::array< int, 3> cur_sb_pos = iStartPos;
1828 bool scrollbar_handled = false;
1829 const int iPrevWorkingPage = iCurWorkingPage;
1830 const int iPrevLine = iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage];
1831 for( int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>( trait_sbs.size() ); ++i ) {
1832 if( trait_sbs[i].handle_dragging( action, ctxt.get_coordinates_text( catacurses::stdscr ),
1833 cur_sb_pos[i] ) ) {
1834 if( cur_sb_pos[i] != iStartPos[i] ) {
1835 iStartPos[i] = cur_sb_pos[i];
1836 iCurrentLine[i] = iStartPos[i] + ( iContentHeight - 1 ) / 2;
1837 }
1838 scrollbar_handled = true;
1839 }
1840 }
1841
1842 if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
1843 break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
1844 } else if( action == "LEFT" || action == "RIGHT" ) {
1845 iCurWorkingPage = next_avail_page( action == "LEFT" );
1846 } else if( scrollbar_handled
1847 || details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt )
1848 || navigate_ui_list( action, iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage], 10,
1849 traits_size[iCurWorkingPage], true ) ) {
1850 // No additional action required
1851 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1852 int inc_type = 0;
1853 const trait_id cur_trait = sorted_traits[iCurWorkingPage][iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage]]->trait;
1854 const std::string variant = sorted_traits[iCurWorkingPage][iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage]]->variant;
1855 const mutation_branch &mdata = cur_trait.obj();
1856
1857 // Look through the profession bionics, and see if any of them conflict with this trait
1858 std::vector<bionic_id> cbms_blocking_trait = bionics_cancelling_trait( u.prof->CBMs(), cur_trait );
1859 const std::unordered_set<trait_id> conflicting_traits = u.get_conflicting_traits( cur_trait );
1860
1861 if( u.has_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1862
1863 inc_type = -1;
1864
1865 if( get_scenario()->is_locked_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1866 inc_type = 0;
1867 popup( _( "Your scenario of %s prevents you from removing this trait." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your scenario of %s prevents you from removing this trait."
) ) ),
1868 get_scenario()->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1869 } else if( u.prof->is_locked_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1870 inc_type = 0;
1871 popup( _( "Your profession of %s prevents you from removing this trait." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your profession of %s prevents you from removing this trait."
) ) ),
1872 u.prof->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1873 }
1874 for( const profession *hobbies : u.hobbies ) {
1875 if( hobbies->is_locked_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1876 inc_type = 0;
1877 popup( _( "Your background of %s prevents you from removing this trait." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your background of %s prevents you from removing this trait."
) ) ),
1878 hobbies->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1879 }
1880 }
1881 // Switch variant
1882 if( !u.has_trait_variant( trait_and_var( cur_trait, variant ) ) ) {
1883 u.set_mut_variant( cur_trait, cur_trait->variant( variant ) );
1884 inc_type = 0;
1885 }
1886 } else if( !conflicting_traits.empty() ) {
1887 std::vector<std::string> conflict_names;
1888 conflict_names.reserve( conflicting_traits.size() );
1889 for( const trait_id &trait : conflicting_traits ) {
1890 conflict_names.emplace_back( u.mutation_name( trait ) );
1891 }
1892 popup( _( "You already picked some conflicting traits: %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You already picked some conflicting traits: %s."
) ) ),
1893 enumerate_as_string( conflict_names ) );
1894 } else if( get_scenario()->is_forbidden_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1895 popup( _( "The scenario you picked prevents you from taking this trait!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The scenario you picked prevents you from taking this trait!"
) ) ) );
1896 } else if( u.prof->is_forbidden_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1897 popup( _( "Your profession of %s prevents you from taking this trait." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your profession of %s prevents you from taking this trait."
) ) ),
1898 u.prof->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1899 } else if( !cbms_blocking_trait.empty() ) {
1900 // Grab a list of the names of the bionics that block this trait
1901 // So that the player know what is preventing them from taking it
1902 std::vector<std::string> conflict_names;
1903 conflict_names.reserve( cbms_blocking_trait.size() );
1904 for( const bionic_id &conflict : cbms_blocking_trait ) {
1905 conflict_names.emplace_back( conflict->name.translated() );
1906 }
1907 popup( _( "The following bionics prevent you from taking this trait: %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The following bionics prevent you from taking this trait: %s."
) ) ),
1908 enumerate_as_string( conflict_names ) );
1909 } else if( iCurWorkingPage == 0 && num_good + mdata.points >
1910 max_trait_points && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
1911 popup( n_gettext( "Sorry, but you can only take %d point of advantages.",
1912 "Sorry, but you can only take %d points of advantages.", max_trait_points ),
1913 max_trait_points );
1914
1915 } else if( iCurWorkingPage != 0 && num_bad + mdata.points <
1916 -max_trait_points && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
1917 popup( n_gettext( "Sorry, but you can only take %d point of disadvantages.",
1918 "Sorry, but you can only take %d points of disadvantages.", max_trait_points ),
1919 max_trait_points );
1920
1921 } else {
1922 inc_type = 1;
1923 }
1924
1925 //inc_type is either -1 or 1, so we can just multiply by it to invert
1926 if( inc_type != 0 ) {
1927 u.toggle_trait_deps( cur_trait, variant );
1928 if( iCurWorkingPage == 0 ) {
1929 num_good += mdata.points * inc_type;
1930 } else {
1931 num_bad += mdata.points * inc_type;
1932 }
1933 }
1934 } else if( action == "SORT" ) {
1935 traits_sorter.sort_by_points = !traits_sorter.sort_by_points;
1936 recalc_traits = true;
1937 } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
1938 string_input_popup()
1939 .title( _( "Search:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Search:" ) ) ) )
1940 .width( 10 )
1941 .description( _( "Search by trait name." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Search by trait name." ) ) ) )
1942 .edit( filterstring );
1943 recalc_traits = true;
1944 } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
1945 if( !filterstring.empty() ) {
1946 filterstring.clear();
1947 recalc_traits = true;
1948 }
1949 }
1950 if( iCurWorkingPage != iPrevWorkingPage || iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage] != iPrevLine ) {
1951 details_recalc = true;
1952 }
1953 } while( true );
1954}
1955
1956static struct {
1957 bool sort_by_points = true;
1958 bool male = false;
1959 /** @related player */
1960 bool operator()( const string_id<profession> &a, const string_id<profession> &b ) const {
1961 // The generic ("Unemployed") profession should be listed first.
1962 const profession *gen = profession::generic();
1963 if( &b.obj() == gen ) {
1964 return false;
1965 } else if( &a.obj() == gen ) {
1966 return true;
1967 }
1968
1969 if( !a->can_pick().success() && b->can_pick().success() ) {
1970 return false;
1971 }
1972
1973 if( a->can_pick().success() && !b->can_pick().success() ) {
1974 return true;
1975 }
1976
1977 if( sort_by_points ) {
1978 return a->point_cost() < b->point_cost();
1979 } else {
1980 return localized_compare( a->gender_appropriate_name( male ),
1981 b->gender_appropriate_name( male ) );
1982 }
1983 }
1984} profession_sorter;
1985
1986static std::string assemble_profession_details( const avatar &u, const input_context &ctxt,
1987 const std::vector<string_id<profession>> &sorted_profs, const int cur_id )
1988{
1989 std::string assembled;
1990
1991 // Display Origin
1992 const std::string mod_src = enumerate_as_string( sorted_profs[cur_id]->src, [](
1993 const std::pair<profession_id, mod_id> &source ) {
1994 return string_format( "'%s'", source.second->name() );
1995 }, enumeration_conjunction::arrow );
1996 assembled += string_format( _( "Origin: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Origin: %s" ) ) ), mod_src ) + "\n";
1997
1998 assembled += string_format( g_switch_msg( u ), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_GENDER" ),
1999 sorted_profs[cur_id]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) ) + "\n";
2000 assembled += string_format( dress_switch_msg(), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) ) + "\n";
2001
2002 if( sorted_profs[cur_id]->get_requirement().has_value() ) {
2003 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession requirements:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession requirements:" ) )
), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2004 assembled += string_format( _( "Complete \"%s\"\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Complete \"%s\"\n" ) ) ),
2005 sorted_profs[cur_id]->get_requirement().value()->name() );
2006 }
2007 //Profession story
2008 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession story:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession story:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2009 if( !sorted_profs[cur_id]->can_pick().success() ) {
2010 assembled += colorize( sorted_profs[cur_id]->can_pick().str(), c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) ) + "\n";
2011 }
2012 assembled += colorize( sorted_profs[cur_id]->description( u.male ), c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) ) + "\n";
2013
2014 // Profession addictions
2015 const auto prof_addictions = sorted_profs[cur_id]->addictions();
2016 if( !prof_addictions.empty() ) {
2017 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession addictions:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession addictions:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2018 for( const addiction &a : prof_addictions ) {
2019 const char *format = pgettext( "set_profession_addictions", "%1$s (%2$d)" );
2020 assembled += string_format( format, a.type->get_name().translated(), a.intensity ) + "\n";
2021 }
2022 }
2023
2024 // Profession traits
2025 const auto prof_traits = sorted_profs[cur_id]->get_locked_traits();
2026 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession traits:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession traits:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2027 if( prof_traits.empty() ) {
2028 assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_trait", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2029 } else {
2030 for( const trait_and_var &t : prof_traits ) {
2031 assembled += t.name() + "\n";
2032 }
2033 }
2034
2035 // Profession martial art styles
2036 const auto prof_ma_known = sorted_profs[cur_id]->ma_known();
2037 const auto prof_ma_choices = sorted_profs[cur_id]->ma_choices();
2038 int ma_amount = sorted_profs[cur_id]->ma_choice_amount;
2039 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession martial arts:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession martial arts:" ) )
), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2040 if( prof_ma_known.empty() && prof_ma_choices.empty() ) {
2041 assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_ma", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2042 } else {
2043 if( !prof_ma_known.empty() ) {
2044 assembled += colorize( _( "Known:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Known:" ) ) ), c_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_cyan) ) + "\n";
2045 for( const matype_id &ma : prof_ma_known ) {
2046 const martialart &style = ma.obj();
2047 assembled += style.name.translated() + "\n";
2048 }
2049 }
2050 if( !prof_ma_known.empty() && !prof_ma_choices.empty() ) {
2051 assembled += "\n";
2052 }
2053 if( !prof_ma_choices.empty() ) {
2054 assembled += colorize( string_format( _( "Choose %d:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Choose %d:" ) ) ), ma_amount ), c_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_cyan) ) + "\n";
2055 for( const matype_id &ma : prof_ma_choices ) {
2056 const martialart &style = ma.obj();
2057 assembled += style.name.translated() + "\n";
2058 }
2059 }
2060 }
2061
2062 // Profession skills
2063 const profession::StartingSkillList prof_skills = sorted_profs[cur_id]->skills();
2064 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession skills:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession skills:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2065 if( prof_skills.empty() ) {
2066 assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2067 } else {
2068 for( const auto &sl : prof_skills ) {
2069 const char *format = pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "%1$s (%2$d)" );
2070 assembled += string_format( format, sl.first.obj().name(), sl.second ) + "\n";
2071 }
2072 }
2073
2074 // Profession items
2075 const auto prof_items = sorted_profs[cur_id]->items( outfit, u.get_mutations() );
2076 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession items:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession items:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2077 if( prof_items.empty() ) {
2078 assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_item", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2079 } else {
2080 // TODO: If the item group is randomized *at all*, these will be different each time
2081 // and it won't match what you actually start with
2082 // TODO: Put like items together like the inventory does, so we don't have to scroll
2083 // through a list of a dozen forks.
2084 std::string assembled_wielded;
2085 std::string assembled_worn;
2086 std::string assembled_inventory;
2087 for( const item &it : prof_items ) {
2088 if( it.has_flag( json_flag_no_auto_equip ) ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
2089 assembled_inventory += it.display_name() + "\n";
2090 } else if( it.has_flag( json_flag_auto_wield ) ) {
2091 assembled_wielded += it.display_name() + "\n";
2092 } else if( it.is_armor() ) {
2093 assembled_worn += it.display_name() + "\n";
2094 } else {
2095 assembled_inventory += it.display_name() + "\n";
2096 }
2097 }
2098 assembled += colorize( _( "Wielded:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Wielded:" ) ) ), c_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_cyan) ) + "\n";
2099 assembled += !assembled_wielded.empty() ? assembled_wielded :
2100 pgettext( "set_profession_item_wielded",
2101 "None\n" );
2102 assembled += colorize( _( "Worn:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Worn:" ) ) ), c_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_cyan) ) + "\n";
2103 assembled += !assembled_worn.empty() ? assembled_worn : pgettext( "set_profession_item_worn",
2104 "None\n" );
2105 assembled += colorize( _( "Inventory:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Inventory:" ) ) ), c_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_cyan) ) + "\n";
2106 assembled += !assembled_inventory.empty() ? assembled_inventory :
2107 pgettext( "set_profession_item_inventory",
2108 "None\n" );
2109 }
2110
2111 // Profession bionics, active bionics shown first
2112 auto prof_CBMs = sorted_profs[cur_id]->CBMs();
2113
2114 if( !prof_CBMs.empty() ) {
2115 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession bionics:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession bionics:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2116 std::sort( std::begin( prof_CBMs ), std::end( prof_CBMs ), []( const bionic_id & a,
2117 const bionic_id & b ) {
2118 return a->activated && !b->activated;
2119 } );
2120 for( const auto &b : prof_CBMs ) {
2121 const bionic_data &cbm = b.obj();
2122 if( cbm.activated && cbm.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_TOGGLED ) ) {
2123 assembled += string_format( _( "%s (toggled)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s (toggled)" ) ) ), cbm.name ) + "\n";
2124 } else if( cbm.activated ) {
2125 assembled += string_format( _( "%s (activated)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s (activated)" ) ) ), cbm.name ) + "\n";
2126 } else {
2127 assembled += cbm.name + "\n";
2128 }
2129 }
2130 }
2131 // Proficiencies
2132 std::vector<proficiency_id> prof_proficiencies = sorted_profs[cur_id]->proficiencies();
2133 if( !prof_proficiencies.empty() ) {
2134 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession proficiencies:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession proficiencies:" )
) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2135 for( const proficiency_id &prof : prof_proficiencies ) {
2136 assembled += prof->name() + "\n";
2137 }
2138 }
2139 // Recipes
2140 std::vector<recipe_id> prof_recipe = sorted_profs[cur_id]->recipes();
2141 if( !prof_recipe.empty() ) {
2142 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession recipes:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession recipes:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2143 for( const recipe_id &prof : prof_recipe ) {
2144 assembled += prof->result_name() + "\n";
2145 }
2146 }
2147 // Profession pet
2148 if( !sorted_profs[cur_id]->pets().empty() ) {
2149 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession pets:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession pets:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2150 for( const auto &elem : sorted_profs[cur_id]->pets() ) {
2151 monster mon( elem );
2152 assembled += mon.get_name() + "\n";
2153 }
2154 }
2155 // Profession vehicle
2156 if( sorted_profs[cur_id]->vehicle() ) {
2157 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession vehicle:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession vehicle:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2158 vproto_id veh_id = sorted_profs[cur_id]->vehicle();
2159 assembled += veh_id->name.translated() + "\n";
2160 }
2161 // Profession spells
2162 if( !sorted_profs[cur_id]->spells().empty() ) {
2163 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession spells:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession spells:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2164 for( const std::pair<spell_id, int> spell_pair : sorted_profs[cur_id]->spells() ) {
2165 assembled += string_format( _( "%s level %d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s level %d" ) ) ), spell_pair.first->name, spell_pair.second ) + "\n";
2166 }
2167 }
2168 // Profession missions
2169 if( !sorted_profs[cur_id]->missions().empty() ) {
2170 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession missions:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession missions:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2171 for( mission_type_id mission_id : sorted_profs[cur_id]->missions() ) {
2172 assembled += mission_type::get( mission_id )->tname() + "\n";
2173 }
2174 }
2175 return assembled;
2176}
2177
2178/** Helper to filter and move the cursor in the hobby/profession lists */
2179template<typename T, typename S>
2180size_t filter_entries( avatar &u, int &cur_id, std::vector<T> &old_entries,
2181 std::vector<T> &new_entries, T chosen_entry,
2182 std::string filterstring, S sorter )
2183{
2184 T previously_highlighted = old_entries.empty() ? T() : old_entries[cur_id];
2185
2186 old_entries = new_entries;
2187
2188 // Filter the list of entries
2189 const auto new_end = std::remove_if( old_entries.begin(),
2190 old_entries.end(), [&]( const T & arg ) {
2191 return !lcmatch( arg->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ), filterstring );
2192 } );
2193 old_entries.erase( new_end, old_entries.end() );
2194
2195 if( old_entries.empty() ) {
2196 popup( _( "Nothing found." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nothing found." ) ) ) ); // another case of black box in tiles
2197 return 0; // tell caller to try again without a filterstring
2198 }
2199
2200 int entries_length = old_entries.size();
2201
2202 std::stable_sort( old_entries.begin(), old_entries.end(), sorter );
2203
2204 bool match = false;
2205
2206 // Put the cursor on the previously highlighted entry, if possible.
2207 for( int i = 0; i < entries_length; ++i ) {
2208 if( old_entries[i] == previously_highlighted ) {
2209 cur_id = i;
2210 match = true;
2211 break;
2212 }
2213 }
2214
2215 if( !match ) {
2216 // Pur the cursor on the currently chosen entry, if possible.
2217 for( int i = 0; i < entries_length; ++i ) {
2218 if( old_entries[i] == chosen_entry ) {
2219 cur_id = i;
2220 match = true;
2221 break;
2222 }
2223 }
2224 }
2225
2226 if( !match ) {
2227 cur_id = 0;
2228 }
2229
2230 return old_entries.size();
2231}
2232
2233/** Handle the profession tab of the character generation menu */
2234void set_profession( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type pool )
2235{
2236 int cur_id = 0;
2237 size_t iContentHeight = 0;
2238 int iStartPos = 0;
2239
2240 ui_adaptor ui;
2241 catacurses::window w;
2242 catacurses::window w_details_pane;
2243 scrolling_text_view details( w_details_pane );
2244 bool details_recalc = true;
2245 const int iHeaderHeight = 6;
2246 scrollbar list_sb;
2247 const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2248 iContentHeight = TERMY - iHeaderHeight - 1;
2249 w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
2250 w_details_pane = catacurses::newwin( iContentHeight, TERMX / 2 - 1, point( TERMX / 2,
2251 iHeaderHeight ) );
2252 details_recalc = true;
2253 ui.position_from_window( w );
2254 };
2255 init_windows( ui );
2256 ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
2257
2258 input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_PROFESSIONS" );
2259 tabs.set_up_tab_navigation( ctxt );
2260 details.set_up_navigation( ctxt, scrolling_key_scheme::angle_bracket_scroll );
2261 list_sb.set_draggable( ctxt );
2262 ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
2263 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
2264 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_GENDER" );
2265 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" );
2266 ctxt.register_action( "SORT" );
2267 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
2268 ctxt.register_action( "FILTER" );
2269 ctxt.register_action( "RESET_FILTER" );
2270 ctxt.register_action( "RANDOMIZE" );
2271
2272 bool recalc_profs = true;
2273 size_t profs_length = 0;
2274 std::string filterstring;
2275 std::vector<string_id<profession>> sorted_profs;
2276
2277 ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2278 werase( w );
2279 tabs.draw( w );
2280 mvwputch( w, point( TERMX / 2, iHeaderHeight - 1 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXXX4194423 ); // 'â¬'
2281 mvwputch( w, point( TERMX / 2, TERMY - 1 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XXOX4194422 ); // 'â´'
2282 draw_filter_and_sorting_indicators( w, ctxt, filterstring, profession_sorter );
2283
2284 const bool cur_id_is_valid = cur_id >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( cur_id ) < sorted_profs.size();
2285 if( cur_id_is_valid ) {
2286 if( details_recalc ) {
2287 details.set_text( assemble_profession_details( u, ctxt, sorted_profs, cur_id ) );
2288 details_recalc = false;
2289 }
2290
2291 int netPointCost = sorted_profs[cur_id]->point_cost() - u.prof->point_cost();
2292 ret_val<void> can_afford = sorted_profs[cur_id]->can_afford( u, skill_points_left( u, pool ) );
2293 ret_val<void> can_pick = sorted_profs[cur_id]->can_pick();
2294 int pointsForProf = sorted_profs[cur_id]->point_cost();
2295 bool negativeProf = pointsForProf < 0;
2296 if( negativeProf ) {
2297 pointsForProf *= -1;
2298 }
2299
2300 // Draw header.
2301 draw_points( w, pool, u, netPointCost );
2302 if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
2303 const char *prof_msg_temp;
2304 if( negativeProf ) {
2305 //~ 1s - profession name, 2d - current character points.
2306 prof_msg_temp = n_gettext( "Profession %1$s earns %2$d point",
2307 "Profession %1$s earns %2$d points",
2308 pointsForProf );
2309 } else {
2310 //~ 1s - profession name, 2d - current character points.
2311 prof_msg_temp = n_gettext( "Profession %1$s costs %2$d point",
2312 "Profession %1$s costs %2$d points",
2313 pointsForProf );
2314 }
2315
2316 int pMsg_length = utf8_width( remove_color_tags( pools_to_string( u, pool ) ) );
2317 mvwprintz( w, point( pMsg_length + 9, 3 ), can_afford.success() ? c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) : c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red),
2318 prof_msg_temp, sorted_profs[cur_id]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ), pointsForProf );
2319 }
2320 }
2321
2322 //Draw options
2323 calcStartPos( iStartPos, cur_id, iContentHeight, profs_length );
2324 const int end_pos = iStartPos + std::min( iContentHeight, profs_length );
2325 for( int i = iStartPos; i < end_pos; i++ ) {
2326 nc_color col;
2327 if( u.prof != &sorted_profs[i].obj() ) {
2328
2329 if( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_profs[i] == sorted_profs[cur_id] &&
2330 !sorted_profs[i]->can_pick().success() ) {
2331 col = h_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_h_dark_gray);
2332 } else if( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_profs[i] != sorted_profs[cur_id] &&
2333 !sorted_profs[i]->can_pick().success() ) {
2334 col = c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
2335 } else {
2336 col = ( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_profs[i] == sorted_profs[cur_id] ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
2337 }
2338 } else {
2339 col = ( cur_id_is_valid &&
2340 sorted_profs[i] == sorted_profs[cur_id] ? hilite( c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) ) : COL_SKILL_USEDget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) );
2341 }
2342 const point opt_pos( 2, iHeaderHeight + i - iStartPos );
2343 if( i == cur_id ) {
2344 ui.set_cursor( w, opt_pos );
2345 }
2346 mvwprintz( w, opt_pos, col,
2347 sorted_profs[i]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
2348 }
2349
2350 list_sb.offset_x( 0 )
2351 .offset_y( iHeaderHeight )
2352 .content_size( profs_length )
2353 .viewport_pos( iStartPos )
2354 .viewport_size( iContentHeight )
2355 .apply( w );
2356
2357 wnoutrefresh( w );
2358 details.draw( c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
2359 } );
2360
2361 do {
2362 if( recalc_profs ) {
2363 std::vector<profession_id> new_profs = get_scenario()->permitted_professions();
2364 profession_sorter.male = u.male;
2365 if( ( profs_length = filter_entries( u, cur_id, sorted_profs, new_profs, u.prof->ident(),
2366 filterstring,
2367 profession_sorter ) ) == 0 ) {
2368 filterstring.clear();
2369 continue;
2370 }
2371 recalc_profs = false;
2372 }
2373
2374 ui_manager::redraw();
2375 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
2376 const int recmax = profs_length;
2377 const int scroll_rate = recmax > 20 ? 10 : 2;
2378 const int id_for_curr_description = cur_id;
2379 int scrollbar_pos = iStartPos;
2380
2381 if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
2382 break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
2383 } else if( details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt )
2384 || navigate_ui_list( action, cur_id, scroll_rate, recmax, true ) ) {
2385 // NO FURTHER ACTION REQUIRED
2386 } else if( list_sb.handle_dragging( action, ctxt.get_coordinates_text( catacurses::stdscr ),
2387 scrollbar_pos ) ) {
2388 if( scrollbar_pos != iStartPos ) {
2389 iStartPos = scrollbar_pos;
2390 cur_id = iStartPos + ( iContentHeight - 1 ) / 2;
2391 }
2392 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
2393 ret_val<void> can_pick = sorted_profs[cur_id]->can_pick();
2394
2395 if( !can_pick.success() ) {
2396 popup( can_pick.str() );
2397 continue;
2398 }
2399
2400 // Remove traits from the previous profession
2401 for( const trait_and_var &old : u.prof->get_locked_traits() ) {
2402 u.toggle_trait_deps( old.trait );
2403 }
2404
2405 u.prof = &sorted_profs[cur_id].obj();
2406
2407 // Remove pre-selected traits that conflict
2408 // with the new profession's traits
2409 for( const trait_and_var &new_trait : u.prof->get_locked_traits() ) {
2410 if( u.has_conflicting_trait( new_trait.trait ) ) {
2411 for( const trait_id &suspect_trait : u.get_mutations() ) {
2412 if( are_conflicting_traits( new_trait.trait, suspect_trait ) ) {
2413 popup( _( "Your trait %1$s has been removed since it conflicts with the %2$s's %3$s trait." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your trait %1$s has been removed since it conflicts with the %2$s's %3$s trait."
) ) ),
2414 u.mutation_name( suspect_trait ), u.prof->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ), new_trait.name() );
2415 u.toggle_trait_deps( suspect_trait );
2416 }
2417 }
2418 }
2419 }
2420 // Add traits for the new profession (and perhaps scenario, if, for example,
2421 // both the scenario and old profession require the same trait)
2422 u.add_traits();
2423 } else if( action == "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) {
2424 outfit = !outfit;
2425 recalc_profs = true;
2426 } else if( action == "CHANGE_GENDER" ) {
2427 u.male = !u.male;
2428 profession_sorter.male = u.male;
2429 if( !profession_sorter.sort_by_points ) {
2430 std::sort( sorted_profs.begin(), sorted_profs.end(), profession_sorter );
2431 }
2432 recalc_profs = true;
2433 } else if( action == "SORT" ) {
2434 profession_sorter.sort_by_points = !profession_sorter.sort_by_points;
2435 recalc_profs = true;
2436 } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
2437 string_input_popup()
2438 .title( _( "Search:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Search:" ) ) ) )
2439 .width( 60 )
2440 .description( _( "Search by profession name." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Search by profession name." )
) ) )
2441 .edit( filterstring );
2442 recalc_profs = true;
2443 } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
2444 if( !filterstring.empty() ) {
2445 filterstring.clear();
2446 recalc_profs = true;
2447 }
2448 } else if( action == "RANDOMIZE" ) {
2449 cur_id = rng( 0, profs_length - 1 );
2450 }
2451 if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description || recalc_profs ) {
2452 details_recalc = true;
2453 }
2454
2455 } while( true );
2456}
2457
2458static std::string assemble_hobby_details( const avatar &u, const input_context &ctxt,
2459 const std::vector<string_id<profession>> &sorted_hobbies, const int cur_id )
2460{
2461 std::string assembled;
2462
2463 assembled += string_format( g_switch_msg( u ), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_GENDER" ),
2464 sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->gender_appropriate_name( !u.male ) ) + "\n";
2465 assembled += string_format( dress_switch_msg(), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) ) + "\n";
2466
2467 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background story:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Background story:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2468 assembled += colorize( sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->description( u.male ), c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) ) + "\n";
2469
2470 // Background addictions
2471 const auto prof_addictions = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->addictions();
2472 if( !prof_addictions.empty() ) {
2473 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background addictions:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Background addictions:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2474 for( const addiction &a : prof_addictions ) {
2475 const char *format = pgettext( "set_profession_addictions", "%1$s (%2$d)" );
2476 assembled += string_format( format, a.type->get_name().translated(), a.intensity ) + "\n";
2477 }
2478 }
2479
2480 // Background traits
2481 const auto prof_traits = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->get_locked_traits();
2482 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background traits:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Background traits:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2483 if( prof_traits.empty() ) {
2484 assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_trait", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2485 } else {
2486 for( const trait_and_var &t : prof_traits ) {
2487 assembled += t.name() + "\n";
2488 }
2489 }
2490
2491 // Background skills
2492 const profession::StartingSkillList prof_skills = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->skills();
2493 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background skill experience:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Background skill experience:"
) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2494 if( prof_skills.empty() ) {
2495 assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2496 } else {
2497 for( const auto &sl : prof_skills ) {
2498 const Skill &skill = sl.first.obj();
2499 const int level = sl.second;
2500 if( level < 1 ) {
2501 debugmsg( "Unexpected skill level for %s: %d", skill.ident().str(), level )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/newcharacter.cpp"
, "2501", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Unexpected skill level for %s: %d"
, skill.ident().str(), level);
2502 continue;
2503 }
2504 std::string skill_degree;
2505 if( level == 1 ) {
2506 skill_degree = pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "beginner" );
2507 } else if( level == 2 ) {
2508 skill_degree = pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "intermediate" );
2509 } else if( level == 3 ) {
2510 skill_degree = pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "competent" );
2511 } else {
2512 skill_degree = pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "advanced" );
2513 }
2514 assembled += string_format( "%s (%s)", skill.name(), skill_degree ) + "\n";
2515 }
2516 }
2517
2518 // Background Proficiencies
2519 std::vector<proficiency_id> prof_proficiencies = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->proficiencies();
2520 if( !prof_proficiencies.empty() ) {
2521 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background proficiencies:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Background proficiencies:" )
) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2522 for( const proficiency_id &prof : prof_proficiencies ) {
2523 assembled += prof->name() + ": " + colorize( prof->description(), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2524 }
2525 }
2526
2527 // Background spells
2528 if( !sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->spells().empty() ) {
2529 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background spells:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Background spells:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2530 for( const std::pair<spell_id, int> spell_pair : sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->spells() ) {
2531 assembled += string_format( _( "%s level %d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s level %d" ) ) ), spell_pair.first->name, spell_pair.second ) + "\n";
2532 }
2533 }
2534
2535 // Background missions
2536 if( !sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->missions().empty() ) {
2537 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background missions:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Background missions:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
2538 for( mission_type_id mission_id : sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->missions() ) {
2539 assembled += mission_type::get( mission_id )->tname() + "\n";
2540 }
2541 }
2542
2543 return assembled;
2544}
2545
2546/** Handle the hobbies tab of the character generation menu */
2547void set_hobbies( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type pool )
2548{
2549 int cur_id = 0;
2550 size_t iContentHeight = 0;
2551 int iStartPos = 0;
2552
2553 ui_adaptor ui;
2554 catacurses::window w;
2555 catacurses::window w_details_pane;
2556 scrolling_text_view details( w_details_pane );
2557 bool details_recalc = true;
2558 const int iHeaderHeight = 6;
2559 scrollbar list_sb;
2560
2561 const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2562 iContentHeight = TERMY - iHeaderHeight - 1;
2563 w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
2564 w_details_pane = catacurses::newwin( iContentHeight, TERMX / 2 - 1, point( TERMX / 2,
2565 iHeaderHeight ) );
2566 details_recalc = true;
2567 ui.position_from_window( w );
2568 };
2569 init_windows( ui );
2570 ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
2571
2572 input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_PROFESSIONS" );
2573 tabs.set_up_tab_navigation( ctxt );
2574 details.set_up_navigation( ctxt, scrolling_key_scheme::angle_bracket_scroll );
2575 list_sb.set_draggable( ctxt );
2576 ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
2577 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
2578 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_GENDER" );
2579 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" );
2580 ctxt.register_action( "SORT" );
2581 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
2582 ctxt.register_action( "FILTER" );
2583 ctxt.register_action( "RESET_FILTER" );
2584 ctxt.register_action( "RANDOMIZE" );
2585
2586 bool recalc_hobbies = true;
2587 size_t hobbies_length = 0;
2588 std::string filterstring;
2589 std::vector<string_id<profession>> sorted_hobbies;
2590
2591 ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2592 werase( w );
2593 tabs.draw( w );
2594 mvwputch( w, point( TERMX / 2, iHeaderHeight - 1 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXXX4194423 ); // 'â¬'
2595 mvwputch( w, point( TERMX / 2, TERMY - 1 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XXOX4194422 ); // 'â´'
2596 draw_filter_and_sorting_indicators( w, ctxt, filterstring, profession_sorter );
2597
2598 const bool cur_id_is_valid = cur_id >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( cur_id ) < sorted_hobbies.size();
2599 if( cur_id_is_valid ) {
2600 if( details_recalc ) {
2601 details.set_text( assemble_hobby_details( u, ctxt, sorted_hobbies, cur_id ) );
2602 details_recalc = false;
2603 }
2604 int netPointCost = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->point_cost() - u.prof->point_cost();
2605 ret_val<void> can_pick = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->can_afford( u, skill_points_left( u, pool ) );
2606 int pointsForProf = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->point_cost();
2607 bool negativeProf = pointsForProf < 0;
2608 if( negativeProf ) {
2609 pointsForProf *= -1;
2610 }
2611
2612 // Draw header.
2613 draw_points( w, pool, u, netPointCost );
2614 if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
2615 const char *prof_msg_temp;
2616 if( negativeProf ) {
2617 //~ 1s - profession name, 2d - current character points.
2618 prof_msg_temp = n_gettext( "Background %1$s earns %2$d point",
2619 "Background %1$s earns %2$d points",
2620 pointsForProf );
2621 } else {
2622 //~ 1s - profession name, 2d - current character points.
2623 prof_msg_temp = n_gettext( "Background %1$s costs %2$d point",
2624 "Background %1$s costs %2$d points",
2625 pointsForProf );
2626 }
2627
2628 int pMsg_length = utf8_width( remove_color_tags( pools_to_string( u, pool ) ) );
2629 mvwprintz( w, point( pMsg_length + 9, 3 ), can_pick.success() ? c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) : c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red),
2630 prof_msg_temp, sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ), pointsForProf );
2631 }
2632 }
2633
2634 //Draw options
2635 calcStartPos( iStartPos, cur_id, iContentHeight, hobbies_length );
2636 const int end_pos = iStartPos + std::min( iContentHeight, hobbies_length );
2637 for( int i = iStartPos; i < end_pos; i++ ) {
2638 nc_color col;
2639 if( u.hobbies.count( &sorted_hobbies[i].obj() ) != 0 ) {
2640 col = ( cur_id_is_valid &&
2641 sorted_hobbies[i] == sorted_hobbies[cur_id] ? hilite( c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) ) : COL_SKILL_USEDget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) );
2642 } else {
2643 col = ( cur_id_is_valid &&
2644 sorted_hobbies[i] == sorted_hobbies[cur_id] ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
2645 }
2646
2647 const point opt_pos( 2, iHeaderHeight + i - iStartPos );
2648 if( i == cur_id ) {
2649 ui.set_cursor( w, opt_pos );
2650 }
2651 mvwprintz( w, opt_pos, col,
2652 sorted_hobbies[i]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
2653 }
2654
2655 list_sb.offset_x( 0 )
2656 .offset_y( 6 )
2657 .content_size( hobbies_length )
2658 .viewport_pos( iStartPos )
2659 .viewport_size( iContentHeight )
2660 .apply( w );
2661
2662 wnoutrefresh( w );
2663 details.draw( c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
2664 } );
2665
2666 do {
2667 if( recalc_hobbies ) {
2668 std::vector<profession_id> new_hobbies = get_scenario()->permitted_hobbies();
2669 new_hobbies.erase( std::remove_if( new_hobbies.begin(), new_hobbies.end(),
2670 [&u]( const string_id<profession> &hobby ) {
2671 return !u.prof->allows_hobby( hobby );
2672 } ), new_hobbies.end() );
2673 if( new_hobbies.empty() ) {
2674 debugmsg( "Why would you blacklist all hobbies?" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/newcharacter.cpp"
, "2674", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Why would you blacklist all hobbies?"
);
2675 new_hobbies = profession::get_all_hobbies();
2676 }
2677 profession_sorter.male = u.male;
2678 if( ( hobbies_length = filter_entries( u, cur_id, sorted_hobbies, new_hobbies,
2679 u.hobbies.empty() ? string_id<profession>() : ( *u.hobbies.begin() )->ident(), filterstring,
2680 profession_sorter ) ) == 0 ) {
2681 filterstring.clear();
2682 continue;
2683 }
2684 recalc_hobbies = false;
2685 }
2686
2687 ui_manager::redraw();
2688 const int id_for_curr_description = cur_id;
2689 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
2690 const int recmax = hobbies_length;
2691 const int scroll_rate = recmax > 20 ? 10 : 2;
2692 int scrollbar_pos = iStartPos;
2693
2694 if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
2695 break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
2696 } else if( details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt )
2697 || navigate_ui_list( action, cur_id, scroll_rate, recmax, true ) ) {
2698 // NO FURTHER ACTION REQUIRED
2699 } else if( list_sb.handle_dragging( action, ctxt.get_coordinates_text( catacurses::stdscr ),
2700 scrollbar_pos ) ) {
2701 if( scrollbar_pos != iStartPos ) {
2702 iStartPos = scrollbar_pos;
2703 cur_id = iStartPos + ( iContentHeight - 1 ) / 2;
2704 }
2705 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
2706 // Do not allow selection of hobby if there's a trait conflict
2707 const profession *hobb = &sorted_hobbies[cur_id].obj();
2708 bool conflict_found = false;
2709 for( const trait_and_var &new_trait : hobb->get_locked_traits() ) {
2710 if( u.has_conflicting_trait( new_trait.trait ) ) {
2711 for( const profession *hobby : u.hobbies ) {
2712 for( const trait_and_var &suspect : hobby->get_locked_traits() ) {
2713 if( are_conflicting_traits( new_trait.trait, suspect.trait ) ) {
2714 conflict_found = true;
2715 popup( _( "The trait [%1$s] conflicts with background [%2$s]'s trait [%3$s]." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The trait [%1$s] conflicts with background [%2$s]'s trait [%3$s]."
) ) ), new_trait.name(),
2716 hobby->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ), suspect.name() );
2717 }
2718 }
2719 }
2720 }
2721 }
2722 if( conflict_found ) {
2723 continue;
2724 }
2725
2726 // Toggle hobby
2727 bool enabling = false;
2728 if( u.hobbies.count( hobb ) == 0 ) {
2729 // Add hobby, and decrement point cost
2730 u.hobbies.insert( hobb );
2731 enabling = true;
2732 } else {
2733 // Remove hobby and refund point cost
2734 u.hobbies.erase( hobb );
2735 }
2736
2737 // Add or remove traits from hobby
2738 for( const trait_and_var &cur : hobb->get_locked_traits() ) {
2739 const trait_id &trait = cur.trait;
2740 if( enabling ) {
2741 if( !u.has_trait( trait ) ) {
2742 u.toggle_trait_deps( trait );
2743 }
2744 continue;
2745 }
2746 int from_other_hobbies = u.prof->is_locked_trait( trait ) ? 1 : 0;
2747 for( const profession *hby : u.hobbies ) {
2748 if( hby->ident() != hobb->ident() && hby->is_locked_trait( trait ) ) {
2749 from_other_hobbies++;
2750 }
2751 }
2752 if( from_other_hobbies > 0 ) {
2753 continue;
2754 }
2755 u.toggle_trait_deps( trait );
2756 }
2757
2758 } else if( action == "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) {
2759 outfit = !outfit;
2760 recalc_hobbies = true;
2761 } else if( action == "CHANGE_GENDER" ) {
2762 u.male = !u.male;
2763 profession_sorter.male = u.male;
2764 if( !profession_sorter.sort_by_points ) {
2765 std::sort( sorted_hobbies.begin(), sorted_hobbies.end(), profession_sorter );
2766 }
2767 recalc_hobbies = true;
2768 } else if( action == "SORT" ) {
2769 profession_sorter.sort_by_points = !profession_sorter.sort_by_points;
2770 recalc_hobbies = true;
2771 } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
2772 string_input_popup()
2773 .title( _( "Search:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Search:" ) ) ) )
2774 .width( 60 )
2775 .description( _( "Search by background name." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Search by background name." )
) ) )
2776 .edit( filterstring );
2777 recalc_hobbies = true;
2778 } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
2779 if( !filterstring.empty() ) {
2780 filterstring.clear();
2781 recalc_hobbies = true;
2782 }
2783 } else if( action == "RANDOMIZE" ) {
2784 cur_id = rng( 0, hobbies_length - 1 );
2785 }
2786
2787 if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description || recalc_hobbies ) {
2788 details_recalc = true;
2789 }
2790 } while( true );
2791}
2792
2793/**
2794 * @return The skill points to consume when a skill is increased (by one level) from the
2795 * current level.
2796 *
2797 * @note: There is one exception: if the current level is 0, it can be boosted by 2 levels for 1 point.
2798 */
2799static int skill_increment_cost( const Character &u, const skill_id &skill )
2800{
2801 return std::max( 1, ( static_cast<int>( u.get_skill_level( skill ) ) + 1 ) / 2 );
2802}
2803
2804static std::string assemble_skill_details( const avatar &u,
2805 const std::map<skill_id, int> &prof_skills, const Skill *currentSkill )
2806{
2807 std::string assembled;
2808 // We want recipes from profession skills displayed, but
2809 // without boosting the skills. Copy the skills, and boost the copy
2810 SkillLevelMap with_prof_skills = u.get_all_skills();
2811 for( const auto &sk : prof_skills ) {
2812 with_prof_skills.mod_skill_level( sk.first, sk.second );
2813 }
2814
2815 std::map<std::string, std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int> > > recipes;
2816 for( const auto &e : recipe_dict ) {
2817 const recipe &r = e.second;
2818 if( r.is_practice() || r.has_flag( "SECRET" ) ) {
2819 continue;
2820 }
2821 //Find out if the current skill and its level is in the requirement list
2822 auto req_skill = r.required_skills.find( currentSkill->ident() );
2823 int skill = req_skill != r.required_skills.end() ? req_skill->second : 0;
2824 bool would_autolearn_recipe =
2825 recipe_dict.all_autolearn().count( &r ) &&
2826 with_prof_skills.meets_skill_requirements( r.autolearn_requirements );
2827
2828 if( !would_autolearn_recipe && !r.never_learn &&
2829 ( r.skill_used == currentSkill->ident() || skill > 0 ) &&
2830 with_prof_skills.has_recipe_requirements( r ) ) {
2831
2832 recipes[r.skill_used->name()].emplace_back( r.result_name( /*decorated=*/true ),
2833 ( skill > 0 ) ? skill : r.difficulty );
2834 }
2835 // TODO: Find out why kevlar gambeson hood disppears when going from tailoring 7->8
2836 }
2837
2838 for( auto &elem : recipes ) {
2839 std::sort( elem.second.begin(), elem.second.end(),
2840 []( const std::pair<std::string, int> &lhs,
2841 const std::pair<std::string, int> &rhs ) {
2842 return localized_compare( std::make_pair( lhs.second, lhs.first ),
2843 std::make_pair( rhs.second, rhs.first ) );
2844 } );
2845
2846 const std::string rec_temp = enumerate_as_string( elem.second.begin(), elem.second.end(),
2847 []( const std::pair<std::string, int> &rec ) {
2848 return string_format( "%s (%d)", rec.first, rec.second );
2849 } );
2850
2851 if( elem.first == currentSkill->name() ) {
2852 assembled = "\n\n" + colorize( rec_temp, c_brownget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown) ) + std::move( assembled );
2853 } else {
2854 assembled += "\n\n" + colorize( "[" + elem.first + "]\n" + rec_temp, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
2855 }
2856 }
2857
2858 assembled = currentSkill->description() + assembled;
2859 return assembled;
2860}
2861
2862static std::string assemble_skill_help( const input_context &ctxt )
2863{
2864 return string_format(
2865 _( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase skill or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) )
2866 "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select skill.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase skill or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) )
2867 "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase skill or "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase skill or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) )
2868 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease skill.\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase skill or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) )
2869 "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase skill or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) )
2870 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase skill or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease skill.\n"
"Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab."
) ) ),
2871 ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ), ctxt.get_desc( "UP" ), ctxt.get_desc( "DOWN" ),
2872 ctxt.get_desc( "RIGHT" ), ctxt.get_desc( "LEFT" ),
2873 ctxt.get_desc( "NEXT_TAB" ), ctxt.get_desc( "PREV_TAB" ) );
2874}
2875
2876void set_skills( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type pool )
2877{
2878 ui_adaptor ui;
2879 catacurses::window w;
2880 catacurses::window w_list;
2881 catacurses::window w_details_pane;
2882 scrolling_text_view details( w_details_pane );
2883 bool details_recalc = true;
2884 const int iSecondColumn = 31;
2885 int iContentHeight = 0;
2886 const int iHeaderHeight = 6;
2887 // guessing most likely, but it doesn't matter, it will be recalculated if wrong
2888 int iHelpHeight = 4;
2889 scrollbar list_sb;
2890 input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_SKILLS" );
2891 details.set_up_navigation( ctxt, scrolling_key_scheme::angle_bracket_scroll );
2892 list_sb.set_draggable( ctxt );
2893 ctxt.register_cardinal();
2894 ctxt.register_action( "PAGE_UP", to_translation( "Fast scroll up" ) );
2895 ctxt.register_action( "PAGE_DOWN", to_translation( "Fast scroll down" ) );
2896 ctxt.register_action( "HOME" );
2897 ctxt.register_action( "END" );
2898 ctxt.register_action( "PREV_TAB" );
2899 ctxt.register_action( "NEXT_TAB" );
2900 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
2901 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
2902
2903 const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2904 iContentHeight = TERMY - iHelpHeight - iHeaderHeight - 1;
2905 w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
2906 w_list = catacurses::newwin( iContentHeight, iSecondColumn - 1, point( 1, iHeaderHeight ) );
2907 w_details_pane = catacurses::newwin( iContentHeight, TERMX - iSecondColumn - 1,
2908 point( iSecondColumn, iHeaderHeight ) );
2909 details_recalc = true;
2910 ui.position_from_window( w );
2911 };
2912 init_windows( ui );
2913 ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
2914
2915 std::vector<const Skill *> sorted_skills = Skill::get_skills_sorted_by(
2916 []( const Skill & a, const Skill & b ) {
2917 return localized_compare( a.name(), b.name() );
2918 } );
2919
2920 std::stable_sort( sorted_skills.begin(), sorted_skills.end(),
2921 []( const Skill * a, const Skill * b ) {
2922 return a->display_category() < b->display_category();
2923 } );
2924
2925 std::vector<HeaderSkill> skill_list = get_HeaderSkills( sorted_skills );
2926
2927 const int num_skills = skill_list.size();
2928 int cur_offset = 1;
2929 int cur_pos = 0;
2930 const Skill *currentSkill = nullptr;
2931
2932 const int scroll_rate = num_skills > 20 ? 5 : 2;
2933 auto get_next = [&]( bool go_up ) {
2934 skip_skill_headers( skill_list, cur_pos, !go_up );
2935 currentSkill = skill_list[cur_pos].skill;
2936 };
2937
2938 get_next( false );
2939
2940 std::map<skill_id, int> prof_skills;
2941 const profession::StartingSkillList &pskills = u.prof->skills();
2942
2943 std::copy( pskills.begin(), pskills.end(),
2944 std::inserter( prof_skills, prof_skills.begin() ) );
2945
2946 const int remaining_points_length = utf8_width( pools_to_string( u, pool ), true );
2947
2948 ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2949 const std::string help_text = assemble_skill_help( ctxt );
2950 const int new_iHelpHeight = foldstring( help_text, getmaxx( w ) - 4 ).size();
2951 if( new_iHelpHeight != iHelpHeight ) {
2952 iHelpHeight = new_iHelpHeight;
2953 init_windows( ui );
2954 }
2955 werase( w );
2956 werase( w_list );
2957 tabs.draw( w );
2958 mvwputch( w, point( iSecondColumn, iHeaderHeight - 1 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXXX4194423 ); // 'â¬'
2959 draw_points( w, pool, u );
2960 // Helptext skill tab
2961 fold_and_print( w, point( 2, TERMY - iHelpHeight - 1 ), getmaxx( w ) - 4, COL_NOTE_MINORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
2962 help_text );
2963
2964 if( details_recalc ) {
2965 details.set_text( assemble_skill_details( u, prof_skills, currentSkill ) );
2966 details_recalc = false;
2967 }
2968
2969 // Write the hint as to upgrade costs
2970 const int cost = skill_increment_cost( u, currentSkill->ident() );
2971 const int level = u.get_skill_level( currentSkill->ident() );
2972 if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
2973 // in pool the first level of a skill gives 2
2974 const int upgrade_levels = level == 0 ? 2 : 1;
2975 // We have two different strings to pluralize, so we have to use two translation calls.
2976 const std::string upgrade_levels_s = string_format(
2977 //~ levels here are skill levels at character creation time
2978 n_gettext( "%d level", "%d levels", upgrade_levels ), upgrade_levels );
2979 const nc_color color = skill_points_left( u, pool ) >= cost ? COL_SKILL_USEDget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) : c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red);
2980 mvwprintz( w, point( remaining_points_length + 9, 3 ), color,
2981 //~ Second string is e.g. "1 level" or "2 levels"
2982 n_gettext( "Upgrading %s by %s costs %d point",
2983 "Upgrading %s by %s costs %d points", cost ),
2984 currentSkill->name(), upgrade_levels_s, cost );
2985 }
2986
2987 calcStartPos( cur_offset, cur_pos, iContentHeight, num_skills );
2988 for( int i = cur_offset; i < num_skills && i - cur_offset < iContentHeight; ++i ) {
2989 const int y = i - cur_offset;
2990 const Skill *thisSkill = skill_list[i].skill;
2991 int prof_skill_level = 0;
2992 if( !skill_list[i].is_header ) {
2993 for( auto &prof_skill : u.prof->skills() ) {
2994 if( prof_skill.first == thisSkill->ident() ) {
2995 prof_skill_level += prof_skill.second;
2996 break;
2997 }
2998 }
2999 }
3000 const point opt_pos( 1, y );
3001 if( i == cur_pos ) {
3002 ui.set_cursor( w_list, opt_pos );
3003 }
3004 if( skill_list[i].is_header ) {
3005 mvwprintz( w_list, opt_pos, c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow), thisSkill->display_category()->display_string() );
3006 } else if( static_cast<int>( u.get_skill_level( thisSkill->ident() ) ) + prof_skill_level == 0 ) {
3007 mvwprintz( w_list, opt_pos,
3008 ( i == cur_pos ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) ), thisSkill->name() );
3009 } else {
3010 mvwprintz( w_list, opt_pos,
3011 ( i == cur_pos ? hilite( COL_SKILL_USEDget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) ) : COL_SKILL_USEDget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) ),
3012 thisSkill->name() );
3013 if( prof_skill_level > 0 ) {
3014 wprintz( w_list, ( i == cur_pos ? hilite( COL_SKILL_USEDget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) ) : COL_SKILL_USEDget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) ),
3015 " ( %d + %d )", prof_skill_level, static_cast<int>( u.get_skill_level( thisSkill->ident() ) ) );
3016 } else {
3017 wprintz( w_list, ( i == cur_pos ? hilite( COL_SKILL_USEDget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) ) : COL_SKILL_USEDget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) ),
3018 " ( %d )", static_cast<int>( u.get_skill_level( thisSkill->ident() ) ) );
3019 }
3020 }
3021 }
3022
3023 list_sb.offset_x( 0 )
3024 .offset_y( iHeaderHeight )
3025 .content_size( num_skills )
3026 .viewport_pos( cur_offset )
3027 .viewport_size( iContentHeight )
3028 .apply( w );
3029
3030 wnoutrefresh( w );
3031 wnoutrefresh( w_list );
3032 details.draw( c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
3033 } );
3034
3035 do {
3036 ui_manager::redraw();
3037 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
3038 const int pos_for_curr_description = cur_pos;
3039 int scrollbar_pos = cur_offset;
3040
3041 if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
3042 break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
3043 } else if( details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt ) ) {
3044 // NO FURTHER ACTION REQUIRED
3045 } else if( list_sb.handle_dragging( action, ctxt.get_coordinates_text( catacurses::stdscr ),
3046 scrollbar_pos ) ) {
3047 if( scrollbar_pos != cur_offset ) {
3048 cur_offset = scrollbar_pos;
3049 cur_pos = cur_offset + ( iContentHeight - 1 ) / 2; // Get approximate location
3050 get_next( false ); // Then make sure it's a skill rather than a heading
3051 if( cur_pos < num_skills / 2 ) {
3052 get_next( true ); // Go back to where we were to ensure we can drag to the top
3053 }
3054 }
3055 } else if( navigate_ui_list( action, cur_pos, scroll_rate, skill_list.size(), true ) ) {
3056 // omitting action == "PAGE_UP", because that shouldn't wrap
3057 const bool go_up = action == "UP" || action == "SCROLL_UP";
3058 get_next( go_up );
3059 } else if( action == "LEFT" ) {
3060 const skill_id &skill_id = currentSkill->ident();
3061 const int level = u.get_skill_level( skill_id );
3062 if( level > 0 ) {
3063 // For balance reasons, increasing a skill from level 0 gives 1 extra level for free, but
