3064 // decreasing it from level 2 forfeits the free extra level (thus changes it to 0)
3065 // this only matters in legacy character creation modes
3066 u.mod_skill_level( skill_id, level == 2 && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ? -2 : -1 );
3067 u.set_knowledge_level( skill_id, static_cast<int>( u.get_skill_level( skill_id ) ) );
3068 }
3069 details_recalc = true;
3070 } else if( action == "RIGHT" ) {
3071 const skill_id &skill_id = currentSkill->ident();
3072 const int level = u.get_skill_level( skill_id );
3073 if( level < MAX_SKILL ) {
3074 // For balance reasons, increasing a skill from level 0 gives 1 extra level for free
3075 // this only matters in legacy character creation modes
3076 u.mod_skill_level( skill_id, level == 0 && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ? +2 : +1 );
3077 u.set_knowledge_level( skill_id, static_cast<int>( u.get_skill_level( skill_id ) ) );
3078 }
3079 details_recalc = true;
3080 }
3081 if( cur_pos != pos_for_curr_description ) {
3082 details_recalc = true;
3083 }
3084 } while( true );
3085}
3086
3087static struct {
3088 bool sort_by_points = true;
3089 bool male = false;
3090 bool cities_enabled = false;
3091 /** @related player */
3092 bool operator()( const scenario *a, const scenario *b ) const {
3093 if( cities_enabled ) {
3094 // The generic ("Unemployed") profession should be listed first.
3095 const scenario *gen = scenario::generic();
3096 if( b == gen ) {
3097 return false;
3098 } else if( a == gen ) {
3099 return true;
3100 }
3101 }
3102
3103 if( !a->can_pick().success() && b->can_pick().success() ) {
3104 return false;
3105 }
3106
3107 if( a->can_pick().success() && !b->can_pick().success() ) {
3108 return true;
3109 }
3110
3111 if( !cities_enabled && a->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) != b->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) ) {
3112 return a->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) < b->has_flag( "CITY_START" );
3113 } else if( sort_by_points ) {
3114 return a->point_cost() < b->point_cost();
3115 } else {
3116 return localized_compare( a->gender_appropriate_name( male ),
3117 b->gender_appropriate_name( male ) );
3118 }
3119 }
3120} scenario_sorter;
3121
3122static std::string assemble_scenario_details( const avatar &u, const input_context &ctxt,
3123 const scenario *current_scenario )
3124{
3125 std::string assembled;
3126 // Display Origin
3127 const std::string mod_src = enumerate_as_string( current_scenario->src,
3128 []( const std::pair<string_id<scenario>, mod_id> &source ) {
3129 return string_format( "'%s'", source.second->name() );
3130 }, enumeration_conjunction::arrow );
3131 assembled += string_format( _( "Origin: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Origin: %s" ) ) ), mod_src ) + "\n";
3132
3133 assembled += string_format( g_switch_msg( u ), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_GENDER" ),
3134 current_scenario->gender_appropriate_name( !u.male ) ) + "\n";
3135 assembled += string_format( dress_switch_msg(), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) ) + "\n";
3136
3137 assembled += string_format(
3138 _( "Press <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change cataclysm start date, <color_light_green>%2$s</color> to change game start date, <color_light_green>%3$s</color> to reset calendar." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change cataclysm start date, <color_light_green>%2$s</color> to change game start date, <color_light_green>%3$s</color> to reset calendar."
) ) ),
3139 ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_START_OF_CATACLYSM" ), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_START_OF_GAME" ),
3140 ctxt.get_desc( "RESET_CALENDAR" ) ) + "\n";
3141 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Story:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Scenario Story:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
3142 assembled += colorize( current_scenario->description( u.male ), c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) ) + "\n";
3143 const std::optional<achievement_id> scenRequirement = current_scenario->get_requirement();
3144
3145 if( scenRequirement.has_value() ||
3146 ( current_scenario->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) && !scenario_sorter.cities_enabled ) ) {
3147 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Requirements:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Scenario Requirements:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
3148 if( current_scenario->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) && !scenario_sorter.cities_enabled ) {
3149 const std::string scenUnavailable =
3150 _( "This scenario is not available in this world due to city size settings." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This scenario is not available in this world due to city size settings."
) ) );
3151 assembled += colorize( scenUnavailable, c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) ) + "\n";
3152 }
3153 if( scenRequirement.has_value() ) {
3154 nc_color requirement_color = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
3155 if( current_scenario->can_pick().success() ) {
3156 requirement_color = c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green);
3157 }
3158 assembled += colorize( string_format( _( "Complete \"%s\"" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Complete \"%s\"" ) ) ), scenRequirement.value()->name() ),
3159 requirement_color ) + "\n";
3160 }
3161 }
3162
3163 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Professions:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Scenario Professions:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) );
3164 assembled += string_format( _( "\n%s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n%s" ) ) ), current_scenario->prof_count_str() );
3165 assembled += _( ", default:\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( ", default:\n" ) ) );
3166
3167 auto psorter = profession_sorter;
3168 psorter.sort_by_points = true;
3169 const auto permitted = current_scenario->permitted_professions();
3170 const auto default_prof = *std::min_element( permitted.begin(), permitted.end(), psorter );
3171 const int prof_points = default_prof->point_cost();
3172
3173 assembled += default_prof->gender_appropriate_name( u.male );
3174 if( prof_points > 0 ) {
3175 assembled += colorize( string_format( " (-%d)", prof_points ), c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) );
3176 } else if( prof_points < 0 ) {
3177 assembled += colorize( string_format( " (+%d)", -prof_points ), c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) );
3178 }
3179 assembled += "\n";
3180
3181 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Location:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Scenario Location:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
3182 assembled += string_format( _( "%s (%d locations, %d variants)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s (%d locations, %d variants)"
) ) ),
3183 current_scenario->start_name(),
3184 current_scenario->start_location_count(),
3185 current_scenario->start_location_targets_count() ) + "\n";
3186
3187 if( current_scenario->vehicle() ) {
3188 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Vehicle:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Scenario Vehicle:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
3189 assembled += current_scenario->vehicle()->name + "\n";
3190 }
3191
3192 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Start of cataclysm:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Start of cataclysm:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
3193 assembled += to_string( current_scenario->start_of_cataclysm() ) + "\n";
3194
3195 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Start of game:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Start of game:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
3196 assembled += to_string( current_scenario->start_of_game() ) + "\n";
3197
3198 if( !current_scenario->missions().empty() ) {
3199 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario missions:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Scenario missions:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
3200 for( mission_type_id mission_id : current_scenario->missions() ) {
3201 assembled += mission_type::get( mission_id )->tname() + "\n";
3202 }
3203 }
3204
3205 //TODO: Move this to JSON?
3206 const std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> flag_descriptions = {
3207 { "FIRE_START", translate_marker( "Fire nearby" )"Fire nearby" },
3208 { "SUR_START", translate_marker( "Zombies nearby" )"Zombies nearby" },
3209 { "HELI_CRASH", translate_marker( "Various limb wounds" )"Various limb wounds" },
3210 { "LONE_START", translate_marker( "No starting NPC" )"No starting NPC" },
3211 { "BORDERED", translate_marker( "Starting location is bordered by an immense wall" )"Starting location is bordered by an immense wall" },
3212 };
3213
3214 bool flag_header_added = false;
3215 for( const std::pair<std::string, std::string> &flag_pair : flag_descriptions ) {
3216 if( current_scenario->has_flag( std::get<0>( flag_pair ) ) ) {
3217 if( !flag_header_added ) {
3218 assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Flags:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Scenario Flags:" ) ) ), COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) ) + "\n";
3219 flag_header_added = true;
3220 }
3221 assembled += _( std::get<1>( flag_pair ) )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( std::get<1>( flag_pair )
) ) ) + "\n";
3222 }
3223 }
3224
3225 return assembled;
3226}
3227
3228void set_scenario( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type pool )
3229{
3230 int cur_id = 0;
3231 size_t iContentHeight = 0;
3232 int iStartPos = 0;
3233
3234 ui_adaptor ui;
3235 catacurses::window w;
3236 catacurses::window w_details_pane;
3237 scrolling_text_view details( w_details_pane );
3238 bool details_recalc = true;
3239 const int iHeaderHeight = 6;
3240 scrollbar list_sb;
3241
3242 const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
3243 iContentHeight = TERMY - iHeaderHeight - 1;
3244 w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
3245 const int second_column_w = TERMX / 2 - 1;
3246 point origin = point( second_column_w + 1, iHeaderHeight );
3247 w_details_pane = catacurses::newwin( iContentHeight, second_column_w, origin );
3248 details_recalc = true;
3249 ui.position_from_window( w );
3250 };
3251 init_windows( ui );
3252 ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
3253
3254 input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_SCENARIOS" );
3255 tabs.set_up_tab_navigation( ctxt );
3256 details.set_up_navigation( ctxt, scrolling_key_scheme::angle_bracket_scroll );
3257 list_sb.set_draggable( ctxt );
3258 ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
3259 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
3260 ctxt.register_action( "SORT" );
3261 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
3262 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_GENDER" );
3263 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" );
3264 ctxt.register_action( "FILTER" );
3265 ctxt.register_action( "RESET_FILTER" );
3266 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_START_OF_CATACLYSM" );
3267 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_START_OF_GAME" );
3268 ctxt.register_action( "RESET_CALENDAR" );
3269
3270 bool recalc_scens = true;
3271 size_t scens_length = 0;
3272 std::string filterstring;
3273 std::vector<const scenario *> sorted_scens;
3274
3275 ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
3276 werase( w );
3277 tabs.draw( w );
3278 mvwputch( w, point( TERMX / 2, iHeaderHeight - 1 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXXX4194423 ); // 'â¬'
3279 mvwputch( w, point( TERMX / 2, TERMY - 1 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XXOX4194422 ); // 'â´'
3280 draw_filter_and_sorting_indicators( w, ctxt, filterstring, scenario_sorter );
3281
3282 const bool cur_id_is_valid = cur_id >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( cur_id ) < sorted_scens.size();
3283 if( cur_id_is_valid ) {
3284 if( details_recalc ) {
3285 details.set_text( assemble_scenario_details( u, ctxt, sorted_scens[cur_id] ) );
3286 details_recalc = false;
3287 }
3288 int netPointCost = sorted_scens[cur_id]->point_cost() - get_scenario()->point_cost();
3289 ret_val<void> can_afford = sorted_scens[cur_id]->can_afford(
3290 *get_scenario(),
3291 skill_points_left( u, pool ) );
3292 ret_val<void> can_pick = sorted_scens[cur_id]->can_pick();
3293
3294 int pointsForScen = sorted_scens[cur_id]->point_cost();
3295 bool negativeScen = pointsForScen < 0;
3296 if( negativeScen ) {
3297 pointsForScen *= -1;
3298 }
3299 // Draw header.
3300 draw_points( w, pool, u, netPointCost );
3301 if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
3302
3303 const char *scen_msg_temp;
3304
3305 if( negativeScen ) {
3306 scen_msg_temp = n_gettext( "Scenario earns %2$d point",
3307 "Scenario earns %2$d points", pointsForScen );
3308 } else {
3309 scen_msg_temp = n_gettext( "Scenario costs %2$d point",
3310 "Scenario costs %2$d points", pointsForScen );
3311 }
3312
3313 int pMsg_length = utf8_width( remove_color_tags( pools_to_string( u, pool ) ) );
3314 mvwprintz( w, point( pMsg_length + 9, 3 ), can_afford.success() ? c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) : c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red),
3315 scen_msg_temp, sorted_scens[cur_id]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ), pointsForScen );
3316 }
3317 }
3318
3319 //Draw options
3320 calcStartPos( iStartPos, cur_id, iContentHeight, scens_length );
3321 const int end_pos = iStartPos + std::min( iContentHeight, scens_length );
3322 for( int i = iStartPos; i < end_pos; i++ ) {
3323 nc_color col;
3324 if( get_scenario() != sorted_scens[i] ) {
3325 if( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_scens[i] == sorted_scens[cur_id] &&
3326 ( ( sorted_scens[i]->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) && !scenario_sorter.cities_enabled ) ||
3327 !sorted_scens[i]->can_pick().success() ) ) {
3328 col = h_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_h_dark_gray);
3329 } else if( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_scens[i] != sorted_scens[cur_id] &&
3330 ( ( sorted_scens[i]->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) && !scenario_sorter.cities_enabled ) ||
3331 !sorted_scens[i]->can_pick().success() ) ) {
3332 col = c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
3333 } else {
3334 col = ( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_scens[i] == sorted_scens[cur_id] ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
3335 }
3336 } else {
3337 col = ( cur_id_is_valid &&
3338 sorted_scens[i] == sorted_scens[cur_id] ? hilite( c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) ) : COL_SKILL_USEDget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) );
3339 }
3340 const point opt_pos( 2, iHeaderHeight + i - iStartPos );
3341 if( i == cur_id ) {
3342 ui.set_cursor( w, opt_pos );
3343 }
3344 mvwprintz( w, opt_pos, col,
3345 sorted_scens[i]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
3346 }
3347
3348 list_sb.offset_x( 0 )
3349 .offset_y( 6 )
3350 .content_size( scens_length )
3351 .viewport_pos( iStartPos )
3352 .viewport_size( iContentHeight )
3353 .apply( w );
3354
3355 wnoutrefresh( w );
3356 details.draw( c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
3357 } );
3358
3359 do {
3360 if( recalc_scens
0.1
'recalc_scens' is true
 ) {
1
Taking true branch
→
3361 options_manager::options_container &wopts = world_generator->active_world->WORLD_OPTIONS;
3362 std::vector<const scenario *> new_scens;
3363 for( const scenario &scen : scenario::get_all() ) {
3364 if( scen.scen_is_blacklisted() ) {
2

3368 }
3369 scenario_sorter.male = u.male;
3370 scenario_sorter.cities_enabled = wopts["CITY_SIZE"].getValue() != "0";
3371 if( ( scens_length = filter_entries( u, cur_id, sorted_scens, new_scens, get_scenario(),
7

3373 scenario_sorter ) ) == 0 ) {
3374 filterstring.clear();

3377 recalc_scens = false;
3378 }
3379
3380 ui_manager::redraw();
3381 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
3382 const int scroll_rate = scens_length > 20 ? 5 : 2;
9

→
10

→
3383 const int id_for_curr_description = cur_id;
3384 int scrollbar_pos = iStartPos;
3385
3386 if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
11

Assuming the condition is false
→
3387 break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
3388 } else if( details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt )

→

13

16

3392 scrollbar_pos ) ) {
3393 if( scrollbar_pos != iStartPos ) {
3394 iStartPos = scrollbar_pos;
3395 cur_id = iStartPos + ( iContentHeight - 1 ) / 2;
3396 }
3397 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
17
←
Taking true branch
→
3398 // set arbitrarily high points and check if we have the achievment
3399 ret_val<void> can_pick = sorted_scens[cur_id]->can_pick();
3400
3401 if( !can_pick.success() ) {

→
3402 popup( can_pick.str() );
3403 continue;
3404 }

19

→
20
