→
3407 continue;
3408 }
3409 reset_scenario( u, sorted_scens[cur_id] );
21
←
Calling 'reset_scenario'
→
3410 details_recalc = true;
3411 } else if( action == "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) {
3412 outfit = !outfit;
3413 recalc_scens = true;
3414 } else if( action == "CHANGE_GENDER" ) {
3415 u.male = !u.male;
3416 recalc_scens = true;
3417 } else if( action == "SORT" ) {
3418 scenario_sorter.sort_by_points = !scenario_sorter.sort_by_points;
3419 recalc_scens = true;
3420 } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
3421 string_input_popup()
3422 .title( _( "Search:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Search:" ) ) ) )
3423 .width( 60 )
3424 .description( _( "Search by scenario name." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Search by scenario name." ) )
) )
3425 .edit( filterstring );
3426 recalc_scens = true;
3427 } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
3428 if( !filterstring.empty() ) {
3429 filterstring.clear();
3430 recalc_scens = true;
3431 }
3432 } else if( action == "RANDOMIZE" ) {
3433 cur_id = rng( 0, scens_length - 1 );
3434 } else if( action == "CHANGE_START_OF_CATACLYSM" ) {
3435 const scenario *scen = sorted_scens[cur_id];
3436 if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description ) {
3437 scen = get_scenario();
3438 }
3439 scen->change_start_of_cataclysm( calendar_ui::select_time_point( scen->start_of_cataclysm(),
3440 _( "Select cataclysm start date" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select cataclysm start date"
) ) ), calendar_ui::granularity::hour ) );
3441 details_recalc = true;
3442 } else if( action == "CHANGE_START_OF_GAME" ) {
3443 const scenario *scen = sorted_scens[cur_id];
3444 if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description ) {
3445 scen = get_scenario();
3446 }
3447 scen->change_start_of_game( calendar_ui::select_time_point( scen->start_of_game(),
3448 _( "Select game start date" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select game start date" ) ) ), calendar_ui::granularity::hour ) );
3449 details_recalc = true;
3450 } else if( action == "RESET_CALENDAR" ) {
3451 const scenario *scen = sorted_scens[cur_id];
3452 if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description ) {
3453 get_scenario()->reset_calendar();
3454 }
3455 scen->reset_calendar();
3456 details_recalc = true;
3457 }
3458
3459 if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description || recalc_scens ) {
3460 details_recalc = true;
3461 }
3462 } while( true );
3463}
3464
3465namespace char_creation
3466{
3467enum description_selector {
3468 NAME,
3469 GENDER,
3470 OUTFIT,
3471 HEIGHT,
3472 AGE,
3473 BLOOD,
3474 LOCATION
3475};
3476
3477static void draw_name( ui_adaptor &ui, const catacurses::window &w_name,
3478 const avatar &you, const bool highlight,
3479 const bool no_name_entered )
3480{
3481 werase( w_name );
3482 mvwprintz( w_name, point_zero,
3483 highlight ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Name:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Name:" ) ) ) );
3484 const point opt_pos( 1 + utf8_width( _( "Name:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Name:" ) ) ) ), 0 );
3485 if( highlight ) {
3486 ui.set_cursor( w_name, opt_pos );
3487 }
3488 if( no_name_entered ) {
3489 mvwprintz( w_name, opt_pos, COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white), _( "--- NO NAME ENTERED ---" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "--- NO NAME ENTERED ---" ) )
) );
3490 } else if( you.name.empty() ) {
3491 mvwprintz( w_name, opt_pos, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "--- RANDOM NAME ---" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "--- RANDOM NAME ---" ) ) ) );
3492 } else {
3493 mvwprintz( w_name, opt_pos, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), you.name );
3494 }
3495
3496 wnoutrefresh( w_name );
3497}
3498
3499static void draw_gender( ui_adaptor &ui, const catacurses::window &w_gender,
3500 const avatar &you, const bool highlight )
3501{
3502 const point male_pos( 1 + utf8_width( _( "Gender:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Gender:" ) ) ) ), 0 );
3503 const point female_pos = male_pos + point( 2 + utf8_width( _( "Male" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Male" ) ) ) ), 0 );
3504
3505 werase( w_gender );
3506 mvwprintz( w_gender, point_zero, highlight ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Gender:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Gender:" ) ) ) );
3507 if( highlight && you.male ) {
3508 ui.set_cursor( w_gender, male_pos );
3509 }
3510 mvwprintz( w_gender, male_pos, ( you.male ? c_light_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_cyan) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) ),
3511 _( "Male" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Male" ) ) ) );
3512 if( highlight && !you.male ) {
3513 ui.set_cursor( w_gender, female_pos );
3514 }
3515 mvwprintz( w_gender, female_pos, ( you.male ? c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) : c_pinkget_all_colors().get(def_c_pink) ),
3516 _( "Female" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Female" ) ) ) );
3517 wnoutrefresh( w_gender );
3518}
3519
3520static void draw_outfit( ui_adaptor &ui, const catacurses::window &w_outfit, const bool highlight )
3521{
3522 const point male_pos( 1 + utf8_width( _( "Outfit:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Outfit:" ) ) ) ), 0 );
3523 const point female_pos = male_pos + point( 2 + utf8_width( _( "Male" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Male" ) ) ) ), 0 );
3524
3525 werase( w_outfit );
3526 mvwprintz( w_outfit, point_zero, highlight ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Outfit:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Outfit:" ) ) ) );
3527 if( highlight && outfit ) {
3528 ui.set_cursor( w_outfit, male_pos );
3529 }
3530 mvwprintz( w_outfit, male_pos, ( outfit ? c_light_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_cyan) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) ),
3531 _( "Male" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Male" ) ) ) );
3532 if( highlight && !outfit ) {
3533 ui.set_cursor( w_outfit, female_pos );
3534 }
3535 mvwprintz( w_outfit, female_pos, ( outfit ? c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) : c_pinkget_all_colors().get(def_c_pink) ),
3536 _( "Female" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Female" ) ) ) );
3537 wnoutrefresh( w_outfit );
3538}
3539
3540static void draw_height( ui_adaptor &ui, const catacurses::window &w_height,
3541 const avatar &you, const bool highlight )
3542{
3543 werase( w_height );
3544 mvwprintz( w_height, point_zero, highlight ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Height:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Height:" ) ) ) );
3545 const point opt_pos( 1 + utf8_width( _( "Height:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Height:" ) ) ) ), 0 );
3546 if( highlight ) {
3547 ui.set_cursor( w_height, opt_pos );
3548 }
3549 mvwprintz( w_height, opt_pos, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), you.height_string() );
3550 wnoutrefresh( w_height );
3551}
3552
3553static void draw_age( ui_adaptor &ui, const catacurses::window &w_age,
3554 const avatar &you, const bool highlight )
3555{
3556 werase( w_age );
3557 mvwprintz( w_age, point_zero, highlight ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Age:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Age:" ) ) ) );
3558 const point opt_pos( 1 + utf8_width( _( "Age:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Age:" ) ) ) ), 0 );
3559 if( highlight ) {
3560 ui.set_cursor( w_age, opt_pos );
3561 }
3562 mvwprintz( w_age, opt_pos, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), you.age_string( get_scenario()->start_of_game() ) );
3563 wnoutrefresh( w_age );
3564}
3565
3566static void draw_blood( ui_adaptor &ui, const catacurses::window &w_blood,
3567 const avatar &you, const bool highlight )
3568{
3569 werase( w_blood );
3570 mvwprintz( w_blood, point_zero, highlight ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Blood type:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Blood type:" ) ) ) );
3571 const point opt_pos( 1 + utf8_width( _( "Blood type:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Blood type:" ) ) ) ), 0 );
3572 if( highlight ) {
3573 ui.set_cursor( w_blood, opt_pos );
3574 }
3575 mvwprintz( w_blood, opt_pos, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white),
3576 io::enum_to_string( you.my_blood_type ) + ( you.blood_rh_factor ? "+" : "-" ) );
3577 wnoutrefresh( w_blood );
3578}
3579
3580static void draw_location( ui_adaptor &ui, const catacurses::window &w_location,
3581 const avatar &you, const bool highlight )
3582{
3583 std::string random_start_location_text = string_format( n_gettext(
3584 "<color_red>* Random location *</color> (<color_white>%d</color> variant)",
3585 "<color_red>* Random location *</color> (<color_white>%d</color> variants)",
3586 get_scenario()->start_location_targets_count() ), get_scenario()->start_location_targets_count() );
3587
3588 if( get_scenario()->start_location_targets_count() == 1 ) {
3589 random_start_location_text = get_scenario()->start_location().obj().name();
3590 }
3591
3592 werase( w_location );
3593 mvwprintz( w_location, point_zero, highlight ? COL_SELECTget_all_colors().get(def_h_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
3594 _( "Starting location:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Starting location:" ) ) ) );
3595 const point opt_pos( utf8_width( _( "Starting location:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Starting location:" ) ) ) ) + 1, 0 );
3596 if( highlight ) {
3597 ui.set_cursor( w_location, opt_pos );
3598 }
3599 // ::find will return empty location if id was not found. Debug msg will be printed too.
3600 mvwprintz( w_location, opt_pos,
3601 you.random_start_location ? c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) : c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white),
3602 you.random_start_location ? remove_color_tags( random_start_location_text ) :
3603 string_format( n_gettext( "%s (%d variant)", "%s (%d variants)",
3604 you.start_location.obj().targets_count() ),
3605 you.start_location.obj().name(), you.start_location.obj().targets_count() ) );
3606 wnoutrefresh( w_location );
3607}
3608
3609} // namespace char_creation
3610
3611static std::string assemble_description_help( const input_context &ctxt, const bool allow_reroll )
3612{
3613 if( !isWide ) {
3614 return string_format( _( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings."
) ) ),
3615 ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ) );
3616 }
3617 std::string help_text = string_format(
3618 _( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings."
) ) ),
3619 ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ) )
3620 + string_format( _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to save character template." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to save character template."
) ) ),
3621 ctxt.get_desc( "SAVE_TEMPLATE" ) );
3622 if( !MAP_SHARING::isSharing() && allow_reroll ) { // no random names when sharing maps
3623 help_text += string_format(
3624 _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to pick a random name, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to pick a random name, "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all description values, "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all but scenario, or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize everything."
) ) )
3625 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all description values, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to pick a random name, "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all description values, "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all but scenario, or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize everything."
) ) )
3626 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all but scenario, or "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to pick a random name, "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all description values, "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all but scenario, or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize everything."
) ) )
3627 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize everything." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to pick a random name, "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all description values, "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all but scenario, or "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize everything."
) ) ),
3628 ctxt.get_desc( "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_NAME" ), ctxt.get_desc( "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_DESCRIPTION" ),
3629 ctxt.get_desc( "REROLL_CHARACTER" ), ctxt.get_desc( "REROLL_CHARACTER_WITH_SCENARIO" ) );
3630 } else {
3631 help_text += string_format(
3632 _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to pick a random name, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to pick a random name, "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all description values."
) ) )
3633 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all description values." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to pick a random name, "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all description values."
) ) ),
3634 ctxt.get_desc( "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_NAME" ), ctxt.get_desc( "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_DESCRIPTION" ) );
3635 }
3636 help_text += string_format(
3637 _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change cataclysm start date, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change cataclysm start date, "
"<color_light_green>%2$s</color> to change game start date, "
"<color_light_green>%3$s</color> to reset calendar."
) ) )
3638 "<color_light_green>%2$s</color> to change game start date, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change cataclysm start date, "
"<color_light_green>%2$s</color> to change game start date, "
"<color_light_green>%3$s</color> to reset calendar."
) ) )
3639 "<color_light_green>%3$s</color> to reset calendar." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change cataclysm start date, "
"<color_light_green>%2$s</color> to change game start date, "
"<color_light_green>%3$s</color> to reset calendar."
) ) ),
3640 ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_START_OF_CATACLYSM" ), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_START_OF_GAME" ),
3641 ctxt.get_desc( "RESET_CALENDAR" ) );
3642 if( !get_option<bool>( "SELECT_STARTING_CITY" ) ) {
3643 help_text += string_format(
3644 _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to select a specific starting location." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to select a specific starting location."
) ) ),
3645 ctxt.get_desc( "CHOOSE_LOCATION" ) );
3646 } else {
3647 help_text += string_format(
3648 _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to select a specific starting city and "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to select a specific starting city and "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to select a specific starting location."
) ) )
3649 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to select a specific starting location." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to select a specific starting city and "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to select a specific starting location."
) ) ),
3650 ctxt.get_desc( "CHOOSE_CITY" ), ctxt.get_desc( "CHOOSE_LOCATION" ) );
3651 }
3652 help_text += string_format(
3653 _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> or <color_light_green>%s</color> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> or <color_light_green>%s</color> "
"to cycle through editable values." ) ) )
3654 "to cycle through editable values." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> or <color_light_green>%s</color> "
"to cycle through editable values." ) ) ),
3655 ctxt.get_desc( "UP" ), ctxt.get_desc( "DOWN" ) )
3656 + string_format( _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> and "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> and "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to change gender, height, age, and blood type."
) ) )
3657 "<color_light_green>%s</color> to change gender, height, age, and blood type." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> and "
"<color_light_green>%s</color> to change gender, height, age, and blood type."
) ) ),
3658 ctxt.get_desc( "LEFT" ), ctxt.get_desc( "RIGHT" ) )
3659 + string_format( _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to edit value via popup input." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to edit value via popup input."
) ) ),
3660 ctxt.get_desc( "CONFIRM" ) )
3661 + string_format( _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to finish character creation "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to finish character creation "
"or <color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous TAB."
) ) )
3662 "or <color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous TAB." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to finish character creation "
"or <color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous TAB."
) ) ),
3663 ctxt.get_desc( "NEXT_TAB" ), ctxt.get_desc( "PREV_TAB" ) );
3664 return help_text;
3665}
3666
3667// NOLINTNEXTLINE(readability-function-size)
3668void set_description( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &you, const bool allow_reroll,
3669 pool_type pool )
3670{
3671 static constexpr int RANDOM_START_LOC_ENTRY = INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1);
3672
3673 // guessing most likely, but it doesn't matter, it will be recalculated if wrong
3674 int iHelpHeight = 10;
3675
3676 ui_adaptor ui;
3677 catacurses::window w;
3678 catacurses::window w_name;
3679 catacurses::window w_gender;
3680 catacurses::window w_outfit;
3681 catacurses::window w_location;
3682 catacurses::window w_vehicle;
3683 catacurses::window w_stats;
3684 catacurses::window w_traits;
3685 catacurses::window w_bionics;
3686 catacurses::window w_proficiencies;
3687 catacurses::window w_addictions;
3688 catacurses::window w_scenario;
3689 catacurses::window w_profession;
3690 catacurses::window w_hobbies;
3691 catacurses::window w_skills;
3692 catacurses::window w_guide;
3693 catacurses::window w_height;
3694 catacurses::window w_age;
3695 catacurses::window w_blood;
3696 catacurses::window w_calendar;
3697 const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
3698 const int freeWidth = TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH;
3699 isWide = freeWidth > 15;
3700 const int beginx2 = 46;
3701 const int ncol2 = 40;
3702 const int beginx3 = TERMX <= 88 ? TERMX - TERMX / 4 : 86;
3703 const int ncol3 = TERMX - beginx3 - 2;
3704 const int beginx4 = TERMX <= 130 ? TERMX - TERMX / 5 : 128;
3705 const int ncol4 = TERMX - beginx4 - 2;
3706 const int ncol_small = ( TERMX / 2 ) - 2;
3707 const int begin_sncol = TERMX / 2;
3708 if( isWide ) {
3709 w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
3710 w_name = catacurses::newwin( 2, ncol2 + 2, point( 2, 6 ) );
3711 w_gender = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol2 + 2, point( 2, 7 ) );
3712 w_outfit = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol2 + 1, point( 2, 8 ) );
3713 w_location = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol3, point( beginx3, 6 ) );
3714 w_vehicle = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol3, point( beginx3, 7 ) );
3715 w_addictions = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol3, point( beginx3, 8 ) );
3716 w_stats = catacurses::newwin( 6, 20, point( 2, 10 ) );
3717 w_traits = catacurses::newwin( TERMY - 11, ncol2, point( beginx2, 10 ) );
3718 w_calendar = catacurses::newwin( 4, ncol3, point( beginx3, 10 ) );
3719 w_bionics = catacurses::newwin( TERMY - 16, ncol3, point( beginx3, 15 ) );
3720 w_proficiencies = catacurses::newwin( TERMY - 21, 19, point( 2, 16 ) );
3721 // Extra - 11 to avoid overlap with long text in w_guide.
3722 w_hobbies = catacurses::newwin( TERMY - 11 - 11, ncol4, point( beginx4, 10 ) );
3723 w_scenario = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol2, point( beginx2, 3 ) );
3724 w_profession = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol3, point( beginx3, 3 ) );
3725 w_skills = catacurses::newwin( TERMY - 11, 23, point( 22, 10 ) );
3726 w_height = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol2, point( beginx2, 6 ) );
3727 w_age = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol2, point( beginx2, 7 ) );
3728 w_blood = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol2, point( beginx2, 8 ) );
3729 ui.position_from_window( w );
3730 } else {
3731 w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
3732 w_name = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol_small, point( 2, 5 ) );
3733 w_gender = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol_small, point( 2, 6 ) );
3734 w_outfit = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol_small, point( 2, 7 ) );
3735 w_height = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol_small, point( 2, 8 ) );
3736 w_age = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol_small, point( begin_sncol, 6 ) );
3737 w_blood = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol_small, point( begin_sncol, 7 ) );
3738 w_location = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol_small, point( begin_sncol, 8 ) );
3739 w_stats = catacurses::newwin( 6, ncol_small, point( 2, 10 ) );
3740 w_scenario = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol_small, point( begin_sncol, 10 ) );
3741 w_profession = catacurses::newwin( 1, ncol_small, point( begin_sncol, 11 ) );
3742 w_calendar = catacurses::newwin( 4, ncol_small, point( begin_sncol, 13 ) );
3743 w_vehicle = catacurses::newwin( 2, ncol_small, point( begin_sncol, 18 ) );
3744 w_addictions = catacurses::newwin( 2, ncol_small, point( begin_sncol, 20 ) );
3745 w_traits = catacurses::window();
3746 w_bionics = catacurses::window();
3747 w_proficiencies = catacurses::window();
3748 w_hobbies = catacurses::window();
3749 w_skills = catacurses::window();
3750 ui.position_from_window( w );
3751 }
3752 w_guide = catacurses::newwin( iHelpHeight, TERMX - 4, point( 2, TERMY - iHelpHeight - 1 ) );
3753 };
3754 init_windows( ui );
3755 ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
3756
3757 input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_DESCRIPTION" );
3758 tabs.set_up_tab_navigation( ctxt );
3759 ctxt.register_cardinal();
3760 ctxt.register_action( "SAVE_TEMPLATE" );
3761 ctxt.register_action( "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_NAME" );
3762 ctxt.register_action( "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_DESCRIPTION" );
3763 if( !MAP_SHARING::isSharing() && allow_reroll ) {
3764 ctxt.register_action( "REROLL_CHARACTER" );
3765 ctxt.register_action( "REROLL_CHARACTER_WITH_SCENARIO" );
3766 }
3767 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_GENDER" );
3768 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" );
3769 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
3770 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_START_OF_CATACLYSM" );
3771 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_START_OF_GAME" );
3772 ctxt.register_action( "RESET_CALENDAR" );
3773 if( get_option<bool>( "SELECT_STARTING_CITY" ) ) {
3774 ctxt.register_action( "CHOOSE_CITY" );
3775 }
3776 ctxt.register_action( "CHOOSE_LOCATION" );
3777 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
3778
3779 uilist select_location;
3780 select_location.text = _( "Select a starting location." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select a starting location."
) ) );
3781 int offset = 1;
3782 const std::string random_start_location_text = string_format( n_gettext(
3783 "<color_red>* Random location *</color> (<color_white>%d</color> variant)",
3784 "<color_red>* Random location *</color> (<color_white>%d</color> variants)",
3785 get_scenario()->start_location_targets_count() ), get_scenario()->start_location_targets_count() );
3786 uilist_entry entry_random_start_location( RANDOM_START_LOC_ENTRY, true, -1,
3787 random_start_location_text );
3788 select_location.entries.emplace_back( entry_random_start_location );
3789 for( const start_location &loc : start_locations::get_all() ) {
3790 if( get_scenario()->allowed_start( loc.id ) ) {
3791 std::string loc_name = loc.name();
3792 if( loc.targets_count() > 1 ) {
3793 loc_name = string_format( n_gettext( "%s (<color_white>%d</color> variant)",
3794 "%s (<color_white>%d</color> variants)", loc.targets_count() ),
3795 loc_name, loc.targets_count() );
3796 }
3797
3798 uilist_entry entry( loc.id.id().to_i(), true, -1, loc_name );
3799
3800 select_location.entries.emplace_back( entry );
3801
3802 if( !you.random_start_location && loc.id.id() == you.start_location.id() ) {
3803 select_location.selected = offset;
3804 }
3805 offset++;
3806 }
3807 }
3808 if( you.random_start_location ) {
3809 select_location.selected = 0;
3810 }
3811 select_location.setup();
3812 if( MAP_SHARING::isSharing() ) {
3813 you.name = MAP_SHARING::getUsername(); // set the current username as default character name
3814 } else if( !get_option<std::string>( "DEF_CHAR_NAME" ).empty() ) {
3815 you.name = get_option<std::string>( "DEF_CHAR_NAME" );
3816 }
3817
3818 char_creation::description_selector current_selector = char_creation::NAME;
3819
3820 bool no_name_entered = false;
3821 ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
3822 const std::string help_text = assemble_description_help( ctxt, allow_reroll );
3823 const int new_iHelpHeight = foldstring( help_text, getmaxx( w ) - 4 ).size();
3824 if( new_iHelpHeight != iHelpHeight ) {
3825 iHelpHeight = new_iHelpHeight;
3826 init_windows( ui );
3827 }
3828 werase( w );
3829 tabs.draw( w );
3830 draw_points( w, pool, you );
3831
3832 //Draw the line between editable and non-editable stuff.
3833 for( int i = 0; i < getmaxx( w ); ++i ) {
3834 if( i == 0 ) {
3835 mvwputch( w, point( i, 9 ), BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XXXO4194420 );
3836 } else if( i == getmaxx( w ) - 1 ) {
3837 wputch( w, BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XOXX4194421 );
3838 } else {
3839 wputch( w, BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXOX4194417 );
3840 }
3841 }
3842 wnoutrefresh( w );
3843
3844 werase( w_stats );
3845 std::vector<std::string> vStatNames;
3846 mvwprintz( w_stats, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Stats:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stats:" ) ) ) );
3847 vStatNames.emplace_back( _( "Strength:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Strength:" ) ) ) );
3848 vStatNames.emplace_back( _( "Dexterity:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Dexterity:" ) ) ) );
3849 vStatNames.emplace_back( _( "Intelligence:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Intelligence:" ) ) ) );
3850 vStatNames.emplace_back( _( "Perception:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Perception:" ) ) ) );
3851 int pos = 0;
3852 for( size_t i = 0; i < vStatNames.size(); i++ ) {
3853 pos = ( utf8_width( vStatNames[i] ) > pos ?
3854 utf8_width( vStatNames[i] ) : pos );
3855 mvwprintz( w_stats, point( 0, i + 1 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), vStatNames[i] );
3856 }
3857 mvwprintz( w_stats, point( pos + 1, 1 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "%2d", you.str_max );
3858 mvwprintz( w_stats, point( pos + 1, 2 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "%2d", you.dex_max );
3859 mvwprintz( w_stats, point( pos + 1, 3 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "%2d", you.int_max );
3860 mvwprintz( w_stats, point( pos + 1, 4 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "%2d", you.per_max );
3861 wnoutrefresh( w_stats );
3862
3863 if( isWide ) {
3864 werase( w_traits );
3865 mvwprintz( w_traits, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Traits: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Traits: " ) ) ) );
3866 std::vector<trait_and_var> current_traits = you.get_mutations_variants();
3867 std::sort( current_traits.begin(), current_traits.end(), trait_display_sort );
3868 if( current_traits.empty() ) {
3869 wprintz( w_traits, c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), _( "None!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "None!" ) ) ) );
3870 } else {
3871 for( size_t i = 0; i < current_traits.size(); i++ ) {
3872 const trait_and_var current_trait = current_traits[i];
3873 trim_and_print( w_traits, point( 0, i + 1 ), getmaxx( w_traits ) - 1,
3874 current_trait.trait->get_display_color(), current_trait.name() );
3875 }
3876 }
3877 wnoutrefresh( w_traits );
3878 }
3879
3880 if( isWide ) {
3881 werase( w_skills );
3882 mvwprintz( w_skills, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Skills:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Skills:" ) ) ) );
3883
3884 auto skillslist = Skill::get_skills_sorted_by( [&]( const Skill & a, const Skill & b ) {
3885 const int level_a = you.get_skill_level_object( a.ident() ).exercised_level();
3886 const int level_b = you.get_skill_level_object( b.ident() ).exercised_level();
3887 return localized_compare( std::make_pair( -level_a, a.name() ),
3888 std::make_pair( -level_b, b.name() ) );
3889 } );
3890
3891 int line = 1;
3892 bool has_skills = false;
3893 profession::StartingSkillList list_skills = you.prof->skills();
3894
3895 for( const Skill *&elem : skillslist ) {
3896 int level = you.get_skill_level( elem->ident() );
3897
3898 // Handle skills from professions
3899 if( pool != pool_type::TRANSFER ) {
3900 profession::StartingSkillList::iterator i = list_skills.begin();
3901 while( i != list_skills.end() ) {
3902 if( i->first == elem->ident() ) {
3903 level += i->second;
3904 break;
3905 }
3906 ++i;
3907 }
3908 }
3909
3910 // Handle skills from hobbies
3911 int leftover_exp = 0;
3912 int exp_to_level = 10000 * ( level + 1 ) * ( level + 1 );
3913 for( const profession *profession : you.hobbies ) {
3914 profession::StartingSkillList hobby_skills = profession->skills();
3915 profession::StartingSkillList::iterator i = hobby_skills.begin();
3916 while( i != hobby_skills.end() ) {
3917 if( i->first == elem->ident() ) {
3918 int skill_exp_bonus = leftover_exp + calculate_cumulative_experience( i->second );
3919 // Calculate Level up to find final level and remaining exp
3920 while( skill_exp_bonus >= exp_to_level ) {
3921 level++;
3922 skill_exp_bonus -= exp_to_level;
3923 exp_to_level = 10000 * ( level + 1 ) * ( level + 1 );
3924 }
3925 leftover_exp = skill_exp_bonus;
3926 break;
3927 }
3928 ++i;
3929 }
3930 }
3931
3932 if( level > 0 ) {
3933 const int exp_percent = 100 * leftover_exp / exp_to_level;
3934 mvwprintz( w_skills, point( 0, line ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
3935 elem->name() + ":" );
3936 right_print( w_skills, line, 1, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), string_format( "%d(%2d%%)", level, exp_percent ) );
3937 line++;
3938 has_skills = true;
3939 }
3940 }
3941
3942 if( !has_skills ) {
3943 mvwprintz( w_skills, point( utf8_width( _( "Skills:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Skills:" ) ) ) ) + 1, 0 ), c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), _( "None!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "None!" ) ) ) );
3944 }
3945 wnoutrefresh( w_skills );
3946 }
3947
3948 if( isWide ) {
3949 werase( w_bionics );
3950 // Profession bionics description tab, active bionics shown first
3951 auto prof_CBMs = you.prof->CBMs();
3952 std::sort( begin( prof_CBMs ), end( prof_CBMs ), []( const bionic_id & a, const bionic_id & b ) {
3953 return a->activated && !b->activated;
3954 } );
3955 mvwprintz( w_bionics, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Bionics:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bionics:" ) ) ) );
3956 if( prof_CBMs.empty() ) {
3957 mvwprintz( w_bionics, point( utf8_width( _( "Bionics:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bionics:" ) ) ) ) + 1, 0 ), c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), _( "None!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "None!" ) ) ) );
3958 } else {
3959 for( const auto &b : prof_CBMs ) {
3960 const bionic_data &cbm = b.obj();
3961
3962 if( cbm.activated && cbm.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_TOGGLED ) ) {
3963 wprintz( w_bionics, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), string_format( _( "\n%s (toggled)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n%s (toggled)" ) ) ), cbm.name ) );
3964 } else if( cbm.activated ) {
3965 wprintz( w_bionics, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), string_format( _( "\n%s (activated)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n%s (activated)" ) ) ), cbm.name ) );
3966 } else {
3967 wprintz( w_bionics, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "\n" + cbm.name );
3968 }
3969 }
3970 }
3971 wnoutrefresh( w_bionics );
3972 }
3973
3974 // Proficiencies description tab
3975 if( isWide ) {
3976 werase( w_proficiencies );
3977 // Load in proficiencies from profession and hobbies
3978 std::vector<proficiency_id> prof_proficiencies = you.prof->proficiencies();
3979 const std::vector<proficiency_id> &known_proficiencies = you._proficiencies->known_profs();
3980 prof_proficiencies.insert( prof_proficiencies.end(), known_proficiencies.begin(),
3981 known_proficiencies.end() );
3982 for( const profession *profession : you.hobbies ) {
3983 for( const proficiency_id &proficiency : profession->proficiencies() ) {
3984 // Do not add duplicate proficiencies
3985 if( std::find( prof_proficiencies.begin(), prof_proficiencies.end(),
3986 proficiency ) == prof_proficiencies.end() ) {
3987 prof_proficiencies.push_back( proficiency );
3988 }
3989 }
3990 }
3991
3992 mvwprintz( w_proficiencies, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Proficiencies:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Proficiencies:" ) ) ) );
3993 if( prof_proficiencies.empty() ) {
3994 mvwprintz( w_proficiencies, point_south, c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), _( "None!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "None!" ) ) ) );
3995 } else {
3996 for( const proficiency_id &prof : prof_proficiencies ) {
3997 wprintz( w_proficiencies, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "\n" + trim_by_length( prof->name(), 18 ) );
3998 }
3999 }
4000 wnoutrefresh( w_proficiencies );
4001 }
4002
4003 // Helptext description window
4004 werase( w_guide );
4005 fold_and_print( w_guide, point_zero, getmaxx( w_guide ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), help_text );
4006 wnoutrefresh( w_guide );
4007
4008 char_creation::draw_name( ui, w_name, you, current_selector == char_creation::NAME,
4009 no_name_entered );
4010 char_creation::draw_gender( ui, w_gender, you, current_selector == char_creation::GENDER );
4011 char_creation::draw_outfit( ui, w_outfit, current_selector == char_creation::OUTFIT );
4012 char_creation::draw_age( ui, w_age, you, current_selector == char_creation::AGE );
4013 char_creation::draw_height( ui, w_height, you, current_selector == char_creation::HEIGHT );
4014 char_creation::draw_blood( ui, w_blood, you, current_selector == char_creation::BLOOD );
4015 char_creation::draw_location( ui, w_location, you, current_selector == char_creation::LOCATION );
4016
4017 werase( w_vehicle );
4018 // Player vehicle description tab
4019 const vproto_id scen_veh = get_scenario()->vehicle();
4020 const vproto_id prof_veh = you.prof->vehicle();
4021 if( isWide ) {
4022 if( scen_veh ) {
4023 mvwprintz( w_vehicle, point_zero, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Starting vehicle (scenario): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Starting vehicle (scenario): "
) ) ) );
4024 wprintz( w_vehicle, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), "%s", scen_veh->name );
4025 } else if( prof_veh ) {
4026 mvwprintz( w_vehicle, point_zero, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Starting vehicle (profession): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Starting vehicle (profession): "
) ) ) );
4027 wprintz( w_vehicle, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), "%s", prof_veh->name );
4028 } else {
4029 mvwprintz( w_vehicle, point_zero, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Starting vehicle: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Starting vehicle: " ) ) ) );
4030 wprintz( w_vehicle, c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), _( "None!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "None!" ) ) ) );
4031 }
4032 } else {
4033 if( scen_veh ) {
4034 mvwprintz( w_vehicle, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Starting vehicle (scenario): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Starting vehicle (scenario): "
) ) ) );
4035 wprintz( w_vehicle, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "\n%s", scen_veh->name );
4036 } else if( prof_veh ) {
4037 mvwprintz( w_vehicle, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Starting vehicle (profession): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Starting vehicle (profession): "
) ) ) );
4038 wprintz( w_vehicle, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "\n%s", prof_veh->name );
4039 } else {
4040 mvwprintz( w_vehicle, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Starting vehicle: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Starting vehicle: " ) ) ) );
4041 wprintz( w_vehicle, c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), _( "None!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "None!" ) ) ) );
4042 }
4043 }
4044 wnoutrefresh( w_vehicle );
4045
4046 werase( w_addictions );
4047 // Profession addictions description tab
4048 std::vector<addiction> prof_addictions = you.prof->addictions();
4049 for( const profession *profession : you.hobbies ) {
4050 const std::vector<addiction> &hobby_addictions = profession->addictions();
4051 for( const addiction &iter : hobby_addictions ) {
4052 prof_addictions.push_back( iter );
4053 }
4054 }
4055 if( isWide ) {
4056 mvwprintz( w_addictions, point_zero, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Starting addictions: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Starting addictions: " ) ) ) );
4057 if( prof_addictions.empty() ) {
4058 wprintz( w_addictions, c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), _( "None!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "None!" ) ) ) );
4059 } else {
4060 for( const addiction &a : prof_addictions ) {
4061 const char *format = "%1$s (%2$d) ";
4062 wprintz( w_addictions, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), string_format( format, a.type->get_name().translated(),
4063 a.intensity ) );
4064 }
4065 }
4066 } else {
4067 mvwprintz( w_addictions, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Starting addictions: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Starting addictions: " ) ) ) );
4068 if( prof_addictions.empty() ) {
4069 wprintz( w_addictions, c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), _( "None!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "None!" ) ) ) );
4070 } else {
4071 for( const addiction &a : prof_addictions ) {
4072 const char *format = "%1$s (%2$d) ";
4073 wprintz( w_addictions, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "\n" );
4074 wprintz( w_addictions, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), string_format( format, a.type->get_name().translated(),
4075 a.intensity ) );
4076 }
4077 }
4078 }
4079 wnoutrefresh( w_addictions );
4080
4081 werase( w_scenario );
4082 mvwprintz( w_scenario, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Scenario: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Scenario: " ) ) ) );
4083 wprintz( w_scenario, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), get_scenario()->gender_appropriate_name( you.male ) );
4084 wnoutrefresh( w_scenario );
4085
4086 werase( w_profession );
4087 mvwprintz( w_profession, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Profession: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Profession: " ) ) ) );
4088 wprintz( w_profession, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), you.prof->gender_appropriate_name( you.male ) );
4089 wnoutrefresh( w_profession );
4090
4091 werase( w_calendar );
4092 mvwprintz( w_calendar, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Start of cataclysm:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Start of cataclysm:" ) ) ) );
4093 wprintz( w_calendar, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "\n" );
4094 wprintz( w_calendar, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), to_string( get_scenario()->start_of_cataclysm() ) );
4095 wprintz( w_calendar, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "\n" );
4096 wprintz( w_calendar, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Start of game:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Start of game:" ) ) ) );
4097 wprintz( w_calendar, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "\n" );
4098 wprintz( w_calendar, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), to_string( get_scenario()->start_of_game() ) );
4099 wnoutrefresh( w_calendar );
4100
4101 if( isWide ) {
4102 werase( w_hobbies );
4103 mvwprintz( w_hobbies, point_zero, COL_HEADERget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Background: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Background: " ) ) ) );
4104 if( you.hobbies.empty() ) {
4105 mvwprintz( w_hobbies, point_south, c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), _( "None!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "None!" ) ) ) );
4106 } else {
4107 for( const profession *prof : you.hobbies ) {
4108 wprintz( w_hobbies, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), "\n%s", prof->gender_appropriate_name( you.male ) );
4109 }
4110 }
4111 wnoutrefresh( w_hobbies );
4112 }
4113 } );
4114
4115 int min_allowed_age = 16;
4116 int max_allowed_age = 55;
4117
4118 int min_allowed_height = Character::min_height();
4119 int max_allowed_height = Character::max_height();
4120
4121 do {
4122 ui_manager::redraw();
4123 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
4124 if( action == "NEXT_TAB" ) {
4125 if( pool == pool_type::ONE_POOL ) {
4126 if( points_used_total( you ) > point_pool_total() ) {
4127 popup( _( "Too many points allocated, change some features and try again." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Too many points allocated, change some features and try again."
) ) ) );
4128 continue;
4129 }
4130 } else if( pool == pool_type::MULTI_POOL ) {
4131 multi_pool p( you );
4132 if( p.skill_points_left < 0 ) {
4133 popup( _( "Too many points allocated, change some features and try again." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Too many points allocated, change some features and try again."
) ) ) );
4134 continue;
4135 }
4136 if( p.trait_points_left < 0 ) {
4137 popup( _( "Too many trait points allocated, change some traits or lower some stats and try again." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Too many trait points allocated, change some traits or lower some stats and try again."
) ) ) );
4138 continue;
4139 }
4140 if( p.stat_points_left < 0 ) {
4141 popup( _( "Too many stat points allocated, lower some stats and try again." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Too many stat points allocated, lower some stats and try again."
) ) ) );
4142 continue;
4143 }
4144 }
4145 if( has_unspent_points( you ) && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM &&
4146 !query_yn( _( "Remaining points will be discarded, are you sure you want to proceed?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Remaining points will be discarded, are you sure you want to proceed?"
) ) ) ) ) {
4147 continue;
4148 }
4149 if( you.name.empty() ) {
4150 no_name_entered = true;
4151 ui_manager::redraw();
4152 if( !query_yn( _( "Are you SURE you're finished? Your name will be randomly generated." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Are you SURE you're finished? Your name will be randomly generated."
) ) ) ) ) {
4153 continue;
4154 } else {
4155 you.pick_name();
4156 tabs.complete = true;
4157 break;
4158 }
4159 }
4160 if( query_yn( _( "Are you SURE you're finished?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Are you SURE you're finished?"
) ) ) ) ) {
4161 tabs.complete = true;
4162 break;
4163 }
4164 continue;
4165 } else if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
4166 break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
4167 } else if( action == "DOWN" ) {
4168 switch( current_selector ) {
4169 case char_creation::NAME:
4170 current_selector = char_creation::GENDER;
4171 break;
4172 case char_creation::GENDER:
4173 current_selector = char_creation::OUTFIT;
4174 break;
4175 case char_creation::OUTFIT:
4176 current_selector = char_creation::HEIGHT;
4177 break;
4178 case char_creation::HEIGHT:
4179 current_selector = char_creation::AGE;
4180 break;
4181 case char_creation::AGE:
4182 current_selector = char_creation::BLOOD;
4183 break;
4184 case char_creation::BLOOD:
4185 current_selector = char_creation::LOCATION;
4186 break;
4187 case char_creation::LOCATION:
4188 current_selector = char_creation::NAME;
4189 break;
4190 }
4191 } else if( action == "UP" ) {
4192 switch( current_selector ) {
4193 case char_creation::NAME:
4194 current_selector = char_creation::LOCATION;
4195 break;
4196 case char_creation::LOCATION:
4197 current_selector = char_creation::BLOOD;
4198 break;
4199 case char_creation::BLOOD:
4200 current_selector = char_creation::AGE;
4201 break;
4202 case char_creation::AGE:
4203 current_selector = char_creation::HEIGHT;
4204 break;
4205 case char_creation::HEIGHT:
4206 current_selector = char_creation::OUTFIT;
4207 break;
4208 case char_creation::OUTFIT:
4209 current_selector = char_creation::GENDER;
4210 break;
4211 case char_creation::GENDER:
4212 current_selector = char_creation::NAME;
4213 break;
4214 }
4215 } else if( action == "RIGHT" ) {
4216 switch( current_selector ) {
4217 case char_creation::HEIGHT:
4218 if( you.base_height() < max_allowed_height ) {
4219 you.mod_base_height( 1 );
4220 you.set_stored_kcal( you.get_healthy_kcal() );
4221 }
4222 break;
4223 case char_creation::AGE:
4224 if( you.base_age() < max_allowed_age ) {
4225 you.mod_base_age( 1 );
4226 }
4227 break;
4228 case char_creation::BLOOD:
4229 if( !you.blood_rh_factor ) {
4230 you.blood_rh_factor = true;
4231 break;
4232 }
4233 if( static_cast<blood_type>( static_cast<int>( you.my_blood_type ) + 1 ) != blood_type::num_bt ) {
4234 you.my_blood_type = static_cast<blood_type>( static_cast<int>( you.my_blood_type ) + 1 );
4235 you.blood_rh_factor = false;
4236 } else {
4237 you.my_blood_type = static_cast<blood_type>( 0 );
4238 you.blood_rh_factor = false;
4239 }
4240 break;
4241 case char_creation::GENDER:
4242 you.male = !you.male;
4243 break;
4244 case char_creation::OUTFIT:
4245 outfit = !outfit;
4246 break;
4247 default:
4248 break;
4249 }
4250 } else if( action == "LEFT" ) {
4251 switch( current_selector ) {
4252 case char_creation::HEIGHT:
4253 if( you.base_height() > min_allowed_height ) {
4254 you.mod_base_height( -1 );
4255 you.set_stored_kcal( you.get_healthy_kcal() );
4256 }
4257 break;
4258 case char_creation::AGE:
4259 if( you.base_age() > min_allowed_age ) {
4260 you.mod_base_age( -1 );
4261 }
4262 break;
4263 case char_creation::BLOOD:
4264 if( you.blood_rh_factor ) {
4265 you.blood_rh_factor = false;
4266 break;
4267 }
4268 if( you.my_blood_type != static_cast<blood_type>( 0 ) ) {
4269 you.my_blood_type = static_cast<blood_type>( static_cast<int>( you.my_blood_type ) - 1 );
4270 you.blood_rh_factor = true;
4271 } else {
4272 you.my_blood_type = static_cast<blood_type>( static_cast<int>( blood_type::num_bt ) - 1 );
4273 you.blood_rh_factor = true;
4274 }
4275 break;
4276 case char_creation::GENDER:
4277 you.male = !you.male;
4278 break;
4279 case char_creation::OUTFIT:
4280 outfit = !outfit;
4281 break;
4282 default:
4283 break;
4284 }
4285 } else if( action == "REROLL_CHARACTER" && allow_reroll ) {
4286 you.randomize( false );
4287 // Re-enter this tab again, but it forces a complete redrawing of it.
4288 break;
4289 } else if( action == "REROLL_CHARACTER_WITH_SCENARIO" && allow_reroll ) {
4290 you.randomize( true );
4291 // Re-enter this tab again, but it forces a complete redrawing of it.
4292 break;
4293 } else if( action == "SAVE_TEMPLATE" ) {
4294 if( const auto name = query_for_template_name() ) {
4295 you.save_template( *name, pool );
4296 }
4297 } else if( action == "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_NAME" ) {
4298 if( !MAP_SHARING::isSharing() ) { // Don't allow random names when sharing maps. We don't need to check at the top as you won't be able to edit the name
4299 you.pick_name();
4300 no_name_entered = you.name.empty();
4301 }
4302 } else if( action == "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_DESCRIPTION" ) {
4303 bool gender_selection = one_in( 2 );
4304 you.male = gender_selection;
4305 outfit = gender_selection;
4306 if( !MAP_SHARING::isSharing() ) { // Don't allow random names when sharing maps. We don't need to check at the top as you won't be able to edit the name
4307 you.pick_name();
4308 no_name_entered = you.name.empty();
4309 }
4310 you.set_base_age( rng( 16, 55 ) );
4311 you.randomize_height();
4312 you.randomize_blood();
4313 you.randomize_heartrate();
4314 } else if( action == "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) {
4315 outfit = !outfit;
4316 } else if( action == "CHANGE_GENDER" ) {
4317 you.male = !you.male;
4318 } else if( action == "CHANGE_START_OF_CATACLYSM" ) {
4319 const scenario *scen = get_scenario();
4320 scen->change_start_of_cataclysm( calendar_ui::select_time_point( scen->start_of_cataclysm(),
4321 _( "Select cataclysm start date" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select cataclysm start date"
) ) ), calendar_ui::granularity::hour ) );
4322 } else if( action == "CHANGE_START_OF_GAME" ) {
4323 const scenario *scen = get_scenario();
4324 scen->change_start_of_game( calendar_ui::select_time_point( scen->start_of_game(),
4325 _( "Select game start date" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select game start date" ) ) ), calendar_ui::granularity::hour ) );
4326 } else if( action == "RESET_CALENDAR" ) {
4327 get_scenario()->reset_calendar();
4328 } else if( action == "CHOOSE_CITY" ) {
4329 std::vector<city> cities( city::get_all() );
4330 const auto cities_cmp_population = []( const city & a, const city & b ) {
4331 return std::tie( a.population, a.name ) > std::tie( b.population, b.name );
4332 };
4333 std::sort( cities.begin(), cities.end(), cities_cmp_population );
4334 uilist cities_menu;
4335 ui::omap::setup_cities_menu( cities_menu, cities );
4336 std::optional<city> c = ui::omap::select_city( cities_menu, cities, false );
4337 if( c.has_value() ) {
4338 you.starting_city = c;
4339 you.world_origin = c->pos_om;
4340 }
4341 } else if( action == "CHOOSE_LOCATION" ) {
4342 select_location.query();
4343 if( select_location.ret == RANDOM_START_LOC_ENTRY ) {
4344 you.random_start_location = true;
4345 } else if( select_location.ret >= 0 ) {
4346 for( const start_location &loc : start_locations::get_all() ) {
4347 if( loc.id.id().to_i() == select_location.ret ) {
4348 you.random_start_location = false;
4349 you.start_location = loc.id;
4350 break;
4351 }
4352 }
4353 }
4354 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" &&
4355 // Don't edit names when sharing maps
4356 !MAP_SHARING::isSharing() ) {
4357
4358 string_input_popup popup;
4359 switch( current_selector ) {
4360 case char_creation::NAME: {
4361 popup.title( _( "Enter name. Cancel to delete all." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Enter name. Cancel to delete all."
) ) ) )
4362 .text( you.name )
4363 .only_digits( false );
4364 you.name = popup.query_string();
4365 no_name_entered = you.name.empty();
4366 break;
4367 }
4368 case char_creation::AGE: {
4369 popup.title( _( "Enter age in years. Minimum 16, maximum 55" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Enter age in years. Minimum 16, maximum 55"
) ) ) )
4370 .text( string_format( "%d", you.base_age() ) )
4371 .only_digits( true );
4372 const int result = popup.query_int();
4373 if( result != 0 ) {
4374 you.set_base_age( clamp( result, 16, 55 ) );
4375 }
4376 break;
4377 }
4378 case char_creation::HEIGHT: {
4379 popup.title( string_format( _( "Enter height in centimeters. Minimum %d, maximum %d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Enter height in centimeters. Minimum %d, maximum %d"
) ) ),
4380 min_allowed_height,
4381 max_allowed_height ) )
4382 .text( string_format( "%d", you.base_height() ) )
4383 .only_digits( true );
4384 const int result = popup.query_int();
4385 if( result != 0 ) {
4386 you.set_base_height( clamp( result, min_allowed_height, max_allowed_height ) );
4387 }
4388 break;
4389 }
4390 case char_creation::BLOOD: {
4391 uilist btype;
4392 btype.text = _( "Select blood type" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select blood type" ) ) );
4393 btype.addentry( static_cast<int>( blood_type::blood_O ), true, '1', "O" );
4394 btype.addentry( static_cast<int>( blood_type::blood_A ), true, '2', "A" );
4395 btype.addentry( static_cast<int>( blood_type::blood_B ), true, '3', "B" );
4396 btype.addentry( static_cast<int>( blood_type::blood_AB ), true, '4', "AB" );
4397 btype.query();
4398 if( btype.ret < 0 ) {
4399 break;
4400 }
4401
4402 uilist bfac;
4403 bfac.text = _( "Select Rh factor" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select Rh factor" ) ) );
4404 bfac.addentry( 0, true, '-', _( "negative" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "negative" ) ) ) );
4405 bfac.addentry( 1, true, '+', _( "positive" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "positive" ) ) ) );
4406 bfac.query();
4407 if( bfac.ret < 0 ) {
4408 break;
4409 }
4410 you.my_blood_type = static_cast<blood_type>( btype.ret );
4411 you.blood_rh_factor = static_cast<bool>( bfac.ret );
4412 break;
4413 }
4414 case char_creation::GENDER: {
4415 uilist gselect;
4416 gselect.text = _( "Select gender" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select gender" ) ) );
4417 gselect.addentry( 0, true, '1', _( "Female" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Female" ) ) ) );
4418 gselect.addentry( 1, true, '2', _( "Male" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Male" ) ) ) );
4419 gselect.query();
4420 if( gselect.ret < 0 ) {
4421 break;
4422 }
4423 you.male = static_cast<bool>( gselect.ret );
4424 break;
4425 }
4426 case char_creation::OUTFIT: {
4427 uilist gselect;
4428 gselect.text = _( "Select outfit" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select outfit" ) ) );
4429 gselect.addentry( 0, true, '1', _( "Female" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Female" ) ) ) );
4430 gselect.addentry( 1, true, '2', _( "Male" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Male" ) ) ) );
4431 gselect.query();
4432 if( gselect.ret < 0 ) {
4433 break;
4434 }
4435 outfit = static_cast<bool>( gselect.ret );
4436 break;
4437 }
4438 case char_creation::LOCATION: {
4439 select_location.query();
4440 if( select_location.ret == RANDOM_START_LOC_ENTRY ) {
4441 you.random_start_location = true;
4442 } else if( select_location.ret >= 0 ) {
4443 for( const start_location &loc : start_locations::get_all() ) {
4444 if( loc.id.id().to_i() == select_location.ret ) {
4445 you.random_start_location = false;
4446 you.start_location = loc.id;
4447 break;
4448 }
4449 }
4450 }
4451 break;
4452 }
4453 }
4454 }
4455 } while( true );
4456}
4457
4458std::vector<trait_id> Character::get_base_traits() const
4459{
4460 return std::vector<trait_id>( my_traits.begin(), my_traits.end() );
4461}
4462
4463std::vector<trait_id> Character::get_mutations( bool include_hidden,
4464 bool ignore_enchantments, const std::function<bool( const mutation_branch & )> &filter ) const
4465{
4466 std::vector<trait_id> result;
4467 result.reserve( my_mutations.size() + enchantment_cache->get_mutations().size() );
4468 for( const std::pair<const trait_id, trait_data> &t : my_mutations ) {
4469 const mutation_branch &mut = t.first.obj();
4470 if( include_hidden || mut.player_display ) {
4471 if( filter == nullptr || filter( mut ) ) {
4472 result.push_back( t.first );
4473 }
4474 }
4475 }
4476 if( !ignore_enchantments ) {
4477 for( const trait_id &ench_trait : enchantment_cache->get_mutations() ) {
4478 if( include_hidden || ench_trait->player_display ) {
4479 bool found = false;
4480 for( const trait_id &exist : result ) {
4481 if( exist == ench_trait ) {
4482 found = true;
4483 break;
4484 }
4485 }
4486 if( !found ) {
4487 if( filter == nullptr || filter( ench_trait.obj() ) ) {
4488 result.push_back( ench_trait );
4489 }
4490 }
4491 }
4492 }
4493 }
4494 return result;
4495}
4496
4497std::vector<trait_and_var> Character::get_mutations_variants( bool include_hidden,
4498 bool ignore_enchantments ) const
4499{
4500 std::vector<trait_and_var> result;
4501 result.reserve( my_mutations.size() + enchantment_cache->get_mutations().size() );
4502 for( const std::pair<const trait_id, trait_data> &t : my_mutations ) {
4503 if( include_hidden || t.first.obj().player_display ) {
4504 const std::string &variant = t.second.variant != nullptr ? t.second.variant->id : "";
4505 result.emplace_back( t.first, variant );
4506 }
4507 }
4508 if( !ignore_enchantments ) {
4509 for( const trait_id &ench_trait : enchantment_cache->get_mutations() ) {
4510 if( include_hidden || ench_trait->player_display ) {
4511 bool found = false;
4512 for( const trait_and_var &exist : result ) {
4513 if( exist.trait == ench_trait ) {
4514 found = true;
4515 break;
4516 }
4517 }
4518 if( !found ) {
4519 result.emplace_back( ench_trait, "" );
4520 }
4521 }
4522 }
4523 }
4524 return result;
4525}
4526
4527void Character::clear_mutations()
4528{
4529 while( !my_traits.empty() ) {
4530 my_traits.erase( *my_traits.begin() );
4531 }
4532 while( !my_mutations.empty() ) {
4533 const trait_id trait = my_mutations.begin()->first;
4534 my_mutations.erase( my_mutations.begin() );
4535 mutation_loss_effect( trait );
4536 }
4537 cached_mutations.clear();
4538 recalc_sight_limits();
4539 calc_encumbrance();
4540}
4541
4542void Character::empty_skills()
4543{
4544 for( auto &sk : *_skills ) {
4545 sk.second = SkillLevel();
4546 }
4547}
4548
4549void Character::add_traits()
4550{
4551 // TODO: get rid of using get_avatar() here, use `this` instead
4552 for( const trait_and_var &tr : get_avatar().prof->get_locked_traits() ) {
4553 if( !has_trait( tr.trait ) ) {
4554 toggle_trait_deps( tr.trait );
4555 }
4556 }
4557 for( const trait_id &tr : get_scenario()->get_locked_traits() ) {
4558 if( !has_trait( tr ) ) {
4559 toggle_trait_deps( tr );
4560 }
4561 }
4562}
4563
4564trait_id Character::random_good_trait()
4565{
4566 return get_random_trait( []( const mutation_branch & mb ) {
4567 return mb.points > 0;
4568 } );
4569}
4570
4571trait_id Character::random_bad_trait()
4572{
4573 return get_random_trait( []( const mutation_branch & mb ) {
4574 return mb.points < 0;
4575 } );
4576}
4577
4578trait_id Character::get_random_trait( const std::function<bool( const mutation_branch & )> &func )
4579{
4580 std::vector<trait_id> vTraits;
4581
4582 for( const mutation_branch &traits_iter : mutation_branch::get_all() ) {
4583 if( func( traits_iter ) && get_scenario()->traitquery( traits_iter.id ) ) {
4584 vTraits.push_back( traits_iter.id );
4585 }
4586 }
4587
4588 return random_entry( vTraits );
4589}
4590
4591void Character::randomize_cosmetic_trait( const std::string &mutation_type )
4592{
4593 trait_id trait = get_random_trait( [mutation_type]( const mutation_branch & mb ) {
4594 return mb.points == 0 && mb.types.count( mutation_type );
4595 } );
4596
4597 if( !has_conflicting_trait( trait ) ) {
4598 toggle_trait( trait );
4599 }
4600}
4601
4602std::optional<std::string> query_for_template_name()
4603{
4604 static const std::set<int> fname_char_blacklist = {
4605#if defined(_WIN32)
4606 '\"', '*', '/', ':', '<', '>', '?', '\\', '|',
4607 '\x01', '\x02', '\x03', '\x04', '\x05', '\x06', '\x07', '\x09',
4608 '\x0B', '\x0C', '\x0E', '\x0F', '\x10', '\x11', '\x12',
4609 '\x13', '\x14', '\x16', '\x17', '\x18', '\x19', '\x1A',
4610 '\x1C', '\x1D', '\x1E', '\x1F'
4611#else
4612 '/'
4613#endif
4614 };
4615 std::string title = _( "Name of template:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Name of template:" ) ) );
4616 std::string desc = _( "Keep in mind you may not use special characters like / in filenames" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Keep in mind you may not use special characters like / in filenames"
) ) );
4617
4618 string_input_popup spop;
4619 spop.title( title );
4620 spop.description( desc );
4621 spop.width( FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH - utf8_width( title ) - 8 );
4622 for( int character : fname_char_blacklist ) {
4623 spop.add_callback( character, []() {
4624 return true;
4625 } );
4626 }
4627
4628 spop.query_string( true );
4629 if( spop.canceled() ) {
4630 return std::nullopt;
4631 } else {
4632 return spop.text();
4633 }
4634}
4635
4636void avatar::character_to_template( const std::string &name )
4637{
4638 save_template( name, pool_type::TRANSFER );
4639}
4640
4641void Character::add_default_background()
4642{
4643 for( const profession_group &prof_grp : profession_group::get_all() ) {
4644 if( prof_grp.get_id() == profession_group_adult_basic_background ) {
4645 for( const profession_id &hobb : prof_grp.get_professions() ) {
4646 hobbies.insert( &hobb.obj() );
4647 }
4648 }
4649 }
4650}
4651
4652void avatar::save_template( const std::string &name, pool_type pool )
4653{
4654 write_to_file( PATH_INFO::templatedir() + name + ".template", [&]( std::ostream & fout ) {
4655 JsonOut jsout( fout, true );
4656
4657 jsout.start_array();
4658
4659 jsout.start_object();
4660 jsout.member( "limit", pool );
4661 jsout.member( "random_start_location", random_start_location );
4662 if( !random_start_location ) {
4663 jsout.member( "start_location", start_location );
4664 }
4665 jsout.end_object();
4666
4667 serialize( jsout );
4668
4669 jsout.end_array();
4670 }, _( "player template" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "player template" ) ) ) );
4671}
4672
4673bool avatar::load_template( const std::string &template_name, pool_type &pool )
4674{
4675 return read_from_file_json( PATH_INFO::templatedir_path() / ( template_name + ".template" ), [&](
4676 const JsonValue & jv ) {
4677 // Legacy templates are an object. Current templates are an array of 0, 1, or 2 objects.
4678 JsonObject legacy_template;
4679 if( jv.test_array() ) {
4680 // not a legacy template
4681 JsonArray template_array = jv;
4682 if( template_array.empty() ) {
4683 return;
4684 }
4685
4686 JsonObject jobj = template_array.get_object( 0 );
4687
4688 jobj.get_int( "stat_points", 0 );
4689 jobj.get_int( "trait_points", 0 );
4690 jobj.get_int( "skill_points", 0 );
4691
4692 pool = static_cast<pool_type>( jobj.get_int( "limit" ) );
4693
4694 random_start_location = jobj.get_bool( "random_start_location", true );
4695 const std::string jobj_start_location = jobj.get_string( "start_location", "" );
4696
4697 // get_scenario()->allowed_start( loc.ident() ) is checked once scenario loads in avatar::load()
4698 for( const class start_location &loc : start_locations::get_all() ) {
4699 if( loc.id.str() == jobj_start_location ) {
4700 random_start_location = false;
4701 this->start_location = loc.id;
4702 break;
4703 }
4704 }
4705
4706 if( template_array.size() == 1 ) {
4707 return;
4708 }
4709 legacy_template = template_array.get_object( 1 );
4710 }
4711
4712 deserialize( legacy_template );
4713
4714 // If stored_calories the template is under a million (kcals < 1000), assume it predates the
4715 // kilocalorie-to-literal-calorie conversion and is off by a factor of 1000.
4716 if( get_stored_kcal() < 1000 ) {
4717 set_stored_kcal( 1000 * get_stored_kcal() );
4718 }
4719
4720 if( MAP_SHARING::isSharing() ) {
4721 // just to make sure we have the right name
4722 name = MAP_SHARING::getUsername();
4723 }
4724 } );
4725}
4726
4727void reset_scenario( avatar &u, const scenario *scen )
4728{
4729 auto psorter = profession_sorter;
4730 psorter.sort_by_points = true;
4731 const auto permitted = scen->permitted_professions();
4732 const auto default_prof = *std::min_element( permitted.begin(), permitted.end(), psorter );
22
←
Wrong iterator dereferenced
4733
4734 u.random_start_location = true;
4735 u.str_max = 8;
4736 u.dex_max = 8;
4737 u.int_max = 8;
4738 u.per_max = 8;
4739 set_scenario( scen );
4740 u.prof = &default_prof.obj();
4741
4742 u.hobbies.clear();
4743 u.add_default_background();
4744 u.clear_mutations();
4745 u.recalc_hp();
4746 u.empty_skills();
4747 u.add_traits();
4748}
